We've been using Finish tablets for years – I tend to buy them whenever a special offer comes up at the supermarket and I'm not overly fussy about which of the various Finish tablets I get as they all do the job satisfactorily. I have occasionally used supermarket own-brand tablets but find them to be harsh, particularly on glassware, whilst not getting rid of baked on food on e.g. casserole dishes. With Finish, invariably the dishes, etc come out perfectly clean. I don't recall ever having had problems with glassware with the Finish tablets but they have dulled the exterior enamel on some pans so I am selective in what I put in the dishwasher. I wouldn't dream of putting good china and crystal in the dishwasher regardless of the type of tablet.. I've also used the Fairy tabs a few times, mainly when they have been on offer. I prefer the Finish tablets, particularly the lemon-scented version, over the Fairy ones, mainly because the Fairy tabs leave a fairly strong smell and occasionally there seems to be a sort of residue on crockery.. You don't need to add rinse aid or salt with these Finish tablets – I was initially concerned about this but everything comes out streak-free so the tablets are doing their job. The only problem is having to repeatedly press buttons to override my dishwasher's incessant demands for salt & rinse aid! The pack does say that if you live in an area of particularly hard water then you may need to supplement with dishwasher salt. I live in an area where water is on the hard side but not excessively so and I haven't need to do this.. The seal on the bag isn't that good and in theory the tabs need to be kept dry. Even when the pack has unsealed itself, the tablets haven't come to any harm stored in the cupboard under the sink.

I have used every type of dishwasher powder, liquid and tab over the past 25 years but always return to Finish. I have a large family so the dishwasher gets a great deal of use, I also live in a hard water area and I find that even though I still fill up the salt and rinse aid reservoirs in my machine that the loose powder and cheaper dishwasher tabs just don't get my wash really clean - especially glass. They often don't seem to fully dissolve either.. Finish Quantum is great - the wash comes out clean and the glasses and ceramic shiny - the powder also dissolves easily. There is no fiddling with any wrapping or measuring out powder - I know you pay a premium for this but it is convient.I also like how there is no overpowering smell left on the plates after a wash. After using some brands of tab, I have had to rinse everything as the perfume left behind was overwhelming .Many years ago I worked in a top end commercial kitchen and they always used Finish.. I think all tabs and powders seem to scratch up and cloud glass over time - wish Finish could sort that out.

Finish dishwasher tablets have always been my first choice, and I think they do give a superior finish over own brand. I was therefore pleased to be given the chance to try these. I should point out that I continue to add salt to the dishwasher – we live in a very hard water area and I simply can’t believe that any tablet is going to adequately deal with that aspect. This is probably incorrect and when the current salt runs out I may give these a go on their own.. These tablets perform well at both medium and fast wash settings. Everything was clean and the machine looked and smelled clean. These are as good and possibly better than any dishwasher tablet I have ever used.. So why only 4 stars? Firstly these are expensive at the moment – I am not sure that I would pay the premium. Secondly there is a potential problem in storage. Once opened any water or moisture getting into the bad is going to ‘melt’ the tablets. I had not previously considered the need to unwrap the old style tablet as a major problem, and not sure the convenience is worth the risk.

These tablets arrived in the post just as I was about to do a full load, so they got a test straightaway.. I find, as I’ve said in previous reviews for dishwasher tablets, that Finish products are no better than my ‘shops own brand’ ones BUT put the dishwasher on the highest heat setting and with these tablets, there’s no comparison. On greasy plates and cutlery on the highest heat setting, whoosh, all the grease is gone and everything is sparkling, even the dishwasher itself.. On a ‘normal’ setting, the only difference was in the glasses, and for the extra cost, I can put up with the glasses being ‘less sparkly’.. I think I’ll be keeping these tablets to only use when I have a greasy load though, because they are really really good.. I did feel that there was a bit of optimism where the bag said “Tear Here”. I’d not had three Weetabix for breakfast, so had to resort to using the scissors.

We've been using these, for around a month, in a Bosch dishwasher on an 'Eco 55°' programme. The results have been perfectly acceptable. The dishwasher gets used every other day and is generally jam-packed.. The results have been very good and so far we haven't found anything that hasn't been spotlessly clean and none of our glasses have gone cloudy.. The wrapper-free tablet (covered in a dissolvable coating) can be put into the dispenser, or for short washes, on the floor of the dishwasher, but because of the coating the dispenser must be dry ... and so must one's hands. The resealable bag of tablets also needs to be kept in a dry place.. Reading the instruction I note that I'm supposed to wear safety glasses when handling the product; I haven't but it's a little disconcerting.. When we've used these up I'll get some more, but hopefully when they're on the special offer that dishwasher tablets frequently are.

These tablets give good results, and the all in one function is very useful. I have to admit however the cleaning performance is no better than the supermarket value brand ones I normally use. Perhaps when dishes are caked up to the eyeballs with dried food these would work better, but then I don't put anything that bad in the dishwasher.. One of the main features of these tablets, the lack of wrapper, is also the main drawback. Absolutely dry hands are needed when handling otherwise they start melting and dissolving. The packet must be carefully closed also as otherwise the contents begin to go tacky.. They work fine, and if you're really pushed for time they save a few seconds each month in not adding salt and rinseaid. But I'll be sticking to the cheapies.

Great product, does the job well and I think okay value at about 17p per wash.. The tablets are self dissolving and include washing as well as rinsing elements.. The scent is fine although I think I prefer the citrussy things a bit more.. Also on a couple of occasions there was a slightly gritty residue left in a few of the cups on the upper rack. Not sure if this was just food residue but I did feel slightly irked at having to rinse the cups again having put them through the washer already.. The other point with these is that the outside layer of the packet of the tablet is soluble so don't pick them up with wet hands or they are likely to disintegrate! all in all they do the job pretty well and of course the washing isn't just in the tablets also down to different washers I guess!

These are dishwasher tablets and the clean dishes!. The packaging is clean and simple and each 'powerball' comes wrapped in its own seal. No need to remove that just drop it in the slot and away you go!. Work very well on a variety of cups, glasses, dishes, plates and pots. Haven't used them for long enough yet to know if they stain glasses but no streaks yet. And no leakage into the dishwasher either.. Pretty good on heavily stained dishes though we tend to remove excess food from our plates etc before putting in the washer. Work well with pots and pans, which tend to be stained a little more.. Price (considering the number of tablets provided) and performance on a par with the Finish liquid we normally use, with a pleasant smell.. Worth considering.

If you're wondering what the difference is between the Quantum and the Finish Power Pure it basically comes down to the chemicals used, or not used in the case of the Power Pure.. I previously used tablets by a competent less expensive brand, I always waited to get them on offer as well, I can't see any difference whatsoever between those and these Quantum tablets, the price at the moment is justified, but only by a small margin, I would probably buy if I was running out and didn't see any offers in the supermarket, this price works out again because you're getting 60 tablets as opposed to the 30 or 40 in most well known brands, so stacked up the price isn't bad. In stores these Quantum's are ridiculously expensive so online is the only way I'd get these again.. As for the clean, as I said I notice no difference between the less expensive brand I have been using, I do notice a quality increase compared to the saver brands but that's not really anything to shout about as they are not really competing with the cheap ones. and a couple of times the dissolvable plastic casing has been left behind in the compartment which could lead to clogging, this has only happened twice in around 12 times on a 30 minute wash but It could be a problem.. All in all these are a very glossy product that's big on marketing but not a big leap in noticeable quality.

Never mind the fancy appearance & market leading brand name are these worth the extra moolah?. Well yes & no. If you are using a lot of glass or flatware that is of a fine finish then quite possibly yes. These little beauties clean glass better than any other I've tried and do so regardless of the quality of rinse agent.. So too with plates etc they do seem to just add an extra shine to everything.. However, away from that special dinner service you keep for 'occasions' it has to be said that these can be an unnecessary expense. Your average bog standard dinner service, (like most of us use week in & out when not trying to impress) really doesn't need these. The same is true of glassware.. It should also be pointed out that these do not perform at all well with faster 'eco-wash' cycles. The extra heat & time are what these need to perform at their best. In fairness though that is true of most tablets.. A pack kept by for when the 'posh' stuff is brought out of mothballs is a good idea but for the everyday & in particular fast & eco settings on your dishwasher, it's hard to justify the extra expense involved.

This is the second batch of dishwasher tablets I have trialed from amazon. First was. http://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/B00820VLNU. Like these..the "QUANTUMS" seem to do a good job...when you pick them up .they kind of feel a almost slimey...but the outer wrapper dissolves and releases the "cocktail" of cleaning agents!. I haven't added salt in the washer with these (unlike the lemon sparkles)and so far not had any issues with cleaning efficiency.. I don't really notice a string scent with these.. These come in a plastic seal-able pack, not sure if this is just to keep them dry from moisture that might start them dissolving or keep them dry if you keep them on the sink or close.. All in all ..pleased with the results so far

Not all dishwasher products are the same.. This is especially true if you are washing glassware in your machine.. After a while you will find the glass begins to cloud and become dulled with cheaper dish-washing tablets/powder.. I used to get this a lot, but now that I am using Finish I don't get the same damage.. Also, there is a better finish overall on other items, including metal (kitchen knives, etc) and I think the lack of drying marks, the squeaky clean finish and the kindness to my glassware means that I will be using this for a while.. If it were a little cheaper it would be 5 stars from me.

Finish Quantum Regular 60 tablets in 1 pack. Beware, Amazon has lumped several different types and pack sizes of Finish tablet on this page, not all are the same.. This particular Quantum Regular tablet offers the convenience of just dropping the tablet and its covering into the dispenser (no wrapper to be removed). But, there is a problem: the re-sealable Finish packs do not reseal well after a while and instead we have found that it is essential to always store the tablets in a couple of old airtight Tupperware boxes to protect them from humidity - the larger one keeps the bulk of the pack dry in long term storage, the smaller one holds just a few handy for daily use. This is because most of the time our machine is only used on alternate days, and a pack of 60 tablets will last us as long as four months; but if these tablets are left exposed to normal humid kitchen air they will become sticky and horrible in maybe a week, even less if wet fingers were used to pick out the previously used tablets.. This pack of Quantum does NOT claim to be safe in septic tanks.. We've been using all of the various types of Finish dishwasher tablets and powders for more than three decades in a couple of different dishwashers. They consistently perform very well in the Which? tests. To my surprise, regardless of which of the many types of Finish tablet we use, the results are always much better than the occasionally tried "Own Brand" supermarket tablets. We have soft water but still always make sure the dishwasher has the water-softener and rinse-aid working correctly and the filters are clear. We usually use the shorter but hotter wash program. The machine remains clean and pong-free.. Beware, soft glass will be scoured by the basic Regular tablets, as happened very quickly with our

Decided to give these a try instead of our usual 'economy' brand. They do produce a good finish on dishes and glassware and the washer always smells nice and fresh after a cycle. As this is our first pack, it's too early to comment on the long term effects of using these, but hopefully they won't cause as much clouding on glassware as the cheaper tablets.. At RRP of £16 for 45 tabs (35½p each), they are not cheap so I would not get them at that price, but as they are currently only £8 on Amazon (just under 18p per tablet) it was worth a try. If you're not too bothered about cost, these are recommended, though the savings on cheaper tablets will probably pay for replacing clouded cheap glassware every 6 months.

I love these, I find they shift even really stubborn food from dishes. Also I love how good glass looks when using these tablets, no annoying streaks or lines.. If I had one gripe, it'd be that sometimes they don't fully dissolve when I use eco mode.. But other than that I think these are great value for money!

I like these dishwasher tablets which are so convenient to use the laziest of dishwasher users could manage it. One tablet all ready to drop into the slot, nothing else to add, just turn the dial on the dishwasher to the correct program and leave.. The smell is pleasant and not overpowering, the dishes come out clean and the combined rinse aid appears to work as the cutlery and glasses sparkle. The only downside is the price.

If you are looking for a dishwasher tablet which leaves your dishes sparkling clean and with a decent shine, then you need look no further. These tablets, which come I their own dissolvable plastic are easy to pop I. The machine. No need to unwrap. The tablets do what they say on the tin and also leave the dishwasher smelling fresh and clean. I cannot fault this product and would highly recommend

I like the convenience of these as they are all in one and in a hard water area these tablets perform well. If we use the cheaper store brand we have to buy the salt and rinse aid or we dont get a good clean on the dishes.. These tablets also leave my dishwasher smelling clean and seem to cut down the lime scale too.. I gave them 4 stars because even though they clean well, I still think they are a bit too pricey.

The water is really hard in my part of the world, so it's difficult to find a tablet that copes with cleaning and not coating the dishwasher in limescale. In my experience this is one of the highest quality tablets there is. Cheaper ones may do the job almost as well, but there is a definite improvement when it comes to these.. They aren't cheap, but then they have a long shelf life, so it will definitely be worth it in the long run.

These dishwasher tablets are fantastic. The difference in how my dishes come out of the machine compared with other tablets is unbelievable. I would buy this brand all of the time - but find that they are quite expensive. Still, worth the money I suppose!

I have tried using supermarkets' own brand dishwasher tablets but have always ended up coming back to Finish. Yes, they are more expensive than own brand tablets, but I always run my dishwasher on the coolest ("delicate") cycle and I always found that non-branded tablets left dishes oily and glassware streaky. These Finish tablets gave great results first time, wine glasses came out sparkling and mugs came out free of tea stains. Finish tablets also have chemicals that protect against limescale build-up, which is really important for me living in a hard water area!

For a number of years I have used Fairy Platinum dishwasher tablets because I found them to be far superior to anything else. These new(?) Finish tablets are just as good. I tried one on a heavy mixed load including a casserole dish, saucepans and glasses, and everything came out sparkling on a medium wash cycle. I was especially happy with the casserole dish as I had forgotten to put it in soak overnight and the grease was baked on.. An easy recommendation!

have been using a leading discount store's own brand for quite a while and whilst they did a commendable job - these new Finish Quantum do an amazing job. Glass ware just sparkles now. Very impressed - would definitely recommend.

I've used these before, so knew it was a good quality product. The tablets are easy to use, not being wrapped, and the end result is always a clean, sparkly finish. If you can get these at a good price, I'd say they're a better deal than cheaper ones, as you know they're always going to work.

While these tablets do give a great "finish" to specifically glassware & cutlery, the results on ceramics & other dishwasher friendly items are hard to tell apart from another "mythical being" brand starting with the same letter. Those are cheaper and seem to do the same cleaning job - so if you use cheap glassware you might be quids in by not shelling out on these. On the other hand, if you dont use salt in your dishwasher or dont need to as you live in a soft water area, as these contain salt you could notice better results by using these "3 in1" tablets ... In conclusion, if you see them on offer, try them - if you dont have any complaints with your existing brand / the price you pay then why change ? The smell of these is one of the nicest I have smelt, but it's not enough on its own.

Finish Powerball are simply the best dishwasher tabs. We've tried the no-name brands etc but they just aren't as good. Not sure I can tell the difference between all the different Finish products - usually just get the pack on promotion! But testing these Quantum ones delivered the results we are accustomed to. Sparkling clean, streak free dishes. Brilliant.
You can't beat these tablets, even on the quick wash they left everything clean and sparkly. My dishwasher actually came with these new, and so I'm happy to use the recommended brand.

As a family who rarely use the dishwasher due to it being, well, a bit rubbish and the tediousness of the inevitable rewashing of any dishes it perceives as overly challenging, the repeated mention of 'power' on the packaging of these gave us hope that the tablets may truly be powerful enough to clean our dishes even with our 'special needs' dishwasher. While not the miracle we hoped for, these really are better than those we have tried before, and most things came clean, which was very pleasing. Hence a big thumbs up from us!

Finish are without a doubt the industry standard when it comes to dishwasher tablets and the latest brand a another winning product.. slightly different from the more common powerball these come in a disolvable pouch that contains small pellets but they still provide a shiny fresh smelling finish.. highly recommended.

I usually get these when they are on offer in the supermarket as they can be quite pricey. I do find them to be the best on the market, glasses really do gleam when they come out of the machine. I've tried other brands which do the job but find the Finish Powerballs to be the best for sparkle and clean.

I have been using Finish dishwasher tablets for a few years now and I highly recommend them. This pack is good value for money and even though it is more expensive than some other brands, they always leave my dishes, cutlery, glasses and pans clean, dry and streak free.

I have looked longingly at these top of the range Finish Quantum dishwasher tablets in the supermarket but the price has always stopped me putting them in the basket.. I am not a fan of the gold, silver and wooden spoon service and the range of Finish dishwasher tablets is equally annoying. Why make a second and third quality product to one that is 'the best'? Dishwasher tablets should clean plates and cutlery and give glassware a nice shine. Rant over!. So, yes, these Quantum tablets really are great - noticeably better than the 'ordinary' ones I have been using for years - and so they should be the ONLY dishwasher tablets that Finish make. I want to buy them from now on and can only hope the price comes down.

Usually there'snot much to say about dishwasher tablets. I normally use Fairy brand but was immediately surprised by the difference in performance. Overall the clean was similar except for metal utensils which came out exceptional shiny! Glassware was similarly bright & clean. Unlike other reviews I found that tea stains were completely removed after a couple of washes.. Job done!

The greener alternative. Review of the "Power and Pure" variant, followed by a footnote for the regular Quantums.... I generally use the regular "All-in-1" tablets and tend not to have too much of a problem with them, aside from the occasional granule of residue left on things.. However, I prefer using these types of gel tablet as there is less waste and no chance of any powdery residue, although you do have to be careful how you store them, as if they get wet in the storage pouch then you could have a mess on your hands.. These new "Power and Pure" tablets from Finish are advertised as offering the same cleaning power as regular Quantum, but made using fewer chemicals - which can only be a good thing.. You also need to bear in mind that if you only tend to use very short washes, then you these are of questionable use to you. You could try putting the tablet at the bottom of the internal compartment instead of in the tablet dispenser to give it a head-start, but generally speaking these sort of self-contained tablets prefer longer washes (over 30 minutes) in order to fully dissolve, else you'll end up with a sorry-looking squidgy leftover tablet corpse when you open your dishwasher up after the cycle.. It is worth bearing in mind that all combination tabs contain salt and rinse-aid, so if you are fortunate enough to live in an area where you don't need to use these features, you might be better off with a cheaper alternative that doesn't include them.. Ultimately, I expect a straight-forward, fuss-free, mess-free execution of the dishwasher without having to think about anything. Storage and wash-cycle cautions aside, these tablets are great.. However, value for money is a key aspect for me, so at a one-off purchase price of £8 for 40 (at time of review) these work out at £0.20 per tablet/wash, isn't too bad, but more costly than a pack of 78 All-in-1's for £10 (at time of review), which works out at a price of £0.128 per tablet/wash.. These are heading in the right direction, and I'd be happy if they were the only option. A little cheaper and they'd be spot on.. For the regular Quantum tablets..... However, value for money is a key aspect for me, so at a one-off purchase price of £20 for 60 (at time of review) these work out at £0.33 per tablet/wash, which in my eyes is a bit pricey, and when you stack it up against a pack of 78 All-in-1's for £10 (at time of review), which works out at a price of £0.128 per tablet/wash, it makes the Quantums more than double the price per wash.

We've had a dishwasher for years and have tended to use Finish. Not tried these before as they seemed expensive compared to the more standard tabs.. Tried these ones and they do wash better. Everything is cleaner and certainly do have a sparkle. I was surprised on how well they did clean. We won't be going back to the cheaper ones again - these have proven to be worth the extra.. Also well worth getting from Amazon. Good price and delivered.

We have used a variety of tablets since we first acquired our dishwasher back in 2008; everything from the previous version of Finish's variety (Powerball) to the most basic Happy Shopper brand. It's safe to say that the Quantum tablets have yet to be bettered! They clean very well, and the built in salt is good for the hard water area we live in. I can't see us ever buying a different variety.

In the past we've used the finish all in one tablets, which we found occasionally left a very fine residue on plates and glasses. To get really good results we needed to use some salt and rinse aid. This product was certainly a step up. Gone was the need for extra rinse aid and salt - the results were very good.The packaging was very good, with a self seal strip - just remember to keep them in a dry place. Its very difficult to criticise these tablets - glasses did 'gleam' after washing.

These tables are very easy to use and leave a pleasant smell after use as well as producing fantastic washing results.. Each tablet is wrapped in a is self-dissolving wrapper that helps keep the box poweder free, and so far no trace of any wrapper has been found in my machine after use. The tablets themselves are very effective and work on a wide variety of items - crockery, glasses, cutlery, pots and pans, and casserole dishes. The tables don't really help with maintenence of the dishwasher though, so even though you don't need to use rinse aid with these tables, you will need to clean the dishwasher as you normally would at least one every month.. All in all, I have been very impressed with these tables. They are quick and easy to use, and are very very effective in cleaning a range of items,. They don't leave behind a trace of powder in tha machine nor a coating on items after they've been washed. I would highly recommend these dishwasher tablets.

I've used many brands of tablet over the years, usually as an attempt to cost-cut, but always came back to Finish, the cheaper basic version. I've been happy with them but these are just an extra few rungs up the ladder. I tested a tablet after Sunday Roast ... so a few pans, a couple of greasy over dishes, plates, glasses, the lot. All came out super shiny and any grease was well and truly cut through! Even my large glass dish, that looked like it needed a separate soak, just came out fine. So, highly recommended.

Finish dishwasher tablets have always given excellent results though I’ve never done a like-for-like comparison with any non-namebrand tablets. Therefore I can’t say definitively if these (quite expensive) Finish Quantum Regular tablets can out-clean the supermarket own-brand tablets. But I can definitely say that the cleaning results I got were excellent, particularly on the hotter settings.. Glass items in particular came up looking extremely clean and as good as new. So I’d say if you’re a perfectionist when it comes to cleaning then the Finish Quantum Regular dishwasher tablets are ideal.

These are premium dishwasher tablets and obviously not the cheapest, but they work extremely well. Certainly, compared to the regular supermarket own brand tablets I usually use, dishes and glasses come out noticeably more sparkling and smear-free. The tablets are also contained within a self-dissolving outer skin, meaning you don't have to unwrap them.. Are they worth the extra premium price? That's for you to decide - it really depends on your household budget and how much you value the extra sparkle, but the fact that Amazon is currently selling these at almost half-price might persuade you.

I didn't expect to! I normally use Aldi's own brand, which wins loads of awards. However, I sometimes have to hand-wash items again after taking them out of the machine. I tested the Finish Quantum Regular tablets with a particularly crusty load of dried-out mugs, egg bowls and other items that had been left far too long before washing. They all came out clean & shiny :). I probably will go back to the own-brand tablets, but only because of the price difference. I thought these were really good.

We are really happy with these dish washer tablets. They seem good value for the amount you get in the packet and do a very good job in our little dish washer. We have never had a problem with anything we wash coming out unclean or having any odd odours as some cheaper tablets seem to do in our machine. The packet rips open and seals easily too. Very pleased with these.

I think the common downfall with dishwashers and dishwasher tablets is that they fail to make glasses really clean, leaving a smudged residue over time. These tablets make a real difference in this department. They are also very good at cleaning frying pans and saucepans with more stubborn stains.

I freely confess that in my home very little food preparation is done, our grub usually goes straight from fridge or freezer to halogen oven and then onto plates. So we don't face dishwasher challenges such as lasagna burnt onto Pyrex dishes, and in fact the sternest test we apply to a tablet is whether it gets our tea mugs truly clean. The cheap own brand tablets we usually buy often fail that test, but these Finish ones pass with flying colours, and produce nice results on other crockery, glassware, and cutlery. I've rated them as 5 star because of their performance, but I'm not sure we won't be tempted back to el cheapo tablets when the Finish bag is empty.
Probably the best dishwasher tablets I've ever used - dishes, glasses and cutlery are pretty much consistently spotless and shining. Would definitely recommend.

The new Finish Quantum dishwasher tablets do work really well. We have deliberately put dirtier dishes in to the dishwasher to see if they were better than the usual finish tablets and they are better. The do remove grease and other food stains well, on the packaging it states that they will remove tea stains and again our teaspoons have come out clean. Other extras are the protection for your machine from limescale build up and the lack of wrappers (better for the environment). They smell fresh and do leave your dishes, glasses and cutlery really clean.. There is a however, and it is the cost. I am giving the tablets 5 stars as they do what they say on the packet, however I think they are slightly too pricey. You can get Finish Powerball Quantum (40 pack) for around about £8.00 in my local supermarket so it is worth shopping around for them as £20 for 60 is rather steep.
These are simply the best tablets I have used with my Bosch dishasher. No fuss. Easy to use. No need to open a sealed packet to get the tablet out. Plates and glasses come out sparkling.

Firstly, although the plastic bag is a good idea I found it impossible to "tear along the strip" and had to take scissors to it. Having finally wrestled the bag open I was assailed by the scent of - well I don't quite know what it is except it's very strong (and I have a poor sense of smell) but not unpleasant. So, I popped one of these wrapper-free thingies into my dishwasher, pressed the On button and duly left the machine to do the rest. Forty minutes later - sunglasses at the ready as I prepared to be dazzled - I opened the dishwasher, Yes, everything was clean and sparkly with no sticky residue either on the dishes or in the machine, however, there was a slight smell of what I can only describe as burning rubber. This happens each time I use these particular tablets. Now I know it's not the machine as the previous cycle I used a competitor's squishy sachet thing. Speaking of which I tend to buy the cheapy dishwasher tablets from one of the popular German stores which have taken root over here. Okay, so they don't have the fancy perfume, or a coloured ball sitting smugly in the middle - which, by the way, is NOT a ball but a cavity filled with red granules - and they have a wrapper which takes all of - oh, five seconds - to undo, but by crikey they're much better value than these.. My dishwasher, by the way is a slimline Beko; I always use the shortest cycle, and have good results with the cheaper tablets - so why pay the price of these, especially when most of it is for advertising and marketing.. Not good value; I'll stick with my cheapies, thank you.. Update 25 April. I've been using these every day for almost a month and I have noticed that there is occasionally a sticky residue on plates and cups; to combat this I've added a rinse aid product. Apparently I shouldn't have to as these tablets allegedly have such a feature within them.

It's tricky, reviewing dishwasher tablets. And when I say "tricky", I probably mean boring.. What I want in a dishwasher tablet is. it cleans well. it doesn't leave a noticeable residue on the crockery or utensils. it doesn't leave a strong smell in the dishwasher. it leaves the dishwasher smelling clean after use.. I used Finish gel for the forst 20 years of ownership of a dishwasher and I think it's pretty good. All of the crockery goes in, and while the gold edging gradually faded, I generally got such good results from it that I saw no need for change, and I certainly didn't want to risk those powder tablets.. Then, after some dithering, I tried Fairy Platinum, but found it left a strong smell and residue on the crocks.. Then I tried Quantum Power and Pure, which is still my favourite on the four metrics above, so much so that I stocked up when we went to France earlier in the year - having forgotten I'd got this coming from Amazon.. I think this is pretty much as good as QP&P. It leaves a fresh smell - but a smell nonetheless - in the dishwasher, and you can sometimes smell detergent on the plates, but it wouldn't be bad enough to deter me from using it. I haven't used the dishwasher cleaner for a few weeks, but there's no stale smell, so I reckon it's keeping the old Bosch reasonably clean inside.

There is no doubt in my mind that these are the best dishwasher tabs on the market. There really do the job very well and as long as you use a bit of common sense as well then the results really are as per the advert.. So the real benefit I can give anyone is about how to buy the washer tablets. If you buy them in a supermarket they usually put a price per tablet on the price label and the best I have seen them in a supermarket is Tesco when a special offer is on then they are 17.5p per tablet. So for 60 that’s £10.50. However the normal price in Tesco varies between 20 and 32p a tablet. £9 to £19.20 Lastly the worst I’ve seen them sold for is 40p a tablet in Waitrose … and to be honest this is Waitrose across the board. £24 a pack of 60.. Surprisingly you can find the same huge variance of cost here on Amazon. Everything from £14.50 for a hundred (cheapest I’ve ever seen) to a disgusting £32.50 for 60.. So as always the best advice is buy these from amazon but shop around !

You'll find it hard to beat the cleaning power of Finish Quantum. I love to bring my dishes out of the dishwasher all sparkly and clean. Finish Quantum allows me to do just that and that makes me very happy :)

The tablets are self-dissolving which basically means they are not individually wrapped in plastic, the tablets have a rubbery coating which dissolve during the dishwasher cycle.. I've always used Finish Dishwasher tablets and have always have great results. Dishes are squeaky clean and glasses come out sparkling, but I don’t think these particular tablets are for me. Yes they do a great job but I’m really not keen on the after smell when you open your dishwasher up.. Maybe it’s the rubber dissolving that causes the smell, maybe it’s the tablets themselves but it does have a unpleasant after smell. Maybe its my dishwasher, but I've used different Finish tablets and its smells fine.. To sum these dishwasher tablets up, it does the job but not keen on the after smell.

Finish Quantum Regular dishwasher tablets are certainly one dishwasher tablet I would be happy to purchase regularly for one main reason they provide clean and dry dishes when used. Before having the chance to try these out I was regularly buying another brand which was hit and miss whether or not all the dishes were either fully washed or soaking wet. Previous to using these I was actually blaming the dishwasher but now I realise it was the dishwasher tablets.. I actually used these on all the washing cycles over a period of time, therefore I as able to use them to wash various stages of dirty dishes. Each time I used these I was always happy with the results. I did not have to use either another cloth of any kind as the dishes were smear free, dirt free and dry as a bone. From the first moment I opened up the dishwasher I was immediately impressed with the results and therefore I am happy to recommend the Finish Quantum Regular as a great working product to anyone who wants great cleaning results all the time from their dishwasher.

Ok, until Fairy got in the act, these were the best, I still love em but the shape and packaging which was there biggest plus now seems out of date and I prefer the fairy equivalent which have a better outer packaging in my book

I've nothing really bad to say about these Finish Quantum tablets, I like the convenience and they do dissolve readily and leave the machine smelling clean. They do a good job of cleaning dirty dishes, but over time glassware still manages to take on a cloudy finish and cutlery can still suffer from spotting even if you are dosing with extra salt and rinse aid. In my experience they are not better and no worse than other brands on the market.

Finish Quantum dishwasher tablets have been around for some time and I have used them frequently and with very good results, by which I mean that items come out of the dishwasher clean and shiny, without any need for a second wash. With reduced packaging (no plastic tray for the tablets inside the bag any more), they also tick the box by generating less waste as well.. The tablets offer maximum convenience by combining detergent with both salt and rinse aid all in one and the dissolvable coating means that there is no individual unwrapping (and thus no additional waste) prior to use.. The tablet needs to be placed in the ‘dry’ dispenser unless you are running a short economy cycle when it should be placed directly on the base of the dishwasher to give it the best opportunity to work.. Although you do not need to add salt to the dishwasher compartment (if you live in a soft water area), advice about exactly what level of water softness is okay varies and I therefore err on the side of caution and fill up as prompted by the dishwasher anyway. I achieve good results without the need to add separate rinse aid.

I bought this because some of my glasses were white because of limescale. There are still as white... Used the good old vinegar to get rid of it, but was hoping this anti limescale product would do it for me.

I had previously ordered some Classic wash tablets - but they proved inadequate. In fact I thought my dishwasher was defective until Amazon sent me two Quantum Max tablets as a trial. and what an experience. They were so much better than the Classic and I didn't have a problem with the dishwasher after all; all my crockery shiny and sparkling.. I immediately ordered this pack of 60 Quantum Max and was of course delighted with the speed of delivery and the quality of the wash.. Gramps

I had trouble with these tablets not dissolving properly when I put them in the cleaning liquid container, so I ended up putting these in the cutlery container and running it on an ECO 50 degree wash.
This is my favourite dishwasher tablet. Everything comes out sparkling clean and the dishwasher keeps clean and fresh too. A good size economical pack as well.

Bought these recently for our dishwasher, they work really well. The pots are clean and shiny, without that rather odd smell that dishwashers sometimes leave or the unpleasant tactile feel that they sometimes impart.. So to summarise, these are good dishwasher tablets, at a reasonable price, that arrived quickly and undamaged. Excellent! Recommended.
Cleaned dishes very well. No signs of grease or debris left on the baking tins . very pleased with the results.

The Quantum tablets are the best, they leave the dishes with a softer feel and the glasses look much brighter. Surprisingly after using other brands in my dishwasher, I had noticed that some times were becoming stained or cloudy. One wash with these and my cups were completely white again, no stains and they felt better. A lot of the cloudy areas on glasses had also disappeared.

We have gone through a pretty full range of dishwasher tablets over the years but these are pretty expensive so had been doubtful about whether they would be that much better. Well, they are. Great results and unless you live in a hard water area (we do) you can also save some money by not needing salt and finishing aid. We don't make that saving fully but we have reduced the usage of both and still get excellent results.

We've been using Finish Quantum Max tablets a while now and the results were great, we decide to buy from Amazon as they were a fair bit cheaper, what we got is a highly suspect product that has ruined some items. We have used Amazon's pack for about two weeks, so roughly 10-12 tablets worth and glasses that have been going in and out of the dishwasher for months suddenly looks as if they have been cleaned with a wire brush, they are totally ruined. Not to mention the residue which we've never had with previous Finish Quantum Max packs.. We are partly to blame however, there was a clear warning which against better judgement I ignored. Many of the tablets were significantly discoloured. The central red ball on many tablets isn't red, and on those that are red, it is very faded. I should never have used them, but I thought perhaps they were still fine, some things do discolour without being defective. We have bought a pack from our nearby supermarket to replace amazon's, to give you an idea of the colour difference I've attached some photos. I realise the pack we bought today is the lemon version, but focus on the central red ball. We were perhaps unlucky, but if you see this discolouration in your pack...DO NOT USE THEM!!!

DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!. The product is out of date (date of manufacturing is 03/05/2017). From the photo attached you can see that the capsule colours are not how they should look- a normal capsule should have white powder and a dark blue liquid colour. These capsules are yellow and light blue. Once I opened the packaging, I was hit with a terrible smell, the capsules themselves are sticky which should not be the case.. I bought these during the pandemic as there weren't any in stores available. What's worse is that this product is not eligible for a return and refund, so I wasted money on a product that is not fit for use.. I would not recommend anyone to buy this! Out of date chemicals can be very dangerous and god knows what it could do to my dishwasher so I can't even use these! You're better off buying this sort of a product in any supermarket store.
Quantum Max results make me smile as they bring a great shine to my pots and pans, unbelievable!. These are at a very good price.

Cleans really well. Although don't put any aluminium in the dishwasher. I put part of my coffee machine in and it ruined the finish. I usually put the dishwasher on at 65 degrees which seems to provide a decent clean. Get's rid of coffee/tea stains on mugs etc. quite efficiently.

These are just the best dishwasher tablets ever. I know they are also the most expensive, but I became tired of finding residue or gunk on my dishes after each cycle. With these, I'm almost guaranteed they come up sparkling clean (with the odd exception), so it's worth the added expense.

Saw these on offer so purchased given they are normally much more expensive in shops. They are very good, nice scent and certainly do the job fully. I've used other tablets where unfortunately everything wasn't clean but no such issues with the Finish Quantum Max tablets.

I always look for bulk buys and compare prices as smaller packs can be so expensive. Finish is my favourite dishwasher cleaner and the Quantum Max is excellent. I will buy again if the price stays competitive.

Finish seems to be the only good dishwasher tablet in our household its just a real shame that they are so expensive to buy. However as the saying goes, you get what you pay for! And it certainly is the case with Finish.

These work really well, so much better than the cheaper ones, and they were an excellent price too when bought using Amazon subscribe and save as we chose 5 items on a 2 monthly recurrence so were able to get the 15% off.

I have just opened this package and to my dismay it has an extremely unpleasant and strong odour and the individual tablets are very soft and and shrunken - I am afraid to use the tablets - the date on the back of the package state N 03 03 17 B3 10:16 C1. I have purchased these from Amazon before and have never seen any like this please advise, thank you.. I have never experienced a problem with Finish Powerball previously no matter how long I have kept the product - I would appreciate advice from Amazon please. Thank you.
I've been using various types of finish tablets for about 18 months and these are their best so far. Dishes so sparkly you'll wonder why you would put up with less sparkle.
does what it needs to cheaper to get on here then at the shops you can pay the same price for a lot less
great bargain buy - -worked well - -dishes very clean - have loved using this product - - sorry when it ran out
I find that these tablets work the best in my dishwasher, having tried a few other brands and other products from Finish. Cleans everything well so I have no complaints.
Everything comes out of the dishwasher clean and shiny after using these tablets.
good quality,Well done washing the dishes, do not leave a damn, leaves a very fresh scent. I recommend
The finish dishwasher tables are out of date from 2016 !!! Poor product and very bad smell!! I don’t recommend this product att all!!!

I was very pleased at the beginning I have now got a quater of a way through the package and the tablets are stuck together and there isn't any way that I can separate them without breaking the individual wrappers. They were kept in a safe dry cupboard where I keep dishwasher salt washing powder etc and they are all in prime condition so I know that the fault was not at this end. I have given one star for the prompt delivery .
Really good tablets, I do not use anything else with them and good results even on quick/low temp washes
washes better than all in 1 max... only it scratches my pyrax.
Pros - dishes lovely and clean, all tablets are stacked nicely in pack saving cupboard space. Cons - none
These clean up really well. I found that my glasses are truly spotless with this product! Thumbs up!!!
After trying a range, these are now our tablets of choice.. Good cleaning, no streaking.. Very well priced.
My washing machine is 16 years old and its all down to Calgon
Finish tablets were past expiry date manufactured in 2017. Before I was told this by Finish I had opened the bag and smell was so strong that I was advised to get medical advise which I did.
Use this all the time and good price
A really nice clean from these tablets. Well worth paying more for.
Packaged well and meet the standards required in a dishwasher tablet
Great bargain, excellent product, and the click and collect from Higher Buxton Post Office worked perfectly - Thanks!
I dont use any other diswasher tabs
It's not quantum mechanics, is it? Finishes the job perfectly.
The product I received was out of date and expired. The tablets were discoloured and provided a poor wash.
Very good on glassware, not so good on any kind of baked/dried on foods.
Great value for a very good quality dishwasher capsules. Will buy again.
Those are the best dishwasher tablets I've used so far. Will not use any others anymore.
Work well, good deal on these. Would buy again.
These were in the special deals that Amazon did, so happy to purchase.
Clean very well in our dishwasher.. Good price when on offer.
The way it is supposed to be
Good product, easy to use and handle and produces effective results
Works like it should, gets dishes very clean and glass sparkles.
We reckon these are the best !
The tablets are oxyidzed when they arrived. Not doing what it says on the tin. Avoid.
Good result, hope the price does not increase
No Dishwasher should be without it..
Great price for an excellent product
Good quality product at a very reasonable price.
Received on time get as always , great price
Best product on the market in my humble opinion.

Terrible, the outer packing does not disolve during the washing cycle so I am being forced to cut the outer plastic with a knife each time. I wouldn't buy these again. worthless product a massive step backwards
Good product at a good price.
Am sure these are the real ones. Used them and everything in the dishwasher is sparkling clean. Very happy with purchase and would buy again.
Does what it says on the packet!
They are dishwasher tablets like any others. What else is there to say

I could not believe how fantastic the Finish Quantum Max Dishwasher Tablets are - 1 use and the difference to my crockery and cutlery is amazing!! we have a big busy household and my dish washer is full to capacity every day especially lots of tea stained mugs - I was so surprised to see everything sparkling perfectly clean whereas with my usual dishwasher tablets I would have to soak my mugs and cutlery in bleach beforehand. Amazing thankyou!!!!
I wouldnt use anything else. Dirt cheap and the best you can buy!
In my opinion Finish is the best for dish washers. Also with this type no need for the rinse aid.
They clean glasses brilliantly, I found with the Fairy tablets they left a strong soapy smell in the dishes whereas the Finish ones don't.
Very good product and is excellent value for money. Thanks
Great products - glasses shine, heavily soiled pans come up clean, dishwasher. smells lovely - recommended totally
I got these under 10p a tablet so bargain.

Dishwasher tablets are just like sports officials - if they`re doing their job, you don`t really notice them. Nothing has come out of the dishwasher anything other than gleaming and streak-free since I`ve used these, seems like I`ve used lee rinse aid and salt, and the inside of the dishwasher looks shinier, so what`s not to like (other than them being quite expensive)?
Love them! No rinse aid, no salt but a superior wash each time. Where have they been all my life?
No streaky film left on the glass and sparkling dishes.. No messy chalky stuff to deal with, nor any wrappers to faff around with.

In relation to Quantum Max tablets: The tablets cleaning ability is fantastic, don't get me wrong, but the dissolving 'casing' unfortunately causes the tablets to stick together. Because they are liquid inside, ripping or cutting them open means the gel leaks out everywhere. With only varieties of Finish tablets that I have tried, this has not happened.
Excellent product dishes clean and sparkling, excellent service and value

wir empfinden die reinigungsleistung als mindestens genauso gut wie bei der konventionellen konkurrenz.. die inhaltsstoffe sind sicherlich besser als man sie bei diversen anderen anbietern findet.. natürlich darf man sich auch hier nicht blenden lassen.. die auflösbare plastikhülle hinterlässt sicherlich dennoch beispielsweise mikroplastikspuren, welches nicht sonderlich ökofreundlich ist.. wer will kann die hülle ja aber auch entfernen.. preislich sind die tabs natürlich deutlich teurer als viele andere mitbewerber. hier muss jeder selbst entscheiden, ob es dies einem wert ist.. wir sind jedenfalls mehr als zufrieden.
Using for many years this product: clean dishes, no smell, no residue
Dobry produkt w dobrej cenie. Bardzo szybka dostawa pod same drzwi.
Geschirrspültabs sie tun was sie sollen, passt

Die Tabs reinigen zuverlässig. Ich bin sehr zufrieden damit. Einen Stern ziehe ich ab, da jeder Tab in Plastik verpackt ist, welcher zwar nicht ausgepackt werden muss, da dieses sich auflöst beim Spühlgang, das geht sicherlich auch phne die Plastikverpackung. Ansonsten klare Weiterempfehlung von mir.

I never thought I would say it, but the newer product with the gimmicky red ball actually does clean our dishes better. This huge box was nevertheless a great value.. Each tablet is individually wrapped in a plastic pouch, so if your hands are wet, these are a hassle to unwrap and load.
Bei der letzten Bestellung waren fast alle kaputt. Diesmal sind die ganz. Geschirr und Gläser werden sauber ohne Streifen.
The traditional wash tablet suits our system best. The tablets which doesn't require unwrapping clogs up the drainiage system for the plastic doesn't totally dissolve.
cleans dishes well and no residue on plates etc. good price

I buy these basic dishwasher tablets because I have a water softener installed in my house. Therefore with a separate bottle of rinse aid I have everything I need to get my dishes clean in the dishwasher. I bought these via Amazon because my local Iceland didn't have any and it was easier to go to Amazon during the week before Christmas rather than brave a walk around the local shops. This delivery did take about 12 days but Christmas and New Year were in between. I still had a few tablets left in my old box so didn't mind waiting for my delivery

Gute Tabs, machen ordentlich sauber.. Habe sie im Angeboz gekauft.. Fadurch waren sie vom Preis her günstiger als die Anderen aus dem Niedrigpreissektor.. Bin rundum zufrieden und kann sie euch ans Herz legen.. Meine volle Empfehlung
Excellent product as usual with good price.
Lieferung kam wie gewünscht und bietet lange Vorrat. Das Produkt nutze ich schon länger und bin sehr zufrieden.

Wir haben neben den Spülmaschinentabs auch Klarspüler und Salz von Finish geordert. Die Lieferung erfolgte vollständig und unbeschädigt.. Die Tabs werden in einer großen und recht schweren Kartonage geliefert. Darin befinden sich 6 Einzelpackungen mit je 32 Tabs, in Summe 192 Tabs. Der Inhalt der Lieferung sollte einige Monate reichen, trotz vier Personen-Haushalt und täglichem Betrieb. Jedes Tab ist einzeln in einer Folie verpackt. Die Dosierung ist extrem einfach, bei jeder Reinigung gehört ein Tab in die Maschine. Die Tabs sorgen für ein sauberes und glänzendes Geschirr, auch im sparsamen und zeitintensiven Öko-Modus.. In Summe solide Geschirrspültabs mit gutem Ergebnis - mit 192 Stück genug für einige Monate.

Ist schon angenehm, Tabletten zur Spülmaschine zum selben Preis wie in der Drogerie zur Tür geliefert zu bekommen.. Wir verwenden nur die "Classic" Tabletten, die machen ihren Job auch sehr gut! Mit 192 Stück ist man für ein halbes Jahr gut versorgt.
bin mit dem spülergebnis zufrieden. sehr schöner glanz.
Für die Spühlmaschiene geeignet Geschirr wird sauber
I have used these for years. I’m sure there are now better ones but I find these wash well
Zum Schnäppchen bekommen , leider sehr lange Lieferzeit sonst aber alles super
Very good value for money not been used yet.
Wir Benutzen schon Jahrelang Finish Powerball und sind sehr zufrieden mit dem Produkt. Und man muss die Folie natürlich Entfernen sie ist nicht Wasserlöslich.
Great deal, but not the best cleaning I have ever used. But the cost more than makes up for that!
Super item So easy to use.Lovely big quantity to last a while .Even a great very sturdy box to keep them in and the big plus a very good make at such a reasonable price.Thanx
Zudem unschlagbar im Preis-Leistungsverhältnis hier bei/auf Amazon!. Besser geht's nicht, inkl. der Geschirrreinigung! 👍
Zapach raczej neutralny, niezbyt intensywny. Myje i nabłyszcza prawidłowo. Naczynia są czyste.
Für meine Spülmaschine die besten Tabs
Das Geschirr ist sehr sauber und riecht gut.

Bevor ich diese Tabs in Verwendung hatte, habe ich sowohl Finish Quantum als auch Finish All-in-One ohne extra Klarspühler verwendet.. Aufgrund des geringeren Preises habe ich diese Tabs in Verbindung mit einem Somat-Klarspüler ausprobiert. Das Ergebnis hat mich überrascht: Das Geschirr war gefühlt etwas sauberer und auch schneller trocken. Inzwischen habe ich auch den Klarspühler von Finsh ausprobiert, dieser ist meiner Meinung nach absolut gleichwertig wie der von Somat.. Also auch wenn die oben genannten Vorteile nur eingebildet sein mögen, bleibt immer noch der erheblische Preisunterschied, welcher ausschlaggebend dafür ist, dass ich dieses Produkt weiter verwenden werde, sowie ich das mittlerweile schon seit über einem Jahr mache.. Fazit:. Besser dieses Produkt in Verbindung mit einem hochwertigen Klarspühler verwenden und bares Geld, bei mindestens gleichwertigem Erbebnis, sparen.

At this price its worth paying a fraction more and getting branded. Even though this company makes most of the own brand tablets with different packaging the couple of extra ingredients that Finish has leaves your dishes properly clean and streak free.
Clean the dishes really well, it's nice to have some that aren't lemon scented! Why must most dishwasher tablets be lemon scented, I cant stand it!
tablets are not shrink wrapped in plastic which can result in dish washer blockage problems
Macht was es soll.Das Geschirr ist einwandfrei sauber auch Gläser werden nicht blind.Besser als all in one Lösung
unnötig viel Plastik, dass muss einfach nicht sein, daher 3 Sterne

These tabs have lasted ages. It's nice to have the sturdy box. It's a shame that each tab is individually wrapped but dropping a wet hand into the box can ruin so many tabs so I can see the point. I would give five stars if the individual wrappings were recyclable. Great value for money though.

Ich kaufe die Tabs immer hier im Angebot und dann in einer großen Menge. So habe ich eigentlich immer so um 1 Jahr Ruhe.. Die Tabs werden auch von unserem Spülmaschine Hersteller empfohlen und wir nutzen sie schon immer.. Die Tabs lösen sich super auf und das Ergebnis ist immer wieder, Tag für Tag richtig schön sauber. So wie man es sich auch wünscht. Wir bzw. Meine Frau hat zwischenzeitlich mal so billige Tabs probiert und die sind dann nach 2 Versuchen im Müll gelandet. Dann lieber hier im Angebot gönnen.. Ich gebe gerne 5 Sterne und hoffe auch das ich Ihnen ein wenig weiter helfen konnte.
Work OK but I think I prefer gel Fairy or others

Im Gegensatz zu den anderen Kuäfern bin ich mit dem Produkt sehr zufrieden. Mein Geschirr glänzt und ist sauber. Die tabs, die ich bis jetzt öffnete, waren ohne Mängel un der Preis für soviele Tabs ist echt sehr günstig.. Also wer einen günstigen Vorrat haben möchte dem empfehle ich den Kauf.. Das Prdukt kam auch schnell und gut verpackt bei mit an. Wir sind schon bei der Nutzung der 2 Packung.
Cleans my dishes, which is to be expected.
Hab schon mehrere Spültabs ausprobiert, aber finish verträgt meine Spülmaschine am Besten. Damit ist nur 1 Waschgang nötig. Benutze die Tabs auch für die Waschmaschine zum Reinigen

As a first time dishwasher owner I was unsure which tablets to buy. After ordering these dishwasher tablets I realised I had only bought the "classic" version and as I looked into it more I saw that there are improved versions of this product. So when I received the item I didn't have the highest of hopes.. I paired it with the "Finish Rince Aid" and turned the dishwasher on expecting to have to rewash the dishes.. When I opened the dishwasher door, all my dishes were shining and sparkling. They didn't smell funny and they were all thoroughly cleaned.. All in all I am very pleased with this product and would buy again! Also they come with so many tablets so will last a long time! Highly recommended.

Wir haben die All-in-1-Tabletten schon früher verwendet, aber bei diesem Kauf haben wir das gesamte Geschirr verschmutzt und ruiniert. Es war total fleckig und sogar schmutzig, da die Tabletten offensichtlich eine Veränderung in der Formel haben und nicht die gleiche Wirkung haben.. Wir haben versucht, Klarspüler hinzuzufügen, aber das Geschirr ist immer noch fleckig und fühlt sich rau an. Ich habe auch versucht, die Maschine zu reinigen (weil ich dachte, es könnte ein Problem mit dem Gerät sein), aber nichts hat sich geändert.. Die Qualität der Tabletten, die sie uns geschickt haben, ist definitiv nicht gut, was mich wütend macht, weil wir 192 Tabletten im Vertrauen darauf gekauft haben, dass die Qualität die gleiche wie immer sein würde.
Sehr gute Produkte. Damit bin zufrieden

Ich zähle schon seit längerem auf Spülmaschinen-Tabs von Finish - in verschiedenen Varianten. Diese hier haben ein unschlagbares Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis. Reinigungskraft optimal. Geruch top. Einziges Manko sind die einzeln verpackten Tabs mit relativ viel Plastik. Sollte in der heutigen Zeit besser möglich sein.

These tables leave a terrible white film on my dishes, I thought it might be because they don’t dissolve fully, but I tried dissolving them before starting the load and still everything was covered in white. Too bad I started using them after months or I would have returned them, please buy something else
Ich bin der Meinung bei fünf Sternen ist alles gesagt.
Ab und zu ist das Reinigungsbild verbesserungsbedürftig

Finish ist gewiss eines der besten, wirksamsten Mittel für eine Spülmaschine.. Ich wollte eigentlich die Tabs, die man, weil schon jeweils mit dünner Folie ummantelt, einfach. so in die Maschine legt. Diese Variante hier erfordert das Auspacken jedes einzelnen Tabs, bevor es. losgehen kann.. Man muss Finish zugute halten, das Auspacken aus der Hülle geschieht viel schneller, als bei Mitbewerbsprodukten! Dennoch more Convenience would be appreciated!!

Unglaublich aber wahr. Früher wollte ich nicht glauben dass es bei Spültabs Unterschiede gibt. Bei diesen hier bleibt unser Geschirr dreckig. Gläser werden nie sauber, und überall hängt noch was.. Normalerweise haben wir immer Somat genommen, doch dieses Mal war es im Spar Abo nicht mehr verfügbar?!. Zum Glück diese Tabs auf Amazon gekauft. Perfekt wie immer mit dem Umgang der Kunden. Eine retoure war möglich.. Wir bleiben nun bei somat. Und definitiv bei Amazon;)
My family wants them for Christmas!! Live it

Thess are not tablets with the power ball on as the picture suggests. They have just a plain tablet on the front of the box and inside. Bit naughty that the photo has the power ball on as that's why we bought them.
I've got a standing repeat order for this with Amazon and it is the most convenient and cost effective way to buy dishwasher tablets and keep the supply flowing.

Ich nutze die Finish Classic Tabs schon gefühlt ewig und bin sehr zufrieden. Das Geschirr wird sauber und die Maschine riecht angenehm frisch. Da wir nun schon seit über 8 Jahren die gleiche Spulmaschine haben und bisher nichts defekt ist, können die Tabs so schlecht nicht sein... ;-)
Die besten Tabs bislang. Rundum zufrieden. Ich bin umgestiegen, weil mir aufgefallen ist, dass gummierte Deckel teilweise unangenehm riechen nach dem Spülgang. Mit diesen Tabs ist alles bestens.

Also das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis ist prima. Ich hätte mir aber nicht 6 einzelne Packungen mit noch einer Umverpackung gewünscht, das macht etwas viel Müll.. Preislich aber unschlagbar. Damit wird alles sauber, das ist mir wichtig.

Great value for money and came undamaged.Used for 1st time last night and very satisfied with result.Will probably order again soon.

Das GIGAPack mit 192 Stück haben wir im Zuge der Black Friday Woche gekauft da wir Produkte von Finish schon seit Jahrzehnten benutzen. Its finish, nothing more or less than id expect, they clean my dishes, good value for amount.

Absolutely awful, they do not work, everything in the dishwasher is left with what looks like chalk all over it. I have previously bought this product multiple times and not had a problem until now. I thought my dishwasher was broken and was going to replace it but as a last resort I thought I would test a dishwasher tablet from another new pack and that worked fine so the problem is with these tablets, not my dishwasher. With the new pack my dishwasher is back to full working order.. The seller is refusing to refund me because I have part used the pack and insists there is not issue however the product is not fit for intended purpose as it does not work and I’ve had to spend more money replacing them.

Far cheaper than in my local supermarket and the only brand/non-brand dishwasher tablet that doesn’t leave a residue in my dishwasher.. I’m not sure if this is because I live in a hard water area. But great to buy in bulk and forget about them for six/eight weeks (roughly) until I need more.

Dreadful, useless, awe-none, no term is bad enough! We run a small guesthouse for 10 years, so have about 5 times normal experience with dishwasher tablets (ie. 50 year-equivalents). Even pound-shop own brand are better. We only have these Finish tabs when the wholesaler supplies them instead of fairy platinum (which are excellent!). First wash - everything comes out misty, gritty and powdery-feeling and we spend ages trying to rinse and rub off these deposits. Often, even very loosely adhered food remains also (eg. Sliced onion! - never happens with Fairy). After 2 or 3 washes, our dishwasher (various models over 10 years) starts clogging up with hard, chalky deposits in the washer jets and uses about 10 times as much dishwasher salt as normal. It takes 1 or 2 washes using Fairy Platinum to put things right and remove the nasty surface film produced by Finish tablets. I would not use finish tablets to wash a monkey ( it would end up so stiff it would fall out of a tree!) I would suggest Finish manufacturers should try reformulating with a decent rinse-aid and less bulking agent.

okay for a while then filters clog up with gunk, white deposit on pots and pans and poor cleaning of food such as whisked egg on pyrex.. Swapped to another Finish product and problem gone!. 2yr old machine working fine until partway through one of 2 boxes of Classic tablets. Hard water area, but use separate salt and rinse aid anyway.
Terrible compared to the finish max tablets. They left a powdery residue over everything.

The fact that anyone would give this product more than one star makes me really suspicious. I would give it zero if this was an option. Dishwasher had to be totally cleaned as it was covered in white stuff also, but never got as clean as it was before. I spent two weeks scrubbing dishes with all sorts of products to remove the horrible white staining (horrible in touch also), it would come off few of the dishes but not the others. I was already coming to terms with the fact that I had to splash out for new dishes but I found out that lemon juice should help and it did. NEVER AGAIN!

The Finish All in One Dishwasher Tablets are a solid choice for anyone in need of high-quality dishwasher tablets. The tablets are very effective at cleaning dishes, as they contain a powerful formula that removes dirt, grime, and food particles from dishes and glasses. They are also very easy to use, as they come in a convenient tablet form that can be placed directly in the dishwasher.. However, the Finish All in One Dishwasher Tablets are a bit on the expensive side compared to some other dishwasher tablet options on the market. They also have a strong chemical smell that may not be to everyone's liking.. Overall, the Finish All in One Dishwasher Tablets are a solid choice for those in need of high-quality dishwasher tablets. They are effective at cleaning dishes and are easy to use. However, they may be a bit expensive and have a strong chemical smell for some users.

Bought from Amazon because it was a good price and because I was under "House arrest" (elderly person) due to the pandemic and had no-one to go to the shops for me. I've been very pleased with it. Perhaps the people who have trouble with them aren't running a d/washer cleaner often enough. I run mine through the cleaner once a week. If I've run out of proper d/washer cleaner I run two Finish washing-up tabs though on the hottest wash and it does the trick but the proper d/washer cleaner is better in the long run. As for only using the d'washer once a week - I live alone and I fill the machine at least once a day.. I don't understand the reference to the individual "Finish" tabs being wrapped. These have a sealed cover which dissolves in the machine - you don't need to take it off.

These are great value (dishwasher tablets seem to be ridicuously expensive for some reason!) and work fine in terms of cleaning dishes as far as I can tell, however they don't always seem to "break down" properly during a dishwasher cycle compared to gel tabs - sometimes you can get a "clump" of damp powder still left in the dishwasher. For that reason I can't really recommend them completely, the gel tabs do work better since they break down much more easily in the water.

I've wrote this review in light of other reviews I read, firstly you do not remove the tablet from the plastic wrapper, it goes in "as is" and the plastic wrapper dissolves; for confirmation it does actually say this on the packet.. Secondly, these tablets shift the most stubborn baked on food on our, pans, plates, trays etc, if these tablets are not working for you I suggest one of the following is the problem and not the tablet itself. Either your dishwasher jets are clogged, your not using a high enough temperature setting, your using an "eco" mode of some kind, your dishwasher doesn't have an "A" cleaning rating, or it is just very old and maybe needs replacing.. I replace the dishwasher about every five years, I've had various dishwasher brands and I've never had one duff finish tablet, and the dishwasher is on around 2 to 3 times a day.

These are a genuine Finish product (I know some customers are understandably concerned about fakes) and do a good job. I have tried loads of different tablets over the years, but I keep coming back to Finish. I have realised that cheaper brands are just false economy. One tablet of Finish gets everything shiny clean even on the quick wash. Other brands just don't deal with stuck on foods, or they leave glasses with a film. Never Been Cleaner.. other tablets leave an unseen residue on the dishes.. if you lick a plate after certain tablets have been used, you can taste the unseen residue on the finished dishes.. with these tablets there is absolutely no taste of residue and they are sparkling.. i will never buy a different tablet ever again.
I always buy finish for my dishwasher. I have tried many other products, but these give me the best results.

Product arrived super quick and are doing me proud. THE ONLY PROBLEM IS the developers at Finish (the diamond standard) have taken away x2 of the x14 quantum promises on the back of the pack. I've lost the guarantee of spot-free glasses, I've lost the guarantee of the powder and gel working in unison to create a better clean, but most worryingly, I've lost my ability to go to sleep at night without thinking about my crockery and whether or not I've placed it in the right hands. Other than that really happy with the product and service. Photo 1 product comparison. Photo 2 New product (x12). Photo 3 Old product (x14)

Perfect, even the most soiled pans and casserole dishes come clean on one wash. I must admit I always use the intensive program irrespective of what I am washing but that way everything is always cleaned first time and I don't have to do a re-wash. I have tried cheaper tablets including the ones from Finish and Fairy but Quantum is easily the best performing of all of these. Even though I wash on intensive my glassware is the best - no white streaks you can't remove - no scratches or dullness - no petrol type colours - just crystal clear glass. I even put in my non-stick. Five stars.

It's the only cleaner I've found that removes all the stains from my mugs - I drink black coffee and mostly tea without milk which does leave a mess in the mug, but this tablet leaves them really white again. Also, my teaspoons are shiny again as they were when I bought them. As I said, not the cheapest but as far as I'm concerned, the best and worth the expense.

I stopped using Finish tablets as I found they didn't give a clean sparkle. I bought these on offer and I'm pleased that the Quantum Max tabs give far better results than other tabs in the Finish range.. I tried these with a wash which included a cermamic dish with some oven cooked sauce stuck to it, along with a greasy roasting dish. Both washed clean, first time and look better than they did pre wash. The smell post wash from the machine isn't overpowering and I'll be happy to buy the max tabs again.
a bit expensive, but in lieu of a supermarket delivery acceptable price

I like these dishwasher tablets. They clean a lot better than the fairy tablets that I've tried as well as some own brand ones. These also seem to work better than the standard finish tablets. My dishes normally come out clean and very occasionally there's a bit of the gel stuff left but not enough to cause any problems!

I always buy these tablets, they are great value and clean a lot better than other brands at a similar price. Some heavily soiled items ( baking trays ) may require soaking before they are washed but it has no problems cleaning plates and bowls even the next day. I found that they also give a good shine to glasses compared to other dishwasher tablets that leave them with water marks.
By far the best dishwasher tablets. Much better than Fairy

The tablets often failed to fully dissolve even at the highest temperature wash, this meant I would need to rewash the dishes.. I do like the fact there is no fragrance so food does not taste of the wash tablets.. Other tablets in the 'Finish' range performed better and is more cost effective
Love this product. It clean very well but sometimes I still find some of the soap on my glasses. I dont know if the issue comes from my dish washer or from the product itself.
Bought at the beginning of the Coronavirus when people had panic bought therefore the price of this product was extortionate

You sometimes pay over the odds for a brand name, but this value pack is just that - good value - and as it was purchased on the Subscribe and Save promotion, then it was an even better deal.. Crockery does appear to be cleaner using these, so will look to purchase again

Having always used Finish Quantum this is THE dishwasher tablet. I’ve even tried Fairy but it does not patch the performance of the Quantum tablet. Very rarely do dishes or cutlery come out dirty. If they do, then the dishwasher is overcrowded!

I have used these dishwasher tablets for quite a while, and have ordered them a few times. These tablets give consistently good results cleaning my crockery. Will continue to use them, and will be ordering again before too long.

This product is in my opinion wort the few extra quid. I can tell the difference and my dishes are no longer coated with a fine salt after the washer is done. 80 washes is also a good amount for the price. I would definitely recommend this product.

Apart from not being the 'Max' as advertised I have been very disappointed with the results with them not removing all stains and leaving glasses dull and cutlery tarnished. Will be going back to Fairy Platinum tablets in the future.
Not much you can rave about when it comes to dishy washy tabs lol.. They work well though, lol, i'd buy again.
Yeah the ad says they are good, but.......They are good!! They clean the pots well and don’t leave much residue even with the tough stuff (like baked on pasta bakes). Thanks Finish!!
It makes the dishes clean. Can't complain.
I always used this tablet for my Bosch dishwasher and it’s giving me a best result

First class product - actually leaves the glasses shinier than they were before and cleans everything the best of any product I have found. Even brings some of the 'cloudy' glasses back clear! Expensive but worth it.
The product is excellent. Have used it for years.
Great price for the quantity, clean brilliant compared to cheaper alternatives and even the cheaper ones within the vanish line

its a bit of nuisance as the dispenser won't dispense them if they are damp as they become sticky and not properly dispensed, which ends up with the cleaning not that good but they are really good if I throw them in the bottom of the dishwasher - then they do their job.
The only thing I don't particularly like is the smell of chemicals when I open the dishwasher door. But it's definitely the best product used so far.
I've tried a few different tablets before settling on Quantum Max. Nothing cleans the contents of the dishwasher better. Glassware in particular comes out with an added shine.

i bought these as i am fed up with uncleaned items in my dishwasher and they DO THE JOB. on the downside i also bought some ordinary tables from ALDI and well, they did exactly the same job for a quarter of the price. so yes they are good, they are over priced though
Best dishwasher tablets I've used, even left the dishwasher sparkling clean. No marks or residue on anything, glasses are left shining.

I might love the keen pricing of the 80 pack, but it makes it bit of a joke of the saving made when you have to pick out the broken capsules from the packet when you open it. Just not quite enough broken capsules make it cost effective to send them back, either.

next day delivery and works perfect clean dishes every time.

I'm very impressed in these tablets, as mentioned in earlier posts these actually clean off the coffee and tea stains that have blighted the bottom of many of our cups and mugs. We always used supermarket own brand tablets previously but the difference is very noticeable. Glasses actually gleam now!. More expensive? Yes, however Amazon do seem to have regular offers on a specific size which does reduce the difference in price.

Brilliant tablets, get my pots clean first time every time, had picked up some inferior ones in a pinch after having these and regretted it after the first wash. Not much more epensive than supermarkets own from amazon.

Only buy these tablets when on special offer as I'm not convinced they do a better job than the regular ones, but they do clean the dishes just the same. Ordered using my new Dash button, but with 80 tabs in a pack, it will be a while until I press the button again!

Dishes and glasses come out of the dishwasher sparkling, really noticeable on wine glasses etc. Doesn't seem to be a need for additional washes as it gets of tough dried in foods.
