I've used the lemon ones before and this has been a bit of a pain because you're having to rinse everything before using it or it tastes of lemon.

Ich kann nur sagen, dass diese Tabs alles machen, was ich erwarte: sauberes Geschirr, ohne die Umwelt mehr als nötig zu belasten.. Es sind zwar immer einige Tabs zerbrochen, aber da sie in der Folie in die Maschine kommen ist das total egal; man spart sich das Auspacken und den Müll :). Ich sehe derzeit keinen Grund, das Produkt zu wechseln

I have tried so many eco dishwasher tablets and was always disappointed. Then we went to Centre Parc, where Claro tablets were provided in our Villa. We have been using them for 3 years, they work very well. The wrap disolves completely and no heavy fragrance. The only downside is the tablets break easily but they remain in the wrap so are still usable.

Claro dishwasher tablets are our absolute favourite. Having used various expensive 'regular' tablets available in UK supermarkets we wanted to switch to eco-tablets both for nature's and our own health's sake (we don't like the idea of chemicals left on our dishes). The tablets from the UK's mainstream eco brand are terrible, and so are other UK-sold eco brands unfortunately, so after doing a lot of research we tried Claro all-in-one tablets with great results. Due to availability issues this past year we have been using the Claro classic tablets combined with the salt and rinse-aid and the results are sparkling. We only use Claro tablets now, nothing else compares performance-wise.

im not an expert so its hard to tell how much more 'nice' this manufacturer is compared to the supermarket brands, but i mean the packaging is green and they're austrian, and no one who is austrian can be bad!
I used this product for a dishwasher and found that my dishes, etc were amazingly clean and my dishwasher smelt clean and fresh.

I nearly didn’t buy these because I thought they were a bit expensive but then decided to give them a try. I’m very pleased I did. The tablets are efficient at getting the dirty dishes sparkling clean . They are very reliable. I’m two thirds through the box of tablets and each time the dishes have come out of the washer, they were beautifully clean. No smears just gleaming. The tablets have dissolvable wrappers which have always worked. The bonus is, if course, the tablets are phosphate free and eco friendly. I would recommend these dishwasher tablets.
Pop it in the dishwasher and it cleans them

I first came across the Claro brand when staying in a Forest Holidays lodge, they were part of the little cleaning kit they leave for your stay. Prior to these I had tried a couple of more well-known eco-brand tablets in an effort to be a little more planet-friendly, but they'd never really matched up to my favourite Fairy tablets.. Didn't expect any different from my holiday pack, but took them home to use and found them to be very good. Glasses were streak-free and shiny, in fact since using these Claro tablets regularly, I feel that the inevitable clouding process that eventually occurs with glassware has slowed down a lot. I think they wash as well, if not better than Fairy. 100 pack on Amazon is cheaper than what I usually pay for 70 Fairy tablets (which I always buy when on offer, so never full price) and is very good value for an eco-friendly product. Highly recommend giving them a try.

Was very excited to get my hands on this product, as it had been raved about on eco/vegan/ethical household websites. That being said, I would’ve expected that the tablets weren’t in a big plastic bag inside the box (unbagged ideally, but a paper or compostable bag would’ve been a better alternative). I would’ve also liked if there was at least some English on the box (I understand it’s a predominately foreign brand - but it’d be nice to be able to read info/ingredients/instructions in English if the product is being sold to/in the UK. Also, on one of my 2 uses of the product thus far, the dissolvable wrapper on the tablet didn’t dissolve fully and so I was left with a half-dissolved tablet in the bottom of my dishwasher and very streaked/spotted dishes and cutlery.

I like these dishwasher tabs. They’re economical and environmentally friendly and do the job. There are usually quite a lot of smashed ones in the box but I use these in the washing machine for my t towels and dish clothes. Also, they don’t leave the plastic baby spoons and cups smelling ‘perfumey’ unlike the posh branded ones like fairy.

Excellent quality eco-friendly dishwasher tablets. Have left glasses, plates and cutlery sparkling with no left over residue. Much better than previous ecover brand I was using. I will stick with these from now on. Leave the wrapper on the individual tablets as it is water disolvable and put straight into dishwasher not sure why all of the individually wrappes tablets are stored inside large plastic bag and then out into a cardboard box but I have removed the large plastic bag and decanted them into the cardboard box and remove 1 at a time as needed. Please stop with this excess plastic packaging, the box is fine and an extra plastic bag is not needed.

Been using these for a couple of years as I struggle to find affordable eco friendly dish washer tablets but, wth has happened to these. I’m regularly having to wash items by hand as there is residue/dirt left in items. I know it’s not my dishwasher. Pity

I couldn't find Ecover dishwasher tabs on offer when I ran out so took a punt on these as they looked better value. They work well and I've had no issues with cleaning performance vs Ecover. It's a shame there are no English instructions on the packaging as I've nearly finshed a box and now see from Amazon reviews that you can leave the wrappers on and they dissolve in the dishwasher.

Bought a box of 100 as a trial and have now subscribed to a delivery every 3 months. I get effective cleaning, no streaks, seemingly less cloudiness on glasses. Very little fragrance - I once tried some Fairy lemon tablets once and the lemon scent was overpowering! Ecover tablets are much more expensive.. I used to use Finish Powerball and found they left a gritty residue sometimes. I no longer get this.. Most importantly for me - no phosphates & everything's still clean.

I’ve used this product for several months now and am very happy with it.. I live in a hard water area and it seems to cope well with this.. Dishes are clean and glasses too.. Requires a separate rinse aid.. A little expensive but worth the additional money as it’s eco-friendly.. Bottom line - I would purchase again.

I have been using these for over a year now and will not change brands. I have tried most brands and these just work well for us. We have a water softener so have completely soft water to the dishwasher which has led to problems with other brands.. I use a quarter of a tablet per load and these tablets clean everything faultlessly. They also last us ages!. I am not sure how they fare in unsoftened water households, but for us they are brilliant.
These are tablets that are supposedly not as detrimental to waterways as normal ones. I've not had issues with dishes and cutlery coming out of the dishwasher dirty, so they do work.

Very impressed - these have done the job even better than the regular tablets I usually use from the supermarket. Everything came out sparkling (even a greasy baking tray).. Plastic free, eco, and cheaper than the regular ones, I totally recommend them.. Packaging doesn’t have info in English so just make sure you read the info on here / online. The main thing to know is that the individual wrappers are dissolvable so you don’t need to take them off.

I began some years back using Ecover tablets but they were disappointing. Nothing seemed to be really clean and cups and mugs remained with stains.. I then moved onto Finish Brand which does an excellent job at cleaning. Unfortunately I am not ok with chemicals and I found the smell and sometimes the taste residue on the plates and mugs was unpleasant. I hated putting the tabs in the machine because of the strong smell.. Now I have moved onto to Claro I am finding they do clean very well. Mugs and cups are stain free and the dishes and plates are also clean.. So for me this is the idal product.. It does the job, is phosphate free and does not carry a strong artificial chemical taste and smell.

We have been using eco detergents in our dishwasher since day one with very poor results we actually thought our dishwasher was broken until my mother persuaded me to try some Fairy (non eco) wow what a difference! but before I brought something non eco I decided to do some research and see if there was an eco product that works and I found Claro, THIS PRODUCT IS AWESOME! it works as well as Fairy and blows every other Eco detergent out of the water. The instructions are in German but no problem, pop a tablet in its wrapper in the dishwasher and off you go.. 3 months later....... I'm still super happy with this product and back to buy more.

As a product, these dishwasher tablets are great. They work really well, get things clean and do not leave a residue on glasses, even on a quick wash.. The reason why I have given them three stars is due to the packaging. The company describes themselves as eco-friendly, and I chose them as an alternative to Ecover who individually wrap their tablets in plastic. Claro tablets come in a dissolvable wrapper, which seemed like a great alternative. Unfortunately, on opening the box, I discovered that the tablets come in a plastic bag within the box. There is absolutely no need to put them in wrappers, and then in a plastic bag, and then in a cardboard box.. Looks like my quest for plastic-free dishwasher tablets continues!

Highly recommend! Eco friendly & as a bonus it actually does what it claims!! Sparkling clean dishes /glasses every time! Even works wonderfully when I’ve forgotten to switch the dishwasher on after loading & then having food dried on over night!!. no residue no messing around with rinse aid etc & great value for money, these last me around 3 months so under £6 a month!!

We've been using these for 3 years and they really do a great job cleaning the dishes - and this is coming from someone who has a bad habit of filling the dishwasher to the hilt, which I've found to be a problem for tablets by some other brands (they seem to struggle to clean properly when it's a really full load). No problems with this one at all. We've combined this with a rinse aid we got from the supermarket, but now that we're finishing that bottle, we'll be getting the Claro rinse aid instead (less toxins).

Been using these for a couple of weeks now. Love that they come in dissolving packaging so there is no waste. They do a good job of cleaning our heavily used dishes! I have changed tablets in the past because of smell/taste residue on the dishes, but no issue with these. Very good price for the number of tablets, will definitely buy again.

I love it that these come in individually wrapped dissolvable packets! Sadly they are in a big non-recyclable bag but still saving lots of tiny bits of plastic packaging. They clean everything really well, even on Eco & quick (I have a Bosch dishwasher).

I was using the Fairy tablets, which I didn't like because they left a kind of slightly "greasy film" on all the dishes. It wasn't greasy, it was kind of too smooth, like it would be with oil. I suspected it was leaving some kind of film on the washed dishes. These however, leave no such film. The cleaning power is identical to the Fairy tabs I was using. Dishes all come out nicely. And no worrisome film like with the Fairy tabs. And no phosphate so better for our streams and water treatment facilities.
Excellent, I have a top dish washer so a smaller than free standing, these tablets are excellent as you can half and still get great results

As others have said, these work very well. Some "eco" brands leave deposits on machine and dishes but these do not. We're getting very clean dishes and acceptably-sparkly glassware in lime-heavy Oxfordshire even without a rinse aid or salt (both recommended on the box). For greasy loads I throw a second tablet in but that is more habit from what I've had to do in the past with other brands. Best of all they don't contain any fragrance, unlike the vast majority of automatic dishwashing detergents. Stock up before Brexit!

Made in Austria, an eco friendly dish tab that cleans superbly (no brown residue in tea mugs), also in hard water areas. They are wrapped in a film that dissolves during the dishwasher cycle (unlike Ecover's where every single one is wrapped in regular plastic film!) I use these since years and am thrilled to find them also in the UK.

I am converted! I've been trying to find a more econfriendly way to use my dishwasher and now that I've found these I won't go back to standard commercial tablets. You get a lot more for your money for starters, plus I've found they actually clean better than all the brand names I've used in the past.. The tablets come in wrapping that dissolves in the machine, so no need to unwrap - but be careful of putting damp hands in the box as the tablets will stick together! :)
I bought them for a second time after 8 months of use.. Very good product, I won't be using any other tablets until these are available on the market.
Works well. Vegan. Environmentally friendly. Fair price. Available on subscribe and save so that we never run out and I don't have to remember them on the shopping list. Easy 😀

Had a water softener installed recently and was advised to buy phosphate-free dishwasher detergent. These tablets work very well, just as well as the Fairy ones I've used up until now, though just to be on the safe side I'll continue to wash glassware by hand to prevent any possible clouding. Good price, next-day Prime delivery, does a good job and is kinder to the environment without phosphates or chlorine. The tablet wrapping dissolves, so no need to unwrap. Will be buying again.

These are simply the WORST dishwasher tablets I have ever tried. They leave dishes with stains and oily and uts a horrible experience just unloading the dishwasher since you have to touch unclean dishes. And then wash them by hand in the end... Avoid!!!

Finally a dishwasher tablet that doesn't leave that horrible smell of chemicals. It is wrap in a plastic which doesn't need to be removed as it dissolves during the wash. Strongly recommended them. Since I have started using them I haven't gone back to the commercial non eco tablets.

These are great, far better cleaning than the previous eco brand I was using, they have even cleaned up some cups that had baked in stains from the previous brand. What a shame that Amazon is now showing them as unavailable - anyone found where else to buy them at a reasonable price?. [Edit] Just as suddenly as they were gone, they are back in stock again, excellent news, off to buy more now!

Perfect clean every time, these are not all in one tabs so you will need a rinse aid. They come individually wrapped but the little packets are water soluble so no need to unwrap (take note ecover!).. Packaging is fully in german and Italian but doubt there's much to learn!. Really impressed, hope we can still get them post brexit :) Will definitely buy again and try other Claro products.
I bought this because I wanted dishwasher tablets that were not wrapped individually in plastic. They are in biodegradable film, work really well and good value!

Mediocre tablets at best, but if you want to buy something to make you feel better about not harming the environment then these are the ones to get. Having said that, if you care about the environment, wash by hand, these don't clean your plates and glasses very well - it's kind of a lazy choice to make over a bit of hand scrubbing

Buying dishwasher tabs in the supermarket is, I find, a total nightmare. It’s so difficult to find the best value for money when confounded by special offers, new formula, bigger value packs, etc etc. It seems that the manufacturers are determined to confuse the buyer by introducing multiple ‘offers’ combined with different pack sizes. I need a calculator to work out whether, for example, 48 tabs at x is better value than 60 or 65 at y and z. The unit cost isn’t always clearly marked on the shelf label and as a rule of thumb, I prefer to pay around 15p or 16p per tab.. With that in mind, I also consider what it’s claimed it will do...does it help with limescale control and grease in the machine? How do glasses look after washing; are they streak free and how does it tackle a roast tin? Generally, Fairy and another major brand perform well.I’ve tried less expensive in house brands, but haven’t been impressed.. These tabs do exactly what I want. They’re ‘platinum’ where I usually buy original, so I guess they’re slightly,ore expensive. That aside, these perform really well. A roast pan with some extra stuck on bits of potato and parsnip came out clean and grease free. Glasses sparkle and I’m very pleased with how everything has washed. The machine looks and smells clean. They’re good value all round.

These are a lot more expensive than a no brand German supermarket offers, but for the extra cost I found that they didn’t really do that much more.. Sure, my pots and pans were clean after using these, but then again, they are when I use no brand ones. I still experienced the same cloudiness of glasses as I do with any tablet in a dishwasher. In fact, the only way I’ve found to get a truly sparkling wash is to go back to the good old days and stand at the sink and clean them myself in a bowl!. So these cost more, don’t make that big a difference, in my opinion, and cheaper alternatives can be found.

Must be the new European packaging as when mine turned up it has several foreign languages on the front. Oddly enough not German or French. Other than that it was a very handy bag and the capsules were fine. They did a good job. I won't go so far as saying they did an excellent job as they left some cooked on grime on one of the pans and the glasses definitely didn't come out as shiny as when I use a platinum powerball tab but for the most part they were fine. They are also considerably cheaper as well. I shop around for my tabs and it's not unusual to see the powerball tabs working out at 32p per tab in the premium supermarkets and to find the exact same tablet at 17p a tab on offer in the middle market supermarkets. However these tabs at 14p per tab are the cheapest I've ever seen any tabs so they are a bargain even though they are perhaps not as good as the powerball tabs.

As far as dishwasher tablet go, I think these are probably the best that are available. They always seem to be very reliable in cleaning the dishes (unless the dirt is really burnt on, in which case, it may need a few runs through the dishwasher). They are also exceptionally easy to use, especially as the tablets don't need to be unwrapped before loading into the dishwasher i.e. the coating dissolves in the dishwasher.. Whilst these are described as being lemon scented, I have to admit that I don't notice a huge lemon scent coming from the dishwasher when the wash had finished and whatever your opinions about that might be, I can't say that I have a strong preference either way.. On the value for money aspect, the current price does seem to be a bit expensive however, the price on Amazon (and in other retailers) does tend to jump about a bit and so if you can pick them up for around 10-12p a tablet, I wouldn't buy anything else.
Fairy is our regular choice when it comes to dishwasher tablets, although it is usually the

The Fairy brand is the one I always turn to for dishwasher tablets, for years I’ve been disappointed when trying other brands and always end up returning to Fairy even though they’re not the cheapest. Normally I have been getting the Platinum tablets, which are at time of writing 16% more expensive than these ones, to get the ‘top’ results. However, having been given the opportunity to try these, I’m thinking that from now on I might save myself a few pennies and get these lemon ones instead, because the results do seem to be just as good.. They lack the third swirl on top, and the description is missing “grease-cleaning action for the dishwasher” which the Platinum tablets have, but the result on baking trays that have been used for meat seems just as good. Our dishwasher’s a bit past it so no tablet is going to work miracles but the results we get out of this are perfectly satisfying.. The lemon scent is, to my nose, the same as the Platinum scent- quite pleasant, and not too much of that artificial bleachy-lemon scent that some cleaning products have.. Dishwasher tablets are one of those items where the prices seem to be changing constantly, and there’s always special offers on some but not on others, so if price is your main concern and you think all these tablets work the same, then it’s usually worth shopping around to find which product’s currently on offer. But if you’re looking for a big pack of reliable everyday dishwasher tablets that will keep you going for months, this is a reliable choice.
These are pretty effective dishwasher tabs all considered but on occasion I have managed to buy the Fairy Platinum ones for about 10 pence each (£7 for 70)

We recently bought a replacement dishwasher and it really wasn't getting things as clean as the old machine (15 year-old Bosch) and the plastics were always wet. Having used Finish tablets for years I read some reviews that suggested they weren't what they used to be.. These Fairy original tablets do a very good job; the dishes / glasses etc are spotless and the plastics (children's plates and cups) are almost always dry ... I wonder if it's something to do with these tablets breaking down surface tension?. Anyway I'll be sticking with these for the foreseeable future.

I use these on lighter loads when platinum ones arent really needed ,it saves some money that way a the dishes are just as clean as the heavily soiled ones that I use the platinum on, The capsules are usually much cheaper to buy here especially if subsribing is availabe,Other brands dissapoint .fairy never does

125 tablets is probably 6 months worth or dishwasher tablets for us as we don’t use it every single day.. These are great quality and produce a great wash and extra clean finish.. For what is less than 15p a tablet they are great value.. 5 Stars.

Everything comes out of a not very good dishwasher (have just moved house and inherited it) perfectly clean and shiny. No residue left in the little tray, so well worth the extra expense over some other brands. The scent is very pleasing too.

These dishwasher tablets work very well indeed. Having given them a thorough test on everything from everyday dishes and cutlery, to baked-on greasy ovenware I can say that all emerged sparkling clean with just that faint whiff of lemon scent which makes the room smell clean and fresh! Big test for me was some old silver-plated cutlery which was tarnished and which other tablets had not really tackled that well. When I tried them with these they were vastly improved and only required the customary polish to bring them back to life.. Easy to use these tablets do the job and leave no residue. Nothing else is required as the tablets are all-in-one. Fairy is a long established and trusted name so I have no hesitation in recommending these. Good price too!

These tablets are cheaper than Fairy Platinum and lack the machine cleaning claims of the latter, which I, myself, doubt. Despite regular use of Platinum, our filter gets covered in an adhesive white gunge anyway. So. save yourself some money.

These worked very well indeed in our dishwasher and I shall definitely purchase them in the future if the price is reasonable. We currently use whichever dishwasher tablet is on offer here on Amazon but do only use the main big brands and I would be more than happy to purchase these in the future.. The tablet is a soft tablet very much like the ones you use in your washing machine as opposed to the usual hard dishwasher tablets and so this was a little strange at first but they do clean just as well if not slightly better. We have tried these on a variety of household dishes, cutlery and glasses and they cleaned everything with no problem at all. They have a slight lemon scent to them but not overbearing.

These tablets are easy to use, having dissolving wrappers. They clean very effectively even on a cooler (40 degree), short wash cycle.. The muti-lingual packaging is a bit odd (e.g., referring to "dissolution" rather than "dissolving"), but this doesn't detract from the product itself, which is very good.. Even though these claim to be "all in one", I still use separate rinse aid and softening salt, because the results are better this way: rinse aid needs to be released right at the end of the wash cycles, which an all-in-one tablet can't replicate, and the salt powers a built-in ion-exchange unit which is far more effective than any chemicals in a small tablet. I can't comment on how effective these tablets are if you dispense with these extra items.

Haven't used Fairy dishwasher tablets for ages, since they started making them ever more complicated (and expensive). However, I was very pleased with the results of these 'Original' tablets - which are sold in a large pack, at a very good price. So far, all the dishes have come out very clean and sparkly - certainly makes me think that all the extra 'bits' offered by the more expensive products are quite unnecessary.

Can't fault these.. In an effort to save money we had changed to unbranded ones from supermarkets and they do an OK job - these though do a really excellent job. Less streaks on the plates and the pots are definitely cleaner - no second wiping or washing required.. The breakdown of food waste must reduce the chances of the pump and pipes getting blocked- so could save money in the future as well.. Lesson learned - somethings are worth spending a few extra pounds on. These come is small pouches so easy to store as well and the whole capsule goes in the machine so not annoying plastic bags to remove from the tablets.

These are decent value, but seem to a be a bit hit and miss in use compared with finish premium tablets. When working well, they are great, but every 5th wash or so the dishes either remain dirty, or the rinse doesn't work so well and everything emerges with a sheen of water. They generally seem to leave plastics a little damper than finish tablets, also. Saying which, this is a bumper pack, that should last for several months.

These dishwasher tablets are superb.. First though it is worth noting that low temp cycles are a false economy. You need that hgih temp regularly to ensure the machine and its pipework remains clear as lower temps just end up clogging your pipes.. The tablets themselves clean superb. Dishes are very clean and glassware sparkles.. They come in resealable pouches of 25 and the tablet doesn't require unwrapping. Great results

Usually use another make of dishwasher tablets Finnish ones with added this that and the other and expensive if not on offer. Using these I was pleasantly surprised with as they actually got the pots, pans and dirty cutlery as clean as my usual branded ones.. No wrappers to take off, just pop the squidgy dishwasher tablet into the door and wash away. The only thing I don’t like about any brand of dishwasher tablets that are squidgy is that fact they can go soft and nearly melt if left anywhere near a warm pipe under sink.. These tablets need no extra salt or anything else as an all in one tablet.. Yes would buy these as would mean saving some money but still getting clean shiny items when washed.. Update even used these in hot water in mop bucket for washing floor when son dropt something sticky on it and the floor came up really clean and smelling great.

These claim to have ten different functions including limescale removal, salt and rinse aid but they left the glasses on the top shelf with bad salt marks. Not as good as my regular Finish Quantum Powerball.

I have hitherto been using the Finish powerball quantam max dishwasher tablets with our top of the range Neff machine and to be honest, I do not see much difference in the cleaning qualities between these two products. However, Fairy Original is considerably cheaper (see Amazon prices). I noted that the Fairy product did not manage to clean a baking tray with burnt on 'fish pie'. Equally it is highly probable that the Finish product would have done a similarly poor job. Any burnt on foods do need pre-soaking, ideally with hot water to loosen.. Whilst the Finish product claims a lemon sparkle, you can actually smell the lemon fragrance with the Fairy product. The Fairy tablets are cheaper to purchase so all in all, these would be my preferred choice going forwards. However, these dishwasher tablets are not the be-all to end-all!

These capsules are easy to use and do a solid job. I haven't had any trouble with the quality of the cleaning they provide. The problem they have is they aren't particularly good value. For such a large pack, I would expect them to be significantly cheaper than their competition.. But right now, this 125 pack (currently) is only 90p cheaper than two 70 packs of Fairy's own Platinum capsules, which would also give you more washes. It's therefore hard to recommend this particular product when it doesn't offer great value.. I can't fault the wash and the quality of the capsules, but shop around.
Die Tabs sind echt super...Geschirr und Gläser werden prima sauber
Very good dishwasher tablets at a good price.
Works really well and best price we've found on subscription
Had to check tabs as package was damaged…discovered I was TEN short!!! Pack states 85… mine contained 75…cheek!! Could have forgiven a couple short!! Get a grip guys!!!! (Like product tho) 🤓
Easy to use and cleans great
Not as good as the Fairy ones I used to get at cleaning my dishes on 45 degree wash. Smell ok. Not rating the flavour for obvious reasons.
I left a tin out after cooking lasagne for 4-5 days, to test these things. Bloody hell. They work!!! It came out sparkling clean and smelling of lemon's.
These do the job well. No streaks and no bloomed glassware
Not cheap, as with most detergents, but you get what it says on the package, clean, sparkling dishes etc
Works well and really gives glasses a sparkle and generally cleans well on every thing else !
Does what is says on the packing
So much easier than unwrapping the other finish tablets!!

I usually buy the Finish all in one max, but decided to get these when I saw them on a special with a subscription offer. In comparison to those these work really well - mostly. 9/10 times when the dishwasher has finished it's cycle the dishes and glasses are shining, the clean is better than the other ones. However on that 1 occasion the dishes are still dirty and some of them have to go through another cycle.. I have seen that some people have said that they've found residue in the tablet holder. I have never seen any residue in mine. All in all I am satisfied with the cleaning of these dishwasher pods and I would buy them again.

I love these big packs that you can get on Amazon. Great as you can get a really good price quite often. I have tried to keep that on Subscribe and Save but you always seem to get a deal each time that you sign up so just be careful. I use these in a 10 year old Hotpoint Dishwasher, everything comes out really clean and thats down to these tablets. Have tried other but always come back to these.
Can tend to stick together in the pack, must be careful when separating to prevent contend for if on skin or eyes!
The original gel tablets clean well (I hardly ever have to re-clean), and the smell is nice. The lemon offers the best scent, and makes the kitchen smell great.
I had gone through so many kinds of these and have found bay far this the best one, pots and dishwasher smelt fresh after use.

I haven't got back to using "standard" dishwasher tablets since I switched to the more expensive "ultimate" version. It's just works without having to worry about adding salt or rinse aid - the dishes are perfectly clean every time, even at the lower temperature eco setting. No streaks on glass either. It's totally worth it paying that little extra.

Great product,. No smell or residues on the dishes after use.. Clean the dishes quicker and in more details compared to the other products.. The only issue is, the tablets could stick together if under pressure. If it happens, probably it’s very difficult to separate them.. Great value for the money
Product performs well in dishwasher and does what it says on the packet
.Cleans really well. Fresh, pleasant smell. No aftertaste.

These cost a little bit more than the other cheaper dishwasher tablets but they are certainly worth the difference.I've gone through most of the other different types of dishwasher tablets and find either they don't wash properly or leave tea stains in mugs or greasy marks on glasses. In my view these are the best and I'm very happy with the results. The price on Amazon is very competitive particularly if bought on a subscription. One other thing I will ask is, why do some people overfill the dishwasher so there is not a millimetre of space and then complain the dishes have not come out as clean as they want them to be?.you need to leave a few gaps so that the water and detergent can get through to do the job. It's false economy to overfill the dishwasher.
Amazing cleaning action in my old Bush dishwasher in which I thought was broken until I started using these. Thank you seller :-)

I bought these as they are a great price. I usually use FAIRY PLATINUM but these Finish ones seemed better value. For a long time now I have been placing the capsules on the floor of my dishwasher,as I heard a radio broadcast that that’s the best way to use these new type of DW tablets/capsules. Apparently if you do put them into the dispenser they are not released at the correct time as one of the ingredients should activate BEFORE this. Since then I’ve just done this.. put the capsule on the floor of my machines do never any problems . I used the FINISH ones this way, and the are absolutely great,same as my FAIRY ones and I do believe if you’ve had a problem try this,I’m sure they’ll work just fine. Great value for money too.

Feel this is great value for money, was using a another brand before Finish and the complete wash cycle did not produce great results. I did think at first this may be the dishwasher I had so gave the Finish tablets a go and since then have not used another brand as the results are consistently great.. Only tip is ensure these are stored in a room that does not get too hot as due to how dishwasher tablets from all brands are packaged together they can become stuck together causing a lot to be wasted this was due to me placing under sink area and when dishwasher was on this area did get warmer than normal so they have sinced been moved and have not had an issue since.
Big pack makes it worth while. Thx. Will be buying again.
TRIED ALL OTHER DW TABS ....... THIS ONE IS SUPREME IS DOING THE BEST JOB OF CLEANING POTS & PANS. NO STREAKS OR RESIDUE LEFTOVER AFTER THE WASH - ALWAYS A HUGE PLUS !!!!!!

I was happy when discovered this deal: just over 11 quid for 85 tabs with subscription service! Seemed brilliant to me. I've been a loyal Finish dishwasher tablets user for over 3 years. Tried different brands loooking for something cheaper, however, have always been back to Finish. I also use the same brand salt and rinse aid. Never complained about the quality of cleaning: shiny dishes, lovely smell, all as advertised. Our usual buy is a pack of 72 lemon scented quantum powerball tabs (I prefer this smell) for 9.99 in one discount store. Taking into account our usual travel cost, this amz offer worked out cheaper, so I fell for it initially.. Well... First thing I have to mention explaining why I gave it 1 star is the tablets shape. Sorry, it's just awful. It's bigger than needed plus has "edges" all over the perimeter like 5 mm wide! Why? Why???? It doesn't fit the normal dishwasher tabs dispenser! Well, if you "bend it" it will, however, as the result of this bending, the tabs get stuck very easily! So when the cycle is finished, you can see the melting dishwasher tablet in an open dispenser!. I'm not a new user and know that sometimes it might happen if you don't wipe water leftovers from that dispenser, and the tab starts melting before it jumps out of it during the cycle (it doesn't happen right away). But.. I wipe it dry all the time. Something tells me, that the problem is is this tablets' "upgraded" shape, which prevents it fitting into dispenser properly. Actually, its "flexibility" makes it worse. As well as the size and mentioned "edges". I was back to my old tablets and hasn't had a stuck and melting tab problem any more.. Second reason for not liking this tablets is that they just not as good at cleaning! I noticed that sometimes I need to leave stuff in a dishwasher for one more cycle as it feels greasy when you touch. It doesn't help to save money and water.. I'll add some photo later to support my arguments and will be cancelling my subscription service.
The item is very good because it washes things so easily. Also it washes smelly plastic cups easily

Purchased at what I thought was a good price, arrived quickly too which is an added bonus as I'd run out! It's one large jumbo pack so make sure you have room to storage; the bag is resealable so stops moistures getting in and ruining unused tablets which is a great feature.. In terms of the tablets themselves, I used in a Bosch dishwasher on ECO settings. They have a strong (but lovely) lemon smell and did a really good job cleaning the dishes. No water marks were left either and glassware was sparkling. They also left the dishwasher itself looks spotless so added bonus there!. Overall, really happy; perform well, smell nice. Recommended.

We use a slimline dishwasher but these tablets work perfectly on a 30 minute cycle. 99% of the time the dishes come out completely clean and sparkling. Only downside is the glasses often feel too clean but that's a downside of using a dishwasher in general.. Tried the Fairy equivalent to these just last week and was extremely disappointed with the results. So have reverted back to the Finish tablets. These are great value for money when they're on offer from Amazon - working out at 13p a tablet. Much less than your standard tablets at a normal price. I personally wouldn't pay full price!
I stupidly tried Astonish tabs, and they ruined my life for about 2 weeks. The second I reverted back to Finish all my plates and cutlery were back to normal. Good quality cleaning and shiney finish

I have used this make of tablet for several years now and have always been satisfied with the results (indeed, insisting that my wife only ever buy these in the shopping). However. I have just started using this pack supplied by Amazon (which were on special offer) and suddenly my cups are starting to remain 'tea' stained after the normal cleaning cycle. So much so that I have sometimes been obliged to wash them again by hand. As far as I am aware, nothing has changed in the dishwasher so I think I will purchase some from ASDA again and see if this results in more effective cleaning again.

I prefer these to the ordinary finish they don’t leave an unpleasant smell after been cleaned. It’s not my dishwasher as it gets cleaned once a week. But since using the lemon once I no longer smell that weird smell any more. I’ve even recommended for my family to change as her plates when eating smelt the same
Great for cleaning but poorly protected against heavier items in the same box

These are superb dishwasher tablets, they clean everything I throw at them very well. I'd use the older quantum tablets which were also excellent, the gel which was rubbish and I wouldn't recommend at all, and now these which are simply superb. They are able to scrub all my mug which has a week's worth of tea stains clean every time without leaving any stains or marks. They are not quite tablets, rather they are a small sealed bag containing each component physically separated, this makes them a little bulky as you have to fold them in order to squeeze them into the detergent compartment. Apart from that minor grumble, I strongly recommend these, I have not used anything else which cleans as well.
These are the best washing tablets I've ysed.
I find the dishwasher tablets great for washing dishes straight after use.. However any burnt oven trays it will struggle with.

The skin of the tablets, or the density of the tablets is a problem I think- they do not dissolve fully in the dishwasher. I have a brand new one and with a good tablet, it works perfectly. But these yellow ones- the detergent is so dense and they just don't work 20-30% of the times.. I will go for supermarket versions as I feel this might be about the date of the tablets.

It’s an excellent product!. I used to buy the competitive brands best dishwasher tablets and they are nowhere as good as this. Finish Quantum Ultimate has removed all the stains inside our mugs due to drinking strong coffee and tea. Can not recommend enough!. I’ve also stopped putting the rinse aid in and still all the glassware comes out sparkling and with no water marks so you can save money buying this product!

We really like these. They get everything nice and clean and don't leave any residue or taste. The review thing is asking me to rate their flavour but I highly do not recommend tasting these. I imagine they probably taste of painful death.. Very good tablets for cleaning, this bag lasts about 2-3 months which seems to be good value to me

Love the fresh scent, and the value here is phenomenal - thank you Amazon! I find these leave my dishes exceptionally clean and I’ve never once had a problem with these or any other Finish tablets. I must add that I always use Finish rinse aid which I find gives a lovely result. I can’t comment on what the results would be without the addition of this. Very pleased and I will continue to buy these from Amazon as long as you can continue to offer them at such a competitive price.

I think that all dishwasher stuff is well overpriced to begin with. The big corporates have certainly fixed prices on the high end making it more costly to wash a pan than grass and blood stained whites.. However compared to some other stuff on the shelves this is a good product, I'm house bound due to covid-19 and Amazon give a good price so all in not bad.

I paid £11 for 85 pods, which in my opinion for finish quantum is a very good price to begin with. I also did the subscribe and save subscription, so saved a few more pennies there. Plus they will be delivered every other month automatically. These are the new quantum ultimate range. I like finish quantum anyway. My dishes, glasses and cutlery were all clean, streak free, and shiny. I like the fact that these made my dishwasher smell nice and lemony, and it looked clean after use.

I have been using these for a year or so and normally pay about £12 to £15 for a pack of 65 so this pack at the price is excellent value. These used to have a square harder gel outer which were easier to stack but are now in gel floppy cases, a bit like the persil pods for clothes. I hope they don't burst in the container and will re review after a month.

These tablets are fantastic. Finally, a tablet which gets scrambled egg off the bottom of my pans and baked on food off my dishes. No need to scour it off when dishes come out or run pans through 3 times to get clean. Brilliant value from amazon too. Yes, the tablets are too big for the detergent drawer but flexible enough to stuff in and still come out as they're supposed to during wash cycle.
Use these at work in a cafe. Get the job done plates etc come out squeaky clean and they smell so good! Have changed to these now after using a different brand for years and definitely won’t go back

This is a great product but the only bad thing is sometimes they are sticked together and if you try to separate them you will break the capsule and you can’t put them back in the packet otherwise the liquide of the capsule will go around in the packet.

We are usually soak our plates before putting them in the dishwasher but these are a game changer. They save so much time and water. I can not stress how brilliant these are. If you eat the Chicago Town mini pizzas you will know how the cheese glues on to the plate but these tablets wash them off first time. We have subscribed to these.
Works just as good as any other cleaning product
Some reviewers said they don't seem genuine and I have to say they do look a bit haphazardly designed. However we have not had any leak or stick or anything and the dishes are clean enough.
Works very well in the dishwasher cleaning even very dirty items

I came across these after being given them as a sample. I was so impressed that I have continued buying them!. They aren't exactly cheap but if you take into consideration that you no longer need salt and rinse aid but also dishwasher cleaner and freshener, they only work out at 12p or get them from Amazon direct on subscription at only 9p per capsule.. I DEFINITELY recommend them.
Regularly use these as I find they work the best in my machine.
This is definitely better than the non quantum/tablet version. It does a decent job in cleaning even if you don’t do a pre-rinse

Tried a different brand but went back to finish. Tried this due to the sale price and i am not disappointed. I can see the difference with the shine on my glasses and plates. It does feel it is cleaner compared to the other brand. No grease or residue.. The dishwasher tablets packaging could be better. Thought it was fake until i searched and realized it is really packed this way.
An excellent way to save on your dishwasher tabs. When you are down to about a quarter left, reorder and save cash. What’s not to like??

Decided to test it as it was an oversize pack at good value, and advertised super power of this product, thought I give it a shot. Loved the effectiveness, the smell, what a great product. The only minor problem I have with it, it is flattened structure of each of the "pills", and a bit too big for the compartment holding the tablet. I find that rather strange, and was worried that it would get stuck due to its funny structure and size, but no, it worked just as well, and the cleaning is even more effective than my favourite 3 in 1 Quantum power tablets.
Great value for money will buy again

These are the worst dishwasher tablets I have ever used. I’ve only been using them for around a week and for the first time since having a dishwasher (4 years) I have had dishes coming out dirty after every wash, some don’t even look like they have been through a wash cycle! I’ve even changed from the eco mode to the intensive mode (didn’t even know what the other modes were until I googled them this week!!) and cleaned the dishwasher with finish cleaner, and still no improvement. I strongly suspect these are not the genuine product, and after reading some other reviews I will not be using any more as I don’t trust them! Do not recommend at all…in case you hadn’t guessed!!
The only dishwasher detergent tablets worth buying. The end result with these is phenomenal; casserole pots, glass, heavily soiled ovenware - look no further - buy these.
This is a great product but a few times most of the time dishes are sparkly

This came to my house as a freebie, I tried the sample and was pleasantly surprised. With a lot of cleaning products I use 2 tablets as I find 1 doesn’t sometimes do the job. However, I found 1 was all it took. I got the lemon which smelled fresh and the product worked well. Even bought myself the real thing.

I always buy fairy platinum but as it was not available I had to choose a backup product which was finish dishwasher.. Not only it did not clean my dishes but also left dirt and grease on it.. I had to hand wash my dishes again each time I used this product. Instead of saving time it increased my work.. Very disappointed

Great quality, as usual. I have it on subscription order and these tablets never fail, except that one little thing, once loading dishwasher make sure you are reaching for the tablet with absolutely dry hands, otherwise tablets will stick together or even leak.

These are one of my go to tabs along with fairy and aldis own brand. These are great at getting tea stains out of cups which is why I rate them above cheaper brands. However I found that storing them without sealing the bag is a bad idea as the capsules are prone to stick together !

Prefer this brand of Dishwasher tablets. Never disappointed when I take dishes out of D/W , they do what it says on the packet and tv ads.. I only bought it on Amazon due to lockdown. The price was too high, that’s the negative.
Does the job clean dishes nicely with a light lemoney fragrance to it

The product name "Ultimate" is misleading - this is not an improvement on previous products by the same manufacturer. These are the issues we have encountered with this product which leaves us feeling this is not a great product:. 1. Potential health issue? These tabs leave a residue on plates/glasses/cutlery etc. If you clear run water into a clear glass which was dishwashed using these tabs., a heap of bubbles appear on the top of the water in the glass, they remain for a really long time! If however you RINSE the glass washed using these tabs before using it, there are NO such bubbles. I deduced from that that a soapy residue remained from the glasses' time in the dishwasher, using these dishwasher tabs.. 2. Performance: They don't clean as effectively as other Fairy tabs do - we normally use "Fairy all in one DW tablets" - so the same brand, but a different tablet.. 3. I'm sorry to say this, but you'll see this from the photos I'll upload with this review - they just don't look right. They look like a thrift store has copied the official branded product and created a cheaper version of it, less expensive and less effective. I apologise if this is not the case - but please see the photo.. 4. Price is the same as that of other products - needless to say, we are reverting to our previous product.

Quick delivery and great price. For those who haven't used these you will be amazed how good they are. We have used all types before and thought our dishwasher was pretty rubbish as some items had food left on or looked dull in appearance. This stuff makes stuff sparkly and squeaky clean like no others. Knocks spots of the fairy tablets and cheaper finish tabs.

Takes away bad scents from crockery and leaves them smelling lovely, however sometimes there remains a somewhat foul smell in the dishwasher despite using all appropriate products to care for the dishwasher, as it is relatively new. Crockery is always clean, no problems there.
Dishwasher tablets are fantastic value for money. Thank you.
Sometimes the old ones used to get stuck in the drawer these don't so they are better.
Ran out of my dishwasher tablets but was able to order and get a fast delivery at a fair price and I would recommend them does what it says on the tin shiny clean dishes

nice lemon scent and they clean very good, even hard to clean plates got completely clean out of the dishwasher. Packing or storing needs to be worked on though, a couple of the pods seem to be leaking as it can be seen in the picture. The package itself has a really nice lemon scent because of that but it either the storage of this product, the way it was transported or the actual package of the tabs needs to be looked into. Probably won't buy them again even though they do clean very well.

These are not designed for going into the tablet compartment so the people moaning that they do not work and are clogging up the tablet compartment are using them wrong. Just throw them in the dishwasher this is how they are meant to be used

Amazing results every time. My old detergent was leaving cutlery oddly stained and cloudy. Since using these pods everything comes out clean, fresh, and importantly, dry even when I forget rinse aid. I bought these on subscribe and save and they worked out very economicaly.
I got it for a discount... better than the other brand product available in the market.
I'll be getting these again. Very well priced and very good results. Baked on lasagne on a Pirex dish without pre rinsing is managed by these with ease.
I have always looked for value when purchasing dishwasher tablets. I was surprised to find that these actually work when they say no pre-rinsing required. I was glad I put these on a standing order
I am not using the Dishwasher tablets yet but I have been using them before. They give excellent results. Little more can be said.
I like the scent as it's 🍋, good value for money, always pleased

These have lasted so long and are by far the best tablets I’ve used. Not sure about other machines but they are slightly too big for the tablet compartment. They don’t fit snug I have to squeeze it In slightly. This does mean that on occasion the tablet hasn’t fully dissolved but very rarely.
Great price and works well at cleaning our stubborn stains!

I have always found Quantum Max to be very good and have used it for several years. However, I have had problems with this new version. I have found with a lot of the washes that the powder part of the pod is still partly unused in the door dispenser afterwards. I therefore have to question if I am still getting the same cleaning power because of that. I have experimented with placing it in different positions, but it hasn't made much difference. I have not long received a new box so will monitor it to see if there's any improvement.
Easy to use , squeaky clean dishes
Product works fine but other similar Finish products smell better - scent is a very personal thing but we won't be ordering Quantum again.

The other big brand (their platinum plus one) gives a much better result - hands down. After using the other brand for a while, I tried these Finish tablets to see if there would any improvement....there wasn't. After one wash with Finish, I could clearly see that the shine and cleanliness I would usually get with the other big brand was missing. Suffice to say that I've returned these and will stick with what I know definitely works.
First time trying this finish tablets, I have to say I am not changing this brand, leaving everything sparkling with nice scent

Found these to be very good at moving hardened grease, and usual debris. Glasses have lost the previously 'distressed' look as when using the basic, cheaper, Dishwasher Tablets. Very pleased with the outcome although price is that bit higher than the cheaper options so probably should expect that amount of improvement.
The product was delivered promptly and on time. It’s an excellent product that does what it says. There were plenty of sachets so it would last me for a while.

This product is supposed to clean, cut grease, and leave all dishes sparkling. I put the rather large tablet (if you can call it that). it's three different measures of Gel, Powder, and Powerball, into the machine, and set it off on a programme I usually use. I returned to empty the dishwasher, some time later - only to find that the dishes were still dirty, and the product was stuck in the dispenser, it had not been released into the machine. The plastic covering the chemicals had not melted, as it was supposed to, so I just hooked it out of the dispenser and ran it again on another programme.. I am very disappointed, and did telephone Finish and they said they were aware of the problem. I am among many who have complained. I was also told that you need a hot wash to melt the plastic, and to just put the tablet into the bowl of the dishwasher. I will do this and see how well it works, and will let them know if I am not happy.. I just thought people should be aware of this problem before they do what I did and order 85.
