We bought this item on subscribe and save and found that it was leaving stains on crockery most paticuarly coffee stains. We persevered for some time because we had a large quantity but we found we were having to clean by hand because the staining got worse, We have gone back to Lidl W5 all in onea much cheaper and far superior product and are left with a large quantity of these useless Quantum tablets. Although we use Amazon a lot this has certainly put us off using subscribe and save.
I have ordered these before and found they are a great deal

I have used Finish dishwasher products. They have always been amazing until I used this product. It’s leaving a peculiar smell in my utensils. The utensils (glasses) have white stains left. This is despite filling the dishwasher with appropriate salt and the rinse aid. I cannot recommend this product or the seller.

Nope! If this is meant that be an improvement, it’s a big fail! I’ve always used quantum and it used to be great. This new design, for some reason, will not clean the tea stains from my cups and leaves residue inside glasses, amongst other things. I’m forever having to wash things by hand or return them to the dishwasher. Not impressed and will revert to the old style product which works well.

Have always used quantum and always worked well but not these they simply do not clean thought it might be the dishwasher so tried a different brand and everything came out clean.. Not sure if quantum have changed what they put in them or if these are not a genuine product either way do not recommend buying these.

Regularly buy these but the latest lot seem to have a different plastic wrap that’s really thin so quite a few tabs have burst in the pack. Sort out the quality Finish! The last lot of tabs we had were Fairy that were far better quality.

The new shaped capsules are horrendously unreliable, upon opening the pack one had leaked making a lot stick together. You can’t pull them apart because all the contents fall out.. Will certainly not be buying again.
Doesn’t work at all . Work as bad as cheap product. Not happy
I bought these along with the Finishn4 in one powerball tablets.. Just opened the bag after using up the above, and the dishes are dirty and the pods are not disolving properly.

Gave these a try after using Fairy Platinum previously. In short, Fairy tablets very rarely left anything dirty but with these something isn’t clean in every cycle.. Awful. Avoid. Like others say maybe it’s the shape?

I always use the same pods from Finish. Not sure what happened to teh quality here. So far have used 3 pods and all are stuck to the compartment at the end of the cycle. Not sure what is the reason and if I can get some replacement.

Not suitable for Bosch dishwashers. These tablets get stuck in the detergent dispenser, they will not be released automatically during the wash cycle. You will need to place them inside the dishwasher, not in the dispenser.
Product was sticky diff length usual sometimes didnot disolve

Don’t recommend these at all – there’s nothing wrong with my dishwasher it’s Bosch – but these tablets leave it smelling like the pond at the end of my garden – have to clean it every week and it still smells– Going back to max tablets lemon – don’t get these!

I usually don’t write reviews but I found this product absolutely useless. All our mugs have tea stains on them and despite using filtered water, tea just looks grimy. I started using two tablets instead of one per dishwashing cycle. Can’t wait to finish the pack. Will not repurchase.

The capsules are all luped together, when you try to separate them they split and spill the detergent everywhere. Don't wash the dishes either, had to use 2 at a time just to get the same clean as with normal tablets. Never buying these again.
Avoid!!! I've only had these one day and wasted three washes as they don't come out of draw, ive made sure that the draw is bone dry before adding and still sticks!!!!
Simply do not get dishes cups etc clean. Complete waste of money
The tablets are stuck together and impossible to separate, so you have to use a few of them together. Even if you can separate one it gets thorn and the liquid gets all over your hands.
These tablets really don’t clean tea stains. The cups have never looked worse. Even on the deal, they are not worth what was paid. AVOID.
Very ineffective, not sure how I return ?! Wouldn't recommend.
Used to be the best one I have
buying different type. these didn't clean
Very disappointed didn’t work at all . I’m always buying this product from the shops and it works perfectly but this is probably not a original product.
This product shockingly underperforms compared to other products. Won't buy again!!

Absolute rubbish, step backwards from regular Finish and Fairy dishwasher tabs. Cutlery and crockery still dirty and greasy. Initially thought it was a one off but not the case. Will not be buying these again!
In many many years of dishwashing I have never had such a disappointing product. The Fairy ones never left any residue, but since I bought Finish quantum I have to rewash several items.
Came all stuck together - not good and returned
Poor item. Half the tablets were stuck together!! The case was joint. The red liquid had leaked. Pointless purchase! DO NOT BUY
Very disappointed as all tablets were stuck together .. won’t be ordering again
Absolutely shocking at cleaning mugs etc. Never had a problem with any Finish or Persil ones before. Don't waste your money on these "new" ultimate ones.
Disappointing. Didn't even remove tea stains from mug used same day.
Thay just stick to the draw and start to melt even if i dry the draw ???

This brand make very good cleaning tablets of rthe Dishwasher but they are too strongly scented.. I don't like any perfumed products as I have an allergy to perfume but also I don't want to drink from a cup with a lingering taste of chemical lemons.. I gave them to a friend though who was very happy with the product.

My favourite dishwasher tabs at the monent are Fairy Platinum. They cost a fortune but they do give visibly better results, with everything coming out spotless and gleaming.. I expected these to give similar results, but I was disappointed. They have split the tablet up into three sections will all different colours so it looks very pretty - keep kids well away from these as they look like sweets! They are also quite large and I could only just get them into my detergent compartment.. However I've tried them a few times now and each wash they were pretty unremarkable. The dishes and glasses were clean but didn't have that real sparkly shine Fairy Platinum gives me. They just seemed like very standard tablets at an inflated price to me.. I'd buy them if they were massively discounted to below the cost of standard dishwasher tablets, but that seems unlikely. If you want the best go Fairy Platinum, otherwise save your money as any decent dishwasher tablet, including Finish's own cheaper versions, will do just as good a job as these.

I don't usually use this brand for my dishwasher tablets (although I have used the rinse aid before) but I have actually just bought another pack because I was so impressed. I usually use either a supermarket own brand or a well known brand that is gentle on skin - whichever is on offer.. I trialled one of the Finish tablets on a mixed load in my dishwasher - the salt and rinse aid are full fyi - I was really impressed with the results. The glasses came out shinier than usual and with no cloudiness. Plates and bowls were also shiny, as was cutlery (none of which had to go back in the dishwasher). I had a frying pan in there that went straight in after cooking steak - came out perfectly clean, as did the veg pan - no white line around the interior (is that limescale?). I've since done 3 more loads and the results are equally good.. I checked the price of these because they were so good I wanted to see if they were too pricey - they seem to be great value at the moment at c. 17p per tablet. That's a reduced price so I bought another pack. I've heard people say they won't use anything but Finish dishwasher tablets and always thought pah - but I see what they mean now - really much better cleaning - if they clean so well I don't have to put things back through the dishwasher for a second time, I think they will work out cost effective in the long run. Absolutely recommend these.
These tablets are good quality. They smell great and the items come out lovely and clean. Good value too and better than other leading brands.

There's no denying these tablets do the job - stuff coming out of my dishwasher at the moment looks exactly as I would hope after a wash.. The tablets aren't as solid as most others, as each part (powder, rinse aid, and the little ball thing) are kept away from each other - this also makes them a bit tighter to fit in to the drawer of the dishwasher.. However, at nearly £20 for 85 tablets, there are far cheaper options out there.

I must admit that I get very confused by the descriptions used by the makers of dishwasher tablets. In the case of Finish is PowerBall better than Quantum or the other way round? Judging by price Quantum is the superior product.. And now along comes Quantum Ultimate.. But never mind the marketing. What are the results. Well an immediate success for me. I ran the dishwasher twice to clear a backlog of dishes. Both loads contained some heavily soiled items from a casserole meal. Everything came out sparkling clean and these lemon scented ones add that "clean" aroma to the mix too. So all in all I think these (pricey though they may be) are very good indeed.

These really are fantastic dishwasher tablets. They look completely different, coming as they do in two almost separate dis-solvable plastic capsules. They are absolutely linked and held together so don't be alarmed when you first get one of the tablets out of the box.. More importantly, as well as looking great, they work sublimely. They leave a heavy load of dirty dishes, pots and glasses extremely clean, and smelling lovely an lemon-y fresh. Thankfully none of my glasses now get streaky like they did with some alternative types and brands of dishwasher tablets. Any grease or grime is also completely banished.. To summarise, it is hard to see how a dishwasher tablet could ever perform better than these do and, on that basis, I absolutely and unconditionally recommend them to you.

These appear to be the best dishwasher tablets available from Finish. I particularly like the lemon iteration. Even with the pack completely sealed the smell of lemons is very refreshing.. I tend to buy Fairy All-in-One Platinum Dishwasher Tablets which do well in Which? Magazine tests. These Finish tablets produce similar and perhaps better results. Apart from the scent other high points are the lack of wrappers around each tablet with the tablets completely dissolving during the dishwashing process. I also like the combination of powder and gel to produce the best results.. Overall these tablets are well worth a try. I think they are hard to beat, and they offer good value as well.. Five stars

I've been impressed with how well these have washed our dishes. I wouldn't usually go for the Quantum range but I do think they have given a better wash than our regular brand.. I did find the lemon smell a bit overwhelming on first opening the packet and I was concerned that everything was going to end up smelling and tasting of artificial lemons. But it hasn't been as bad as some other brands we've used so I was pleasantly surprised.. If you have small children you do need to store them securely because they are brightly coloured and squidgy.. Overall - very good dishwasher "tablets".

These are great dishwasher tablets - I have been testing over the last few days with very challenging dishes including baked on rice pudding! I’ve even tried on a full load on a speed wash setting and again all dishes have come out sparkling. There is a subtle lemon scent on opening of the dishwasher but the dishes don’t have a lingering scent.. These tablets are on the higher price point of most dishwasher tablets however they give an excellent clean every time.. Highly recommended.

Up until receiving the review pack of Finish Quantum Ultimate we've been using Finish All in 1 Max Lemon, which have worked well for us.. So do the Quantum give a better result than the Max? Not that we can detect. Really we find that the dishwasher program selected makes far more difference than the tablet used; I guess it's obvious that long and hot beats short and cool. These are good dishwasher tablets, for sure, but I can't honestly say they're better than others.

These new Finish Ultimate dishwasher tablets aren’t the same size as the other Quantum tablets, they’re a bit thinner, spread out and flexible - with one of the plastic bubbles containing a fluid rather than a powder. But the tablets sit nicely in the dishwasher container so no problem with this form factor in use.. Results - as usual from Quantum tablets - are outstanding- and dishes are sparklingly clean and smelled good ( no wet dog odours). Another outstanding product from Finish.

We normally use Finish Max, and I didn't think it was possible to get the dishes (and especially the glasses) and cleaner. But you can. These Ultimate tablets must surely be what they claim; the ultimate is dishwashing technology. The plates and glasses have a sheen to them that I haven't seen before. This must be as good as it gets.

This is the new premium dishwasher tablet from Finish.. Difficult to tell if better than Quantum but definitely better than Finish max 3-in-1.. The main difference for me is that there are no streaks / dry water patches on any glasses or cutlery.. And it also looks like the dishes dry better - absolutely no need to use any cloth to dry / polish after dishes are taken out of the dishwasher - brilliant!

This is the very best in dishwasher tablets. The tablet had been engineered so it’s even easier to use. The dishes come out shiny and clean, with no streaks or lime spots.. We love the fresh fragrance and, at 85 tablets per pack, this is very good value for money for a market-leading brand.

I don't think I have used any other dishwasher tablets in my life than Finish. They really are a great product and a mainstay on my shopping list. These Finish Quantum Ultimate Dishwasher Tablets do a fantastic job of cleaning glass, crockery and cutlery. Forget the store brand and get the quality product instead.

These are superb and still the best you can get in my opinion.. Theres a new design to the tablet which see's the 3 individual components seperated out and I wonder if the various bits dissolve at different rates to due the right bit as it goes.. I may be over thinking it. Anyway really superb results. Sometimes the lemon ones can leave a bit of a taste to dishes but no such thing with these. Top dog

I was having a little trouble with residue and the odd plate looking unwashed with my previous dishwasher tablet....I refilled the rinse aid, the salt, cleaned the filters...no luck....and I then begun to prewash everything which was becoming annoying....what is the point of a dishwasher then?!. And then I tried these. The best yet - small and simple to pop in and they do exactly what you'd expect. A really decent clean, even on the economy wash.. So good value overall as it saves additional effort of pre-washing or re-washing. I'm really happy with super clean dishes and pots every time.. Highly recommended.

It is difficult to see a huge difference between these and the standard finish quantum tablets we use. I heartily approve of these huge bags as they are certainly better value for money. But are these 'ultimate'. Well, they do perform really well. But frankly I think all Finish tablets do! Are these worth it? Probably just about, but I'd always recommend finish tablets for the dishwasher.

I use a range of dishwasher cleaning tablets and know there is quite a lot of variance in the cleanliness of dishes coming out at the end of the cycle depending on which one is used. My initial reaction to these is that they clean well, even pots and pans come out with added sparkle no matter what state they were in when stacked inside. One thing to note however is that the scent is very strong and does attach to items once the cycle is complete; this doesn’t bother me but if you are sensitive to such things, particularly on glasses, these may not be the tablets for you.
I prefer, and will return to the older

Having used these for a while now I am replacing my previous five star review. These new Finish Quantum Ultimate Dishwasher Tablets do not perform in hard water areas - you will need additional salt. Given that these are supposed to be 'all-in-one', this is disappointing. The results from my dishwasher have gotten worse and worse the more I have used these. I am reverting to Fairy Platinum Dishwasher tablets, which are consistently excellent.. And finally, to make matters worse, a number of the tablets have leaked in the bag or stuck together, so I get dishwasher cleaner liquid all over my hand every time I take one out.

For a while I've used the Quantum tablets that you can get unscented and I find for the most part they work incredibly well. That said however I have had the odd complaint from time to time that there's some sort of scent or after-taste that people can supposedly pick up.. As I was running low on the previous lot and running to pick up a new batch of tablets; I was pleasantly surprised when these went on sale during the Prime day(s). Since getting them I've used them exclusively and all complaints seem to have disappeared alongside with their usage.. I was somewhat afraid they'd be too lemony and overpowering, however they leave a nice mild-fragrance behind within the dishwasher and a slight lemony after-smell which seems to disappear quickly from the plates / cutlery themselves. I think it's likely to be the case that these will be my go-to for the Quantum line.

Really the strongest dishwasher tablets I've found. Everything sparkling. One downside is they have very strong smell so if I do a short 30 minute wash the smell is still strong and I need to do an extra rinse or use a longer programme.
I like how clean the dishes are after
Excellent product great cleaning would recommend
Clean sparkling dishes and glasses and keeps machine smelling fresh too.
The tablets received were basic , not as advertised.

Be careful. This isn’t as cheap as it seems. Asda are selling packs of these at £9 for 59 tablets. That works out at 15.2p per tablet. Whereas £22 for 115 as per this deal works out 19.5p per tablet, so more expensive.
This is very nice smell easy to use
Does the job well. The scent is not as pleasant as washing liquids but also does not linger, so it's good.
Great value for the money delivered on time and well packaged.

I have been using the Fairy capsule for several years now and I am delighted. The other brands that I have used did not clean up the plates and pots as well as the Fairy does. I also never have any problems with the dishwasher or the smell. I recommend it with the most confidence.
I find fairy gives better results than Finish
Gets things cleaner and shiny glasses
Used them for years and they are brilliant i put a soiled lasagne dish in and it came out like new.
In my opinion, best tablets on the market. Bit more expensive than finish, but pretty consistent and quality cleaning every time.
The best dishwasher tablets out there. Very fast delivery 👍
Sparkling clean. Cleans even the dried utensils fantastically!
The package is strong and keeps the capsules in good condition. Very easy to use and does the job.
I have been using different dishwasher tablets etc for over 20 years and these ones are giving the best results so far.
Wirklich gute taps für die Spülmaschine. Der Geruch ist super angenehm und das Geschirr Sieht frisch aus und glänzt wunderbar.. Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis auf Amazon ist mehr als überragend.
Put them in the dishwasher and they just melt…I’m having to use two or three per wash…crap!
Schnelle Lieferung, alles wie beschrieben. Vielen Dank
Tun was sie sollen. Für Tiefenreinigung dann aber doch die entsprechend anderen Tabs von finish.
Es lohnt sich die größere Menge zu kaufen, da der Preis der Tabs so billiger ist.. Produkt super. Keine Mängel. Alles wie beschrieben und wunderbare frische Qualität
Probably will not buy these again as they are individually wrapped. Inconvenient, and takes up more space.

Die Pflege einer Spülmaschine ist das A und O, damit das Geschirr auch sauber rauskommt. Spültabs spielt natürlich auch eine große Rolle, die Finish Tabs benutzte ich schon sehr lange und bin auch sehr zufrieden. Werde es mir nach dieser großen Packung nach kaufen!
Für die Menge und den Preis ist das Produkt wirklich klasse.
Macht alles sauber, auch in der Waschmaschine
Da hat bei FINISH auch der #InflationsSparGewinnBWLMaxiHammer zugeschlagen und die Produkte wurden reduziert, leider...
Im Spar Abo gekauft, absoluter top Preis, allerdings ist die Reinigungsleistung eher nur okay als gut.

Nach der Beratung beim kaufen einer neuen Spülmaschinen, vor rund zwei Jahren, benutze ich seit dem nur noch diese Tabs. Günstiger ist ansonsten nur noch Pulver, das ist mir aber einfach zu umständlich. Ansonsten verwende ich Klarspüler und Salz und hab dieses entsprechend der Anleitung des Spülmaschinenhersteller auf die Wasserhärte bei uns eingestellt! Ansonsten braucht man sich auch nicht wundern, wenn die Tabs nicht funktionieren! Außerdem läuft im Regelfall das Eco-Programm (ca. 3,25 Stunden), so dass sich das Tab auch auflösen kann und die nötige Zeit zum reinigen hat. Insbesondre bei den Kurz-Programm ist dieses nicht gegeben, hier sollte man dann auf Pulver setzen oder zu den teuren Tabs greifen. Aber da ich selten sofort nach dem Essen wieder meine Geschirr brauche und nicht die Zeit sehnsüchtig davor sitze oder gut schlafen kann auch wenn das Geschirr nicht im Schrank steht, kommt das eigentlich nicht vor. Das Geschirr kommt sauber aus der Spülmaschine, selbst angebranntes in Auflaufformen war restlos entfernt, die Spülmaschine glänzt auch fast noch wie am ersten Tag also hat keine Ablagerungen. Grob geschätzt läuft die Spülmaschine jeden zweiten Tag und ca. alle drei bis vier Monate lass ich die Spülmaschine mit einem Spülmaschinenreiniger laufen. Auch das wurde mir empfohlen wenn man das Eco-Programm benutzt.
Meine bisherigen billo-Tabs aus dem Discounter haben das Geschirr sauberer, fleckenfreier uns trockener hinterlassen, als diese hier. Leider…

Preis ist wirklich top, nichts zu meckern, aber: Die Teile sind so dermaßen parfümiert dass das ganze Haus danach riecht! Muss das sein? Und dazu noch das vielfach erwähnte Plastik. Das ist alles nicht mehr zeitgemäß.

Die Tabs liefern sehr gute Ergebnisse in einer eher minderwertigen Spülmaschine. Günstige Discounter-Tabs hatten hier deutlich schlechtere Ergebnisse produziert. Den höheren Preis zahlen wir daher gerne.

Purchased these and they work well. They are cheap and do as they say. I recently purchased the Finish Quantum Infinity Shine tablets and found them to be a great deal better for just a couple of pence per tablet more.
Innerhalb ein Tag geliefert super bestens
Es ist eine gute Qualität Aber es wird nur mit 50% Rabat gekauft.. Sonst ist das Produkt viel überteuert.

Die Gläser wie in den Fotos kann ich wegwerfen! Die Teekanne zeigt ringsum oben und v.a. links unter dem Ausguss auch deutliche Schlieren. Dabei sind das relativ teure Schott-Gläser aus Zwiesel und maschinenfest!. Leider habe ich die 1-Sterne Bewertungen erst jetzt gelesen, sonst hätte ich mir dieses angebliche Markenprodukt, nicht gekauft. Bisher habe ich das "Billig"-Produkt von Ja/REWE gekauft und war super zufrieden. Das ist aber aktuell leider nicht lieferbar.. Diese Finish-Tabs werde ich umgehend IN DIE TONNE entsorgen, weil ich sie ja auch keinem anderen schenken kann.
Bin sehr zufrieden und empfehle es weiter und schnelle Lieferung war super. 👍
Macht was es soll. Hab eigentlich keine Probleme mit den Tabs.

Ich habe schon einige Spülmaschinensteine ausprobiert von vielen Marken... Keine sind so gut wie diese hier. Sie machen alles sauber auch in einem 1h Kurzprogramm. Selbst eingebranntes geht weg. Das Salz von Finish und der Klarspüler sind ebenfalls nicht verzichtbar. Selbst ohne per Hand vorwaschen (Teller kurz unter den Wasserhahn halten) wird alles sauber!!. Geliefert wurde es auch ohne Umkarton, sprich nur der reine Finish Karton was ich sehr gut finde da es Müll spart!

Ich bin sehr zufrieden mit den Tabs.. Wir nutzen auch Salz und Klarspüler von finish, alles in Kombination mit der guten Miele Spülmaschine führt zu streifenfreiem sauberem Geschirr.. Tee- und Kaffeeränder werden gut entfernt, ich kann nicht klagen.. Auch Tupperdosen werden gut sauber, einzig helle Kunststoffteile die mit Karotten in Kontakt waren werden nicht mehr sauber, aber das gelingt auch mit anderen Tabs nicht.. Wir bleiben bei den classic Tabs. Wir hatten auch mal die All in one Tabs getestet, dabei aber keine Veränderung festgestellt. Sauberer als Sauber geht ja auch schlecht.

Wir benutzen die Tabs seit etwa einem Jahr und sind generell zufrieden.. Manche Gläser werden zwar immer stumpfer, was evtl. normal ist. Ich sehe es aber auch nicht ein, Tabs mit "57 Funktionen" für sündhaft teures Geld zu kaufen. Fraglich ist, ob dann das Abstumpfen der Gläser überhaupt besser wird.. Da übrige Geschirr ist stets sauber und blitzblank. Der Geruch der Tabs ist auch angenehm. Die Trocknungseigenschaften gehen ebenfalls I. O.. Wir werden sie wieder bestellen.

Eine klare Empfehlung für alle, die kein lästiges loses Pulver und Billigmarken benutzen wollen. Hier ist das Spülergebnis tadellos.. Positiv:. - Tabs im Karton. - große Anzahl. - sehr gutes Spülergebnis. - Tab löst sich komplett auf, keine Rest im Spülmittelbehälter. - streifenfreie Gläser. Negativ:. - alle Tabs sind einzeln in Plastik abgepackt. Wir benutzen unsere Spülmaschine täglich mindestens 1 mal und haben zahlreiche Produkte getestet. Mit den Tabs spart man sich lästiges schöpfen von losem Pulver und erhält ein erstklassiges Ergebnis. Leider sind alle Tabs einzeln in Plastikfolie eingepackt. Dies trennt zwar die einzelnen Tabs und schützt diese vor Feuchtigkeit aber dadurch entsteht auch sehr viel Plastikmüll.. Dennoch sehr empfehlenswert für den täglichen Gebrauch.

Ich verwende diese Tabs und bin sehr zufrieden damit.. Bei all in one Tabs habe ich keinen Einfluss auf das Spülergebnis, mit diesen Tabs schon.. Es sind ein paar Punkte zu beachten:. Der einzige Nachteil ist das ich Salz und Klarspüler extra in die Maschine füllen muss. Dadurch ist die Maschine aber auch verlässlich gegen Kalk geschützt (die wasserhärte kann man ja einstellen und somit wird das Wasser auch weich).. Jeder der sich ärgert weil die Plastikschüsseln usw. nicht trocken werden der kann ja die Taste für extra Klarspülen verwenden, dann wird mehr Klarspüler verwendet und somit auch das Plastik-Geschirr trocken.. Wenn man es zusammen rechnet sind sie auch Wirtschaftlich, denn das zusätzliche Salz und der Klarspüler kosten nicht die Welt.

kammen schnell an und ist super pracktisch und für den preis kann man nicht meckern, Produkt ist wie beschrieben und sie sind noch mal alle einzel in einer folie eingepackt,100 stk für 9.99 ist schon super gunstig , und sie machen das dreckige Besteck tassen und so gut sauber , der duft ist angenehme und man hat keine weissen rückspuhren auf Töpfe und pfannen einfach top.

135 Tabs in der praktischen platzsparenden Papp-Box, für den Preis ist super, sehr zu Empfehlen,. Reichweite bei wöchendlicher Maschinenreinigung ca. 2,5 Jahr ;-))) Salz gib't auch in größeren. Packungen und in kombination mit dem Klarspühler einer Marke ist alles super sauber da alles. aufeinander abgestimmt ist..

Finish in seiner gewohnten Qualität!!. Wenn man etwas den Preis im Auge behält, kann man ein richtiges Schnäppchen machen.. Allerdings kann auch „finish“ an der Verpackung arbeiten, dass oben nicht so viel Luft drinnen ist aber das tut der Qualität natürlich keinen Abbruch!
Leider mussten wir feststellen das hier 3 leere Tabstütchen enthalten waren , aber sonst alles okay.

Wir verwenden seit Jahren nur noch Calgon Produkte für unsere Spülmaschine und da habe ich bei siesem Spar-Angebot gleich zugeschlagen und knapp 18€ für 154 Tabs bezahlt.. Die Tabs lösen sich meiner Meinung nach viel besser auf als die Produkte von anderen Herstellern. Ich finde auch das Calgon besser mit eingetrockneten Speiseresten fertig wird.. Da ich neben den Tabs auch noch Klarspüler und Salz verwende reichen mir die Classic-Tabs .. Einen Stern ziehe ich für die ungeheuere Verpackugsverschwendung ab.. 154 Tabs einzeln zu verpacken ist wirklich unötig.

Habe die Tabs als Superangebot erstanden und bin zufrieden mit dem Spülergebnis.. Die Tabs sind bequem zu dosieren, da man sich lästiges schöpfen von losem Pulver spart. Leider sind alle Tabs einzeln in Plastikfolie eingepackt, was immer Abfall produziert und ein Fisselkram ist.. Ich wünschte, man würde die Tabs wie Würfelzucker im Karton stapeln, dann kann auch nichts zerbröseln.
Verpackung war diesmal besser als beim letzten mal, alle Tabs in 1 Packung . Also kein unnötiger Müll ! Kommen lange aus mit der Packung , ein halbes Jahr circa !
Die Tabs unterscheiden sich bei mehrmaliger Nutzung von No Name Tabs. In der Spülkraft sehr wirksam und Geruchsneutral.
it’s ok, but you’re paying for the brand as the result is the same with the W5 from Lidl and they cost half

Endlich tabs die auch das Geschirr richtig sauber bekommen. Haben jetzt schon einige durchgetestet und mit diesen tabs wird das Geschirr und vor allem die Gläser Glas klar. Und der Preis hier bei Amazon ist unschlagbar.

Geliefert wird das Finish Classic in einem Zweierpack mit je 77 Tabs die sich in einem wiederverschließbaren Pappkarton befinden. Nachdem man ihn vorsichtig geöffnet hat kann man ihn durch einfaches zusammen drücken wieder verschließen. Sehr praktisch.. Die Folie von den einzeln verpackten Spültabs muss man entfernen bevor man sie in die Spülkammer legt.. Die Spültabs Finish Classic haben meine Erwartungen leider nicht erfüllt. Sie lösen den Schmutz wirklich fest sitzenden Schmutz nicht so gut. Auch mehrmaliges spülen mit diesen Tabs brachte bei einigen Plastikschüsseln nicht den gewünschten Erfolg da extreme Schmutzränder zurückblieben. Da ich die Position der Schüsseln in der Spülmaschine verändert habe kann es nicht daran gelegen haben das sie nur "ungünstig" standen.. Da es "nur" die Classic Tabs sind muss man Spülmaschinensalz und Klarspüler zusätzlich in die Maschine geben damit es auch bei den Gläsern und beim Besteck ein zufriedenstellendes Ergebnis gibt.
Die Ware ist einwandfrei. Die Verpackung mußte von DHL erneuert werden.. Es ist höchst Kundenunfreundlich dass obwohl schon Großpackung, diese nur in der Menge 2 bestellt werden kann.
The worst dishwasher Tabs we used so far, very disappointed.
Sind gut.Reinigen sauber.Auch bei niedriger Temperatur.

Die Finish-Tabs kaufe ich immer wieder, da die für mich die Perfekte Leistung/Verhältnis haben.. Das Voratpacket reicht im meinem Fall für 6-8 Monate ( 2 Personen Haushalt). Verpackungsdesign, man könnte auf Plasticktütchen für die Tabs verzichten und stattdessen im den Karton die Tabs zusamen legen wie Kekse.
Ich kann nur empfehlen Preis Wert
Produkt entspricht Erwartung bei normal verschmutzem Geschirr, bei starker Verschmutzung nehme ich Quantum von Finish.
Ich bin zufrieden, habe wiederholt gekauft. Jetzt zu Corona Zeiten wirklich angenehm , wird geliefert und der Preis finde ich auch OK:
Die Tabs kamen pünktlich an und sie halten was sie versprechen!. Top Produkt und top Angebot 👍🏻

Günstigster Riesenpack, den ich gefunden habe. Hält ewig.. Ich finde die Classic-Tabs besser als die mit den ganzen Zusätzen, weil man so besser den klarspülter und das Salz dosieren kann - bzw. macht die Maschine das ja selbst. Hatte zuerst diese Alles-in-einem-Tabs, aber da waren dann immer Schlieren auf den Gläsern. Seitdem ich altmodisch Klarspüler selbst einfülle, gibt es das Problem nicht mehr.

Die Finish Classic Spülmaschinentabs kommen typisch lose in einem Karton daher.. Die einzeln verpackten Taps lassen sich gut und leicht öffnen- bei billigen Tags habe ich da schon schlechte Erfahrungen gemacht.. Reinigungsergebnis und auflöseverhalten der Taps ist hervorragend.. Würde ich jeder Zeit wieder kaufen.. Wenn Ihnen diese Rezension etwas hilfreich war dann drücken Sie doch kurz den "Nützlich-Button" - Danke!

Al jarenlang goede ervaring met vaatwastabletten van DM, deze voor de afwisseling eens geprobeerd. Verpakking is eenvoudig te openen (al is oplosbare folie altijd handiger ;-) Tabletten doen hun werk goed, vettige producten hebben ze wat meer moeite mee.

Die Finish Powerball Classic sind die einfachste Version der Spülmaschinentabs von Finish. Im Gegensatz zu den größeren Geschwistern ist beispielsweise kein Salz enthalten, sodass man gerade bei kalkhaltigerem Wasser noch zusätzlich auf Salz zurückgreifen sollte. Unabhängig davon ist die Reinigungsleistung durchaus überzeugend und liegt bei teilweise kaum höheren Kosten doch gut über dem Niveau von einfachen Tabs aus dem Discounter.
Ich nutze die Tabs mittlerweile seit 1,5 Jahren und bin vollkommen zufrieden.. Das Geschirr ist stets sauber.. Die XXL-Packung ist gerade in Kombination mit dem 6 Monatigem Spar-Abo sehr interessant.
Für denn Alltag ist ganz okay. Ich nehme aber auch die Tabs alles in 1. Einmal im Monat reinige ich die Spülmaschine mit Finish Reiniger . Dann ist das Geschirr immer sauber .
Spültabs die machen was sie sollen - geschirrspülen und das sehr gut.
Kenn ich schon länger diese taps. Mein Geschirrspüler funktioniert nur mit den taps die sind auch super das Geschirr ist sauber und die Gläser glänzen.

Die Tabs haben praktisch keinerlei Reinigungswirkung. Das Geschirr ist nach der Reinigung zum Teil immer noch dreckig, was ich bisher noch nie bei einem Tab erlebt habe. Wir entsorgen die restlichen Tabs jetzt, was sehr ärgerlich ist.
Halten was sie versprechen bei einem guten Preis- Leistungsverhältnis.
Hab die tabs zu einem guten Preis bekommen.. Geschirr wird sauber. Macht also das was es soll.. Daher Kaufempfehlung von mir
Absolutely fantastic tried other dishwasher tablets and they don't have a chance against Finish thank you Amazon.
Nicht schlechter als die teureren Tabs

Habe die Tabs im Angebot ergattert und meiner Meinung nach sind das mit die besten Tabs für die Spülmaschine, bei vielen Konkurrenzprodukten hatte ich das Problem dass sich die Tabs nicht vollständig auflösten und Bröckchen auf dem Geschirr haften blieben. Mit diesen besteht dieses Problem nicht, das Geschirr wird sauber, selbst im 30min Schnellwaschgang.

Die Finish Classic Geschirrspültabs sind weder ihren Namen, noch das eigene Geld wert: sie reinigen schlicht nicht gut genug. Wir hatten vorher die hauseigenen Tabs des Discounters A**I, welche ihre Arbeit sehr gut machten: selbst bei überfüllter Maschine wurden alle Teile sauber, es waren weder Essens, noch Spülmittel oder -wasserreste auf dem Geschirr. Bei diesen Tabs von finish das absolute Gegenteil: selbst bei vorgespültem Geschirr und nur geringer Ladung wird das Geschirr nicht vollflächig sauber. Auf Grund einer Preisaktion und den vielen guten Bewertungen hatten wir gewechselt: Wir werden wieder zu unseren Discounter-Tabs zurückkehren.
Das Geschirr wird sauber und riecht nicht nach dem Spülmittel, so wie es sein sollte und definitiv besser als das günstige (was mehr kostet als das hier) aus dem Discounter.
Alles ok. Es sind nur Tabs für die Spülmaschine....
Man weiß was es kauft. War tolles Preis, deswegen ist hier nicht zum meckern.
Aus dem Haushalt nicht wegzudenken! Der Alleskönner! Super toller Duft und grandiose Reinigung! Absolut zu empfehlen!
Have used this product for the dishwasher more than once. Enough said.
sie sind sehr gut leichte enwendung
I am very pleased with the tablets. Would recommend.
Leider nicht so stark wie andere Tabs anderer Marken. Zudem sind ca 1/3 der Tabs kaputt - man öffnet die Verpackung und findet nur Brösel
Gutes Produkt.. aber nicht so effektiv wie erwartet.
Nicht auszusetzen. Würde ich immer wieder kaufen. Wasche mein Geschirr seit Jahren damit und seither werden die Gläser nicht mehr milchig / trüb. Also Top.
Für den Preis und die Qualität werde ich definitiv öfters zuschlagen. Die Tabs funktionieren einwandfrei. Keiner ist zerbröselt also definitiv keine B-Ware.
Top Preis für diese Menge!. Versand wie gewohnt top!
Für die tägliche Geschirrreinigung reicht es total!. Mein Geschirr wird damit total sauber und es blinkt sogar ohne Spezialsalz!
Very good value dishwasher tablets. I always use this make and have always been satisfied
Man bekommt echt viel für wenig Geld. Für die Dauer echt ein Schnäppchen würde ich jeden empfehlen der nicht immer die normale Größe kaufen möchte.

Very hard tablet, individually packaged. Have to add water into the tablet section of the machine to ensure it dissolves and distributes better during the normal cycle. In terms of price quality comes before quantity. I have used Finish before but the product lacks simplicity; Organic and natural compounds tend to work better.

Seitdem wir die Classic tabs nutzen müssen wir immer öfter mal auf Intensiv-Reinigung schalten, damit alles sauber wird. Für hartnäckige Verschmutzungen wirken die powerballs oder quantum deutlich besser...

Die Tabs sind "in Ordnung" besonders wenn man sie in einem sehr günstigen Angebot gekauft hat. Nochmal kaufen würde ich sie mir allerdings nicht, da die Tabs aus dem Lidl (und auch aus dem Aldi) deutlich besser sind.
Good delivery but not as cheap as I thought when I worked it out.
Spülmaschinentabs die erfüllen was sie sollen. In das Fach rein, Klappe zu, Programm starten und er macht was er soll.

Mir ist seit einiger Zeit aufgefallen, dass die Tabs bei weitem nicht mehr das Ergebnis liefern.. Vor Allem Töpfe und Pfannen werden nicht mehr sauber, haben weiße Flecken, Ränder in Töpfen nach dem Kartoffel kochen gehen nicht mehr ab. Eine manuelle Nachbehandlung ist unumgänglich. Sogar Edelstahlbesteck kommt fleckig aus dem Spüler. Meine Vermutung ist, dass (vielleicht aus ökologischen Gründen) die Rezeptur geändert wurde. Schade, habe diese Tabs jahrelang benutzt, bin nun auf eine Discount Marke umgestiegen mit DEUTLICH besseren Ergebnissen!

Eigentlich wollte ich die Tabs abonnieren, dachte die sind genauso gut wie die Tabs All in 1.. eigentlich haben die Tabs gar keinen Stern verdient, hat beim ersten Spühlgang eine weiße (salzige) Schicht hinterlassen, hab sie dann nochmal gespült da war’s fast noch schlimmer. Bin dann im Laden rein und hab da andere gekauft die All in 1.. hab dann alles von Hand gespült und nochmal in Spülmaschine rein mit anderen Tabs da war Gottseidank wieder alles ok. Ich persönlich kaufe die nicht mehr. Ist direkt in den Müll gelandet
Produkt wurde sehr schnell geliefert. Sie entspricht der Beschreibung und es handelt sich immer Originalware. Also ist zu empfehlen und ich würde es wieder bestellen
Macht das für was sie da sind super pack für einen angemessenen Preis. Bestel ich gern wieder hier.
Toller Preis gutes spülergebnis der Geruch gefällt mir sehr

Top Produkt, hält was es verspricht.
Ich habe dieses Sparpack gekauft, weil das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis stimmt. Die Qualität des Tabs ist bestens und kann es nur empfehlen.
Das Geschirr wird immer super sauber und die Tabs sind günstig, für ein Markenprodukt.

Great value for your money and it wash my dishes well

Recently, we decided to try Finish products as they are often recommended by the dishwasher producers as well as considered to be a premium brand. After first attempts, we were astonished that there were a lot of food residuals as well as white stains. We thought it has something to do with either salt, rinse aid or dishwasher itself. We tried to use the tablet from our previously-used brand and there were no issues. So it was definitely tablets..... We switched back to 2nd tier producer but are stuck with almost unusable 80 tablets.

Das ganze Geschirr bekam mit Finish Classic weiße Flecken und sah nach dem Spülen schmutziger aus als zuvor. Spülmaschine ist ein 2 Jahre altes Marken-Gerät und läuft nicht im Öko-Modus.

These do clean the dishes well and don't leave a residue, so I guess that's the main thing. I do agree with others though in that they have a very strong smell and the dishwasher does have a chemical smell when first opened. I must add that I am particularly sensitive to smells, so it may just be me.. I think all dishwasher tablets have similar ingredients from what I've seen, there's no natural product option unfortunately, so the short lived smell is something that I will have to live with. I give the plates a quick rinse before I use them to remove any potential residue, but probably don't need to really.. Overall they clean the dishes really well and no visible residue, hence the 4 stars despite the smell. Would recommend for their cleaning power.

I've exhaustively tried most if not all of the supermarket brand tablets, Finish's 800 varieties... You name it, in my quest to find a dishwasher tablet that actually does it all - gets rid of ALL the stains, shines up the glass and ALL the trays, pots and pans.. The difference with these was noticeable. They work great on a quick load BUT work best in a fully loaded, long cycle (1-3hrs) with rinse aid and salt. The scent is akin to Fairy washing up liquid and really pleasant once you get over the initial 'bouquet' opening the packet!. Cost... On the Subscribe & Save deal the price is very reasonable indeed, great value for money.. Only downside is the silly foil plastic bag they come in, come on guys. This could be a home recyclable material (and don't be fobbing me off with this Terracycle rubbish, what a token gesture!).
Love these tablets I used to use finish but my glasses would scratch fins these much better. Juice fragrance
Does the job as fairy would do. Didn't notice an improved scent compared to other cheaper rivals.

These tablets remove the food particles from my dishes. However, there always seems to be some invisible soapy-type residue left on the items, and I usually have to rinse the dishes after removing them from the dishwasher in order to get rid of the soapy residue.

I shall buy the Powerball variety next time. These gel things keep "dissolving" in the packet and. there's a big puddle of blue leakage in packet. No water has touched them either.. Keeping using up rather than waste but a different type next purchase.

I prefer Fairy tabs to another well known brand, but only buy when they’re on offer. The prices vary considerably and I find have to keep an eye on the number of tabs in the pack and work out your target price per tab. I don’t pay more than 15p per tab and preferably lower.. These original tabs are just as good as they ever were. They remove grease and leave both glass and crockery clean and sparkling. The fragrance is not too pungent and everything washes streak free, including roasting pans with burning. Highly recommended.
good tablets and I did not mind paying an extra 2 quid more than supermarkets. you can save a little if you buy in store although tbh it was delivered quickly and saved me a hassle
Excellent value and quality, tried this brand for a change and very pleased indeed. Dishes are left sparkling clean.
My preferred dishwasher Detergent. Only criticism: it is offered too frequently for the small household.
Washes really well but we do not like the smell of it.. The dishes smell washed but the smell is really strong.

Really good product. works very well. works on tough grease but you may need to manually wash burnt on food.. will be buying more

Ok so years ago I got burned by the Fairy Lemon tabs which left everything tainted with a weird lemon chemical taint which got into the food and didn't smell good either. Unpleasant and will be returning to Finish tabs soon.

I’d got into a rut and had been using the same brand of dishwasher tablets for years, or one of a small range depending upon which was on a good offer. I was really surprised at what a good job these dishwasher tablets did. My china and cutlery had a much cleaner brighter look and lost the dullness they had gradually developed. I will be swapping to these providing I can buy them on a good offer. I have added Fairy Platinum Plus to my subscribe and save items as it was the only similar ones I could spot. That brings the price down to a reasonable amount but not as cheap as I would like.. UPDATE - DOWNGRADED ONE STAR I have discovered one drawback. These tablets do such a good job of stripping grease that my enamel baking tins and trays no longer work as well and food is getting stuck. i assume a thin undetectable film of grease seems to be essential to their proper functioning. Therefore the food is sticking and I end up with more Soaking, hand washing, or rewashing than before. this is annoying enough to make me consider returning to my old tablets. i have been greasing or oiling the tins but they just don’t work the same.. This also happens with my few non stick tins. i never machine wash my Circulon machine washable non stick pans but I would expect the same would happen.

After using another leading well-known top brand for decades, thought I would switch to Fairy for a variety of reasons..... I have now used Fairy Platinum for a solid trial period of six months and can reliably say that these are significantly superior and I have now converted to Fairy Platinum!. In particular:-. 1. Everything seems a lot shinier and more sparkly.. 2. Stainless steel cutlery is much, much brighter. Original brightness has been restored. Any dullness has all disappeared.. 3. The cleaning power is astonishing. Stains in tea-cups from strong teas just disappear.. 4. Importantly, this product really degreases the inside of the washing machine and the washing machine filters.. 5. In my house, the kitchen is in the basement and needs pumping up one flight. The pump used to get horribly gunked up with solidified white matter, which you might describe as mini fat-bergs, which I always suspected was something to do with the previous dishwasher tablets. The pump needed frequent cleaning.. After six months using Fairy Platinum, this problem has completely disappeared and the pump iremains as clean as a whistle with zero white gunk.. Excellent product which I can highly recommend.

I have been using the Fairy Platinum dish washer tablets for awhile now. These are probably the best of the bunch I have used in the past. Therefore, I stick to Fairy Platinum. They clean well and even on a low heat wash they work well.. This pack is good value, the pack last long and ensures that I save money on economy wash cycles. I now always use Fairy Platinum and stick with it. I still use salt and rinse aid as I need it, as I live in a hard water area, very hard. So, with added salt and rinse aid the dishes come out spotless.. Highly recommended.

These Fairy Platinum all-in-one tablets do a fantastic job, even on very greasy dishes, and have the badge of recommendation from a number of well known dishwasher brands.. This pack contains 65 capsules which will keep even a large household going for a month or more, and they come in a top quality, resealable package. It is essential that the packet is re-sealed after each use, in order to keep the remaining tablets away from water or moisture.. The tablets are quite large but still fitted happily in my standard size Zanussi dishwasher. They have done a very good job on glasses, cutlery and the dirtiest of dishes in my testing, with the glasses really sparkling even after a wash on the short ‘eco’ setting.. Finally I was impressed to learn that that the packet when empty can be recycled through the Terracyle scheme, which is increasingly available in UK workplaces.. This is a premium dishwasher tablet and for me this is an example of thinking about value as well as cost - I like the reassurance of knowing that even a large, dirty load of dishes will be cleaned first time.

I have made the move from Finish to Fairy. After receiving these to try for free I can't fault the convenience nor the cost, especially if I get these on subscribe and save which I have just done for when these run out in the next 2 months or so.. Apart from the good value of buying this larger pack, I found the pack easy to tear open and the resealable clicking plastic inside the package is sturdier than that in some similar products I have used, that annoyingly easily pop open.. There's less waste as everything dissolves and you don't have to take the tablet out a h. plastic wrapper. Also, the smell of other tablet brands (whether completed dissolvable or not) makes me sneeze as soon as I come near them, I feel like my nose is trying to tell me something. This brand does not have that effect on me.. I have had some issues with grittiness and soap spots when using other brands, but so far I haven't had those issues with this one.

I only use Fairy for both dishwashing and laundry because it’s a brand name I have come to trust over the years. I have bought cheaper dishwashing tablets before (waiting-for-payday) and I always find the difference is noticeable, not just in how my dishes are cleaned but how quickly the grease can build up and stick to the filter and the dishwasher starting to smell funky. I always go back to Fairy and tend to save the cheapies for quick inbetween eco washes.. These dishwashing tabs come in a large resealable pouch. Each capsule individually coated (which doesn’t need to be removed before using – just place the capsule in the dishwashing dispenser). The capsules are all in one and contain salt and rinse aid (but I always use a separate top of salt and rinse every 2 months or so) and the powder base contains enzymes that help to break down burnt/baked-on food stains.. I’m happy with how they clean my dishes the first time. Personally, I prefer to use the lemon flavour scent because I love the lemony/citrus scent in my dishwasher. This bag contains 65 capsules which will last us a solid 2 months.

I’m a big fairy dishwasher tablet fan - and these haven’t disappointed me. They do a brilliant job at cleaning, leaving shiny, squeaky-clean dishes. Glass comes out spotless without the greyish marks that can sometimes set when washing in the dishwasher. These tablets are not powder based like different cheaper varieties I have used, which means no powder residue is left. These are pricey so I normally stick to the original rather than platinum. The Platinum variety is meant to be even stronger and more powerful against grease, even grease in the filter. I have a Bosch dishwasher and the tablet fits fine into the slot size.. I do rinse food residue off before I put into the dishwasher to avoid any clogging up of the system, so my dishes aren’t actually as dirty as some of the advertisement ones they show. I am an amazon vine reviewer. I am reviewing the FAIRY PLATINUM ALL in ONE lemon dishwasher capsules. The pack contains 65 capsules and has a total weight of 969 g.. The capsules have 12 “incredible” functions. The capsules contain blue, green and yellow. liquids, together with a white powder. I don’t know what these 4 components do.. The key functions that caught my eye are that the capsules dissolve grease – both from the dishes and the dishwasher itself - and stains. They prevent limescale build up. They have a “short cleaning action” – which I think means the full cleaning cycle takes place in a short time.. Before I reviewed the FAIRY capsules, I topped up the salt and rinse aid on my machine. This is something I normally do on a schedule and so I did not do this especially for this review.. Within the 12 “incredible” functions are salt’ and rinse aid actions. I can’t really test the salt performance, but I can assess the cleanliness of the dishes, pans etc. that I will load into the machine. The pack says the salt action works on all but 5% of very hard water areas. If you live in these areas, then add salt to the machine.. Don’t wash silver with stainless steel as a reaction can occur. Also hand painted or lead crystal items should not be placed in the machine.. The pack has a tear off strip at the top. Below this is a sliding seal along the bag.. Ideally the capsule. The capsule is placed in the dispenser. If it does not fit place it on top of the cutlery basket. For the basket option don’t use a rinse selection as I think the capsule will be washed away before the wash cycle begins.. Add the capsule with dry hands. The contents are corrosive (alkali), so protect your eyes.. I have used my dishwasher for several wash cycles over the last few days. I have not bothered rinsing any dishes etc. as I wanted to set the capsules the toughest test.. In all cases, I used a cycle that lasts 1 hour 15 minutes at 60 degrees C.. In different washes I tried a stainless Bain Marie completely covered in chocolate from my wife’s cake making exploits. I tried flat metal greasy trays after cooking meat and fish on different occasions. Also, the plates we ate this food off. We have a cafetiere with a pink plastic top. The top gets stained with coffee and handwashing is not effective. So, the top, filter elements and glass flask all went into the dishwasher. I put in dirty mugs, spatulas, chop sticks, glass dishes and bowls. In the cutlery basket went stainless knives, forks, spoons, tongs and can openers. In the greasy group I tried the mesh sieve we place on top of a frying pan to reduce “spitting” from the fish we are cooking in olive oil and a normal stainless sieve. We also put dishes in that had been used to roast joints.. The results in all cases were very good. The Bain Marie sparkled, the pink cafetiere top was much cleaner and its glass flask felt and looked very clean. I did not notice any residual food on any item. I think overloading a dishwasher which does not allow a full spray wash would be tough for any capsule and you don’t get a complete wash – so don’t overload. On opening the machine door, I could not smell a lemon, but certainly a “clean” fragrance.. The capsules also are meant to clean other “tough challenges” like the washing machine filter. I checked the filter and the mesh into which it fits at the bottom of our dishwasher. It was clear of grease.. So overall, we are both very pleased with the performance of the FAIRY PLATINUM ALL in One dishwasher capsules. I think based on our rigorous tests I can rate them at 5 stars.

The tablets work well at cleaning, very effective. However they taint any plastic or silicone items very heavily with a perfumey, or detergent smell. Product is quite good, easier to order online during lockdown

We have a brand new Bosch dishwasher and although it is a highly rated machine, we’ve had mixed results using other dishwasher tablets. However, these Fairy Platinum dishwasher tablets have been brilliant every wash. I passed some onto my mum to try too in her dishwasher, a Lamona, and the results were just as good.. All the items came out shiny and clean, without any trace of baked on food in my (rather well cooked) lasagna dish, and they cleaned every trace of the dried-on Weetabix from my kids breakfast bowl’s. Glasswear and cutlery also came out shiny, without a trace or grime or grit, as sometimes has been the case when using supermarket own, or other leading brand dishwasher tablets in the same dishwasher. And when I open the dishwasher I’m greeted by a pleasant light lemon scent, although it’s not strong enough to cling to the crockery, glassware or cutlery.. Far from the cheapest tablets around, at roughly 30p per wash (at time of purchase), but well worth the extra money in my opinion. And unlike other brands, I’ve not yet had to contend with any post dishwasher hand washing, or needing to run everything through again, even when using my economy cycle, which means less cost and less impact on the environment too; win-win.

We used these in a dishwasher without using rinse aid or salt and found the results were completely satisfactory. Everyday dirty dishes came up perfectly clean with each wash, this is including glassware, which shows up dirt and residue more so than other items. There was no need to use a more intense or hotter wash than the standard one that we always use. The smell is fine, though really, once they're clean and dry, you don't want your dishes smelling like anything. Thankfully our dishes didn't smell of anything once they were done. We've since used other, own-brand, dishwasher tablets and found them not as good as these ones. In the bag the capsules come unwrapped and can be popped straight in the tablet compartment.

Buying dishwasher tabs in the supermarket is, I find, a total nightmare. It’s so difficult to find the best value for money when confounded by special offers, new formula, bigger value packs, etc etc. It seems that the manufacturers are determined to confuse the buyer by introducing multiple ‘offers’ combined with different pack sizes. I need a calculator to work out whether, for example, 48 tabs at x is better value than 60 or 65 at y and z. The unit cost isn’t always clearly marked on the shelf label and as a rule of thumb, I prefer to pay around 15p or 16p per tab.. With that in mind, I also consider what it’s claimed it will do...does it help with limescale control and grease in the machine? How do glasses look after washing; are they streak free and how does it tackle a roast tin? Generally, Fairy and another major brand perform well.I’ve tried less expensive in house brands, but haven’t been impressed.. These tabs do exactly what I want. They’re ‘platinum’ where I usually buy original, so I guess they’re slightly,ore expensive. That aside, these perform really well. A roast pan with some extra stuck on bits of potato and parsnip came out clean and grease free. Glasses sparkle and I’m very pleased with how everything has washed. The machine looks and smells clean and I like the lemon fragrance, which I haven’t tried before. They’re good value all round.

These dishwasher tablets offer fantastic results. Easy to use, fantastic shine, cuts through grease, doesn’t scratch glasses the they leave your dishwasher smelling clean and fresh.. So why not 5 stars? Be warned when you get these out of the packet your hands must be bone dry, just one drop of water makes the tablets stick together, we then make the mistake of pulling them apart which released some of the liquid, this stuck even more tablets together. We had to cut about 10 tablets apart and then leave them out on a baking tray to stop them getting stuck together again.. My experience was down to user error but it was an accident that could have easily happened to anyone.

In giving 4 stars for these dishwasher capsules, I'm being slightly grumpy. They're the brand I buy and use regularly, and I favour the lemon scented version for the fresher aroma on first opening the dishwasher after a cycle has completed (although I was incorrectly sent a pack of the plain version instead of the lemon ones requested to review). By and large, I think the tabs are very good - although I have found that occasionally if they've been delivered in hot weather one or two of the tabs stick together inside the pack, and this causes a bit of leakage.. The reason I'm being a little grumpy over these is that the 65 pack is a resized version, concealing what is effectively a price rise - by keeping the price static and lowering the number of tabs the packet contains. The pack itself doesn't have any indication that this is a new size, but I've been buying these regularly as a pack of 70 for the same price.
We used it in the dishwasher and cleaned the pots just fine

Fairy’s dishwasher tabs really are good value - these Platinum dishwasher tablets are no exception, they deliver fresh smelling results every time - no more “wet dog’ smells when opening the dishwasher after cleaning. The tabs are actually easy to handle sachets filled with liquid - which gives them a big advantage over solid blocks - the cleaning fluids dissolve easily into the water and start working straight away. It is important to keep the container sealed to keep these tabs dry... a very good product from Fairy..

These are a big improvement on Fairy tablets of several years ago which were ineffective in hard water areas. They clean as good as Quantum, which this reviewer considers the best of brands, but they leave a perfume which is unwanted and unnecessary. It's not overpowering but very noticeable, so if you're on the bandwagon for reducing chemical odours in the home these may disappoint.

This was listed as a XXL pack but I bought another pack recently from Amazon that was also Fairy Platinum and larger so not quite XXL. Anyway, not mjuch to say. These don't need unwrapped and can just be put straight into the tablet holder in the dishwasher. Dishes smell nice and are squeaky clean when they come out. Cheaper brands can leave a soapy feel so I'd say these are quite good.

There is really not much to say about these Fairy Platinum dishwasher tablets except to say that they work and work very well. The dishes come out clean and the glassware comes out clean and streak free.. The individually wrapped tablets need no unwrapping before use and the wrapping not only protects your hands but also stops the tablets from becoming spongy in potentially humid kitchens.. Fairy also claim that these tablets will also help in keeping the dishwasher grease free, especially the filter.. I do not use any additional salt or rinse aid.. Nothing to fault.

In this pack you get 65 Fairly Platinum All in One dishwasher tablets. In a recent Which? Magazine text these tablets in their Lemon version were listed as a ‘best buy’ by Which? In fact they were massively ahead compared to other tablets. The only negative was the cost although options on this Amazon page for pack sizes may offer some good deals.. The tablets are easy to use and result in outstanding cleaning especially on grease. I’ll be using these tablets in the future. The only downside is that I prefer the lemon scent. Nonetheless five stars.

These Fairy Platinum lemon tablets probably give my dishes the best clean ever and glasses always come out glistening. You also get the added benefit of a lovely fresh smell when you open the dishwasher door.. It's also good to know that these tablets apparently clean the filter to a certain extent, which is always a pain when you need to do it yourself.. I generally only buy Fairy tablets as they are reliable and do the job, and these platinum ones are probably the best they do, with a price that's not excessive.

I have found Fairy Dishwasher tablets to be among the best to use and was delighted to see this lemon scented version. These Platinum ones are an all-in-one tablet and the performance is outstanding. I have brought consistently clean dishes out of the dishwasher - even ones that were more heavily soiled which some other brands wouldn’t have cleaned. The lemon scent is fresh but not overwhelming.

We tend to alternate between Fairy and Finish, depending of who has the better offers. However, on balance I think Fairy has the edge. This particular version is no exception. It really does leave the plates squeaky clean and shiny. Pricing will vary even for premium brands and products, but if these are priced anywhere near competitively, then I don't believe you can buy any better.

Fantastic cleaning and shine to glasses and dishes.. We use a few different dishwasher tablets but Fairy is a brand we return to again and again. Very easy to use and no residue left in the tablet container area at the end.. Super cleaning power even on an eco setting on our dishwasher. Would definitely buy in the future.

These are very good and easy to use no wrapper so just pop them in.. Everything is cleaned perfectly even most stubborn things and glasses look gleaming.. The lemon variety smell great and the whole diswasher smells and looks clean also filters.. Great value for money and a high-performance product, I wouldn’t consider anything else now everything smells so clean and fresh i love them
just switched and really think these make a difference

These fairy platinum dishwasher tablets do afford a good clean and finish. Especially to cutlery in my experience. Here you get a large pack which aren’t cheap. But you do get what you pay for here. Performance is king with these types of products and they perform!
Clean to handle, refreshing smell. The pots and deep in marks were spotless. Glassware bright and shiny. Very large resealable bag easy to handle. Would recommend.

Having used this make in the past was more than happy to try this new variation on them the Platinum type. I am impressed with them so much so. Reasons being I had left a mini dish with cold shepherd pie around the edges instead of putting it into soak. Well this dish when washed using these tablets on a quick cycle it came out sparkling clean. Cutlery wow impressed no water marks and we do live in a hard water area so always have issues with that. Five stars as everything even pots which can sometimes get small marks left if cooking chilli but using these they don’t seem to be any. Also tea stains on cups and mugs came off first wash. I’m saying I’m impressed as did use another called Fairy one a few years back and it wasn’t that great but this better than the branded one I’m using already. It might be a little more money wise but if having to redo stuff costs more in long run. The machine is also left smelling clean and fresh too.
I like Fairy dishwasher tablets; they smell nice and get my dishes clean. They do tend to struggle though on pots and pans, which will sometimes need a second wash.

Dishwasher tablets are like the holy grail....each one promises to be ‘the one’ but still they never quite seem to be right.. These are as close to perfect as I’ve found. I’m so happy with them - really clean, well rinsed, and that’s all on the quick wash!. I don’t need to top up the rinse aid very often now, but I do still add salt. Best of all these Fairy tablets keep the dishwasher clean too.. Top quality and good value. I think my search is over!

These dishwasher capsules are excellent. I have always used Fairy liquid because its the best and lasts longer and these are the same. They get all my dishes and cutlery sparking clean even baked on casserole dishes. Glasses are gleaming with no smears, cutlery sparkles and crockery is shiny clean. Even the dishwasher looks clean inside. As these are capsules rather than tablets there is no powder left behind in the dispenser so all the product is used for cleaning.

Only dishwasher tabs I will ever buy!. Removes all stuck on food waste even without pre-washing and leaves every thing sparkling clean.. Great scent and no residue left behind.. In all of the packs purchased from Amazon I think there’s only been 1 or 2 stuck together/popped when pulling apart
Brilliant service!! Received item on time, well packed and the quality is A++++. Highly recommended, will definitely buy again from this seller.
In my opinion, these are by far the best dishwasher tablets, so when they were on offer at a bargain price, they needed to be bought!
Provides a clean not over scented clean without pre rinsing. ( excess food removed prior to washing!)
A repeat purchase. I use one dishwashing tablet per dishwasher load, they do a good job in cleaning.
Delivery quick and great price. These liquid tablets are the best
Saves carting them home from the shop 20 miles away

I love this dishwasher tablets. One of the best I've used. I've tried different brands but i really like this fairy lemon tablets. It cleans my plates, cutleries, cups & glasses well. It doesn't leave any residue in my dishwasher. It cleans my dishwasher well,, looks shiny & smells lemon. This is my second order. I will continue using this product as it is great.

I love these pods. They really clean my dishes and cutlery. Glass shine like new. Fully recommend this product.

These dish washer tablet take most residue of my dishes i personally rate this product highly
I had been using a cheaper brand of tablets since I had not long purchased a dishwasher. Since using these tablets, I realise how inferior the other tablets were. Lovely sparkling glasses.
One of my fav brand to use!

As prices go up and down I find it difficult to review price wise but tablets are washing my dishes properly! Lesson learned, so took a picture of the bag and it is in my phone for future buying.. Tablets are good for short cycles as well as tough cleaning of pots, pans and oven dishes. It gives amazing clean smell to the whole kitchen-I love it. Will never change for other types or brands

I like how easily they dissolve so if it's only a short wash that's required, the dishes still come out clean. They are gently enough to be left in my sil-granite sink overnight to clean any stains away. The aroma is fresh highly recommend.
Gives good dishwashing result, nice smell and very fair price!

I find that Fairy dishwasher tablets work best in my machine. They leave the load sparklingly clean and a reject is rare. The cleanliness seems to be achieved with less abrasiveness than some other ones I've tried.
Always 5* for this product! It cleans perfectly, no complaint at all! Very good price for the amount of tablets that you get.
Dishwasher tabs fab! Quick safe delivery. Would highly recommend and good price.

Would never buy another Lemon variant and will be sticking to Orignals only in the future.

Yes really good and the smell is nice very pleased with it thank you.
Love them. I have them on subscribe and save, so my next package will be cheaper and so on.. But the most important thing is, I get lovely, clean dishes every wash.. Buy with confidence.

Very pleased with the cleanliness and brightness of pots after using the Finish Powerball Quantum

I usually use another brand, but these were on offer so I thought they'd be worth a try. As a premium dishwasher tablet their performance is disappointing. Cleaning isn't up to the expected standard and items frequently need cleaning again. Also noticing a lot of rust / water spots (despite using rinse aid) which wasn't an issue with the previous brand and glassware is now starting to show clouding and light scratching.

If you buy this product due to a fragrance allergy this is not suitable for you. I have used this product before and it works well. There is usually zero fragrance but unfortunately this product came with fragrance. I assume it has been stored near products that have a heavy fragrance. The bag smells to the point that the entire room smells. I have emptied to the tablets into a previous bag but the tablets smell too. I am having an allergic reaction. I am very disapointed and out of pocket.

These are similar to the Ecover tablets, in that they contain something abrasive to counter whatever has been removed to make them free from preservatives and fragrance. Scratched all of our glasses in a Bosch dishwasher cycle. They also leave some sort of hazy residue on the glass / dishes. Staying clear of these.
Cleans well, no soap or chemical smells to offend wine or fruit juices. Currently very much our favourite.
I really like this as it does not smell, it’s great

Tricky to rate this item with flavour or scent - since by it's nature it has none.. I personally find some other brands leave a taste or residue after washing but these are fantastic.. scent free, come in low packaging. 10/10 would recommend.
With some of the previous tablets we were using, dishes had a strong chemical smell transferring to food. Those tablets are very good, no smell and very effective anyway

Never liked the artificial smell you get with dishwasher tablets. If you can smell it then it’s still on your dishes.. Tried various eco friendly versions but just didn’t clean as well.. Found these, there is no smell and cleans the dishes well. Perfect, really.. There is no plastic wrapping that needs to come off before popping them in the dishwasher.. The pack is big and lasts for ages and a little more environmentally friendly. Think if they reduce packaging or change to recyclable cardboard, would really help the environment more.. Would still buy either way, as a good product and glad I spent a little time looking for them.. Have this on subscription.
Finally no lemony taste on food. I prefer to wash on 65 degrees (but maybe depends on the dishwasher).
Great tablets that don’t leave funny taste/smells.. But watch the price against other stockists.

After getting annoyed with the strong detergent smell from other types of dishwasher tablets, I gave these a try with low expectations of inferior cleaning etc. if I am honest. The wrapper is dissolvable so no fiddling or plastic waste (apart from the bag they come in). More importantly, they do a great job, absolutely no difference from the leading Fairy or Finish versions, but with no overpowering scent. I will not use anything else now. We need more of these types of products!

I have tried all the finish products and I always come back to these. I think its important to stress that I also use Finish rinse aid, finish salt, and I regimentally use a dishwasher cleaner once a month, along with a finish glass protector. If you are using a dishwasher and relying solely on a dishwasher tablet, this is where you are going wrong. I have tried all different combinations, and there is no cheating what they recommend. I thought it may be just a marketing ploy but having left out different parts it is clear for me that one has to endure the cost to keep your dishwasher working as it should. As a result I continually get good results from these tablets, and feel I am doing my bit for the environment. You an also buy these in bulk, 320's at a really good price. With regards to the negative reviews I imagine this is because they dont have a proper cleaning regime.

I’m not keen on the smell of domestic cleaning products, particularly washing machine and dishwasher tabs. For the dishwasher, I usually buy Finish or Fairy as in my experience they perform well. I was delighted to come across these tabs which claim to be odour free and ordered a pack of 80 immediately.. They’re excellent. There’s virtually no smell of tab from the machine after use and they clean just as well as the standard tabs. I’ve used them with glasses, which have come out sparkling and streak free and with a roasting pan with residue. That too was cleaned well. I can’t ask for more...at last no horrible chemical perfume from the dishwasher! These worked out reasonably well at just over £11 for 80 which is under 15p per tablet. Prices vary significantly in the shops and I always check the number of tabs against the price, with a target price not to exceed 15p for dishwasher rutabaga, so these are ideal. Very happy with this purchase and to recommend.

I think this is the best Finish product for dishwashing, i can now put silicone and plastic stuff on the dishwasher as with any other product (even same brand) was imposible as the scents penetrated the dishes and it was just disgusting, this O Finish cleans even better and with not scent is just perfect! Love it!!!
Bought these on offer and there great , really good at greese on plates and pasta stuck to pans. I hope to catch them again on offer as I'll definitely will be buying again,

I could see there were mixed reports on these, but decided to go ahead and try them out. Pleased with results. They work just fine in our dishwasher and it's good to know there are less chemicals in them. Will purchase again.

I got thoroughly fed up with the underlying perfume smell, especially on plastic and silicone kitchen ware, which came from all the other dishwasher tablets I’ve tried. Although these cost more, I’m so pleased to taste just the food now, without the horrible artificial scents spoiling every dish.
These left a film over all my dishes and it was even worse on the plastic jugs. Couldn't clean it off them. The film came off the stainless steel stuff with a wire scrubber. disapointed.

Works just as well as other tablets for everyday dishes, cups etc. Might not work as effectively for items that have been used to cook in the oven. Just needs a bit of rinsing in the sink for these items after they come out of the dishwasher.
Really like these tablets as I don't like fragranced dishes/glasses. Cleans well, without worries

The best dishwasher tablets ever! I have tried to use quite many different dishwasher tablets, however always coming back to the same, these ones! Love it, as Its without fragrance, and you cannot actually smell or taste it on your dishes, not like on the other ones. Definitely would recommend these tablets 100% for those who cannot stand any fragrance on dishes!

These are great, I tend to get them whenever they're on offer. Always leave the dishwasher smelling nice and no artificial scents. Always clean the dishes with nothing left, even on super tough stains. A good value, and good quality dishwasher tablet.

Spend aging testing and looking for a scentless dishwasher tablet that works and this Finish one doesn't disappoint me. Together with Claro rinse aid, works perfectly and every load of my washes are clean and shiny.. DO NOT treat this a an all in one tablet I guess, I have never got cloudy washes like some reviewers. Probably because I have been using this with rinse aid all the time.
Pretty sure these are eco-washed packaging but they work well and actually clean my dishes so can't complain

These tabs wash as well as the regular tabs - without the scents and extra chemicals. So I'm (hopefully) putting fewer "nasties" into the water system by using them.. It now just remains for Finish to produce scent-free rinse aid as well.

It does not have scent or smell. It leaves my dishes clean. It does not leave bitter chemical film on my dishes after a wash, so I do not have to rinse it, as after other "top brand" products. So it is a 5 stars from me. Hope price will stay affordable.

I have struggled for a very long time with fragrance sensitivity and couldn’t use utensils after they had been in the dishwasher. Other dishwashing tablets always left a strong scent and flavour that couldn’t be washed away. But these tablets are brilliant - they clean very well and leave no odours or foul chemical tastes on my dishes. Highly recommend.

Started using these in January when we began to think chemicals were being left behind on our plates and cutlery and affecting the flavour of the food we were eating. Now wouldn’t use anything else - and the kitchen no longer reeks of sickly perfume!
It’s OK, just a tiny bit of eco-friendly scent would make it more worthwhile.

Had noticed the gate left by other tablets of big brands including this brand . Particularly when having cappuccinos where either part of the coffee machine , milk jug or cup was used in a dishwasher with other tablets. Happy to say these work well and leave no after taste.

Thought i'd try these as better for environment and also the packaging is recyclable, can't understand why the bag on this can be but not the others though.
