The date on the back of these is the manufacture date and these have 2 years shelf life I have seen with previous comments customers believe they’re out of date they surely are not.. Buy with confidence

I thought these dishwasher tablets would be amazing, but no, they left deposits on my glassware and were not as good at cleaning stuck on dirt as Fairy tablets are - I learnt my lesson, to spend my money on Fairy tablets instead, may be a little more expensive but so much better!
Habe schon immer Finnisch und bin voll zufrieden Qualität passt und das Geschirr glänzt 😊

I think they are pretty good in actual machine function but make sure your hands are thoroughly dry or it will make them stick together in lumps and its quite normal while on washing up duties you might have dampish hands Well dry them then and they will be fine (If you remember every time ).

New eco design tabs are not great. Don't like these and will start to dissolve at the slightest touch with anything wet. Found them less effective than the Fairy tabs and believe me I'm a dishwasher officianado
Für mich sind das die besten Spülmaschinen Tabs

Great for degreasing but sometimes the dishes come out of dishwasher tasting of soap. Tried all programs on the dishwasher in case that was the issue, no help. Other tablets don’t leave a funny taste.
They worked well but left a taste on most of the washed items. Won’t buy again.
This are the best tablets i ever used in my dishwasher.no need to rinse the dishes . Amazing stuff
No problems and cleans dishes great
Decided to put this new product to the ultimate test, dried in Lasagne dish with no pre-rinse.. It came out absolutely perfect.. Wine glasses were also shining
Scent? Flavour can't put 5 star for that but dishes comes out spotless so good product.
Do the job loverly shine to the glasses.
Never fails, always does a good job👍
Great product really get crockery sparkling
I want a refund this did not work
Leaves the dishes super clean and shiny

We've thrown these in the bin because they make any plastic item smell really strongly which transfers a nasty taste to food and drink.. We had a Pizza placed on a plastic chopping board after being washed with these and I couldn't eat it because of the taste, the kids won't drink water out of any plastic cup that's been washed with these.. The no pre-rinse boast is also a myth as dishes have come out dirtier using these than they used to with the standard Finish PowerBall tablets that we were using before trying these.
Many of the tablets were all melted and stuck to each other. I would guess they have been stored or transported in a environment too hot
I had to wash a couple of times and there were still marks on plates and glasses looked dull

Why on earth do people want their dishes to have any "flavor" or "scent". The perfume in these tablets stays on the dishes (especially anything silicone) and ruined a bunch of my kids dishes.. I bought them because they were the most popular dishwasher tablet, but now I just think people are insane.. Will not buy again.

If they come out of the dispenser these tabs work well but sometimes they don't (About 10% of the time) & they can leave cleaning residue on the the plates etc. This then involves cleaning out the residue out of the dispenser & giving them another wash. Much better with the standard tabs rather that these larger tabs.
This item was received quickly but was out of date. It’s more nearly May and there’s went out of date on 05/02/21. Blue ids not the normal clear colour
After using these for a week, my dishwasher got noticeably dirtier and the contents were not as clean. Bought Fairy again and it improved.
This leaves a bad soapy taste on silicone utensils. I will go back to standard Finish tabs that do not, clean as well, and are cheaper.
Disappointed in these as don't see to dissolve in dishwasher resulting in items not washed. Always buy this brand but won't buy these again

Wir haben die Tabs für einen Test erhalten und diese jetzt ausgiebig getestet.. Die Tabs kommen in einer ansprechenden Verpackung welche einen hochwertigen Eindruck vermittelt obwohl es "nur" ein Beutel ist. Auf der Verpackung wird alles sehr gut erklärt und die Stärken des Produkts deutlich hervor gehoben.. Ich kann schon einmal vorweg nehmen das die Produktversprechen hier wirklich gehalten werden.. Wir nutzen die Tabs in unserer Premiere Spülmaschine die eher zu den Einsteigergeräten gehört und sehr wählerisch ist was Tabs angeht das sie ein gutes - sehr gutes Ergebnis erzielt in Verbindung mit unserer hohen Wasserhärte von 14dH.. Wir haben schon sehr viele Tabs auf dem Markt probiert und viele haben kein gutes Ergebnis erzielt was aber definitiv an der Maschine liegt da unsere alte Siemens Maschine mit allen Tabs super Ergebnisse erzielte. Aber genug davon.. Die Tabs sind bestehen aus drei Kammern welche durch eine wasserlösliche Folie zusammengehalten werden und sind nicht zusätzlich verpackt was ich schon einmal sehr gut finde.. Die Tabs werden wie üblich einfach ins entsprechende Fach gelegt was sich dann während des Spülvorgangs öffnet. Klarspüler oder Salz verwenden wir nicht zusätzlich da unsere Maschine damit einen Schleier auf dem Geschirr hinterlässt obwohl richtig eingestellt.. Die Spülergebnisse waren bisher durch die Bank absolut top. Egal ob eine Lasagne Form mit eingebrannten Rückständen, Kuchenformen oder öliges und fettiges Geschirr. Alles wurde super sauber und glänzt ohne einen Schleier auf dem Geschirr/Besteck. Auch die Maschine sieht aus wie neu von innen. Wenn man die Maschine öffnet ist alles schon trocken (bis auf Kunststoff was aber eher mit der Physik zu tun hat) und es kommt einem ein angenehmer Duft entgegen.. Nach vielen getesteten Tabs nutzen wir im Normalfall die Alio Tabs von Aldi Süd mit welchen wir auch sehr zufrieden sind. Diese werden aber was die Leistung angeht von den Finish geschlagen. Das Ergebnis ist noch einmal besser auch wenn es nicht gravierend ist.. Auch wenn die Leistung des Produkts absolut top ist gibt es einen kleinen Wehrmutstropfen und das ist für uns der Preis. Wo ich aktuell mit den Alio Tabs 7 Cent pro Durchgang zahle liegen die Finish bei 24 Cent. Aber das ist ein Thema welches meiner Meinung nach jeder für sich selbst entscheiden sollte weshalb es hier keinen Abzug gibt.. Wer immer noch nach sehr guten Tabs sucht und bisher Probleme hatte sollte diese hier auf jeden Fall einmal ausprobieren. Von uns gibt es eine absolute Kaufempfehlung .

I wanted to leave it a while before reviewing this product because I wanted to get a sense of how well and consistently it performed, across a wide variety of dishes in differing states of cleanliness. i stopped pre-rinsing dishes entirely, just put them in the sink and even let them build up over the course of a day or so, before transferring them to the dishwasher, to get a sense of how well these tablets would handle it.. The good news is that these tablets handled everything I threw at them, with aplomb. Everything came out very clean, and smelled fresh with a hint of lemon.. In terms of packaging, the product comes in a plastic resealable bag. Others have complained of the resealing aspect of it failing, but I did not have any problems in a damp-free cupboard. It does seem a bit retrograde nowadays to be supplying these things in plastic packaging that has not previously been recycled (or at all). Because this is a product people will buy often it would be nice for Finish to take the initiative and try cardboard or reused packaging.. In summary - I definitely think these are an improvement over cheaper supermarket brands, where you might need to pre-rinse, but you do pay a significant premium for this convenience.

At 30p/wash this is far more expensive than the 7p/tablet ones that I buy from supermarkets, but there's a clear difference in how well they perform.. With these, I don't need to pre-rinse and everything comes out perfectly clean and streak-free.. The "capsules" are almost a gel-like and contain liquids in three compartments, meant to make dishes shine, clean and protect them, and to de-grease. I'm unsure whether these could all be compiled into one larger capsule.. Packaging is a little bit of an issue for me as it does come in a resealable plastic pouch. I would prefer it to come in a paper pouch or card box which is easier to compost and recycle.. Overall these work incredibly well, however I'm not sure I would continue to pay so much per wash. If you have constant trouble with dishes getting cleaned properly though, these could be worth the investment.

These dishwasher tablets are pitched as being premium, with added cleaning power (so you don't need to pre-soak / rinse dishes) and with added shine. However, this comes at a significant price - the unit cost of each tablet is around double that of a 'standard' Finish tablet listed on Amazon. So is it worth the price premium? Personally I'd say no - whilst these tablets produce great results, they are not noticeably better to me across my day to day dishwasher use; I frequently have baked-on dishes and have never ever had to resort to pre-rinsing dishes prior to sticking them in the dishwasher, as standard tablets do a great job for me, day after day. So this product works well and I'd be happy to recommend it based on performance, but not based on a value for money judgment.

Bisher hatten wir immer Spülmaschinentabs vom Discounter verwendet und waren im Großen und Ganzen zufrieden damit. Deshalb war ich gespannt, ob es bei der Reinigungsleistung der Marken-Spülmaschinentabs einen bemerkenswerten Unterschied gibt und nahm das Angebot gerne an, die Finish Quantum Infinity Shine Spülmaschinentabs auszuprobieren.. Diese Tabs von Finish sollen gut, aber dennoch schonend reinigen und für einen extra Glanz sorgen. Und das Alles noch ohne vorspülen.. Die dreigeteilten Tabs sehen etwas anders aus, als die herkömmlichen Tabs. Die Mittel sind eingepackt in einer wasserlöslichen Folie, die sich beim Waschen vollständig auflöst. Sie werden ganz normal ins Spülmittelfach gelegt und man macht sich durch die Folie nicht die Hände schmutzig.. Insgesamt bin ich begeistert von der Wirkung! Das Geschirr wird wunderbar sauber und glänzt auch hinterher schön. Alte Verkrustungen, Angebranntes und Fett wird perfekt gelöst und gereinigt. Es besteht definitiv ein Unterschied zu meinen bisherigen gepressten Tabs.. Da sich die Folie rückstandsfrei auflöst und biologisch abbaubar ist, wird auch die Umwelt nicht so belastet.. Ich kann diese Tabs bedenkenlos weiterempfehlen. Der Preis pro Tab ist zwar schon an der oberen Grenze, aber die Leistung rechtfertigt es. Am besten, man schaut, dass man ein Sonderangebot erwischt, dass es bei Amazon ja immer wieder mal gibt.. Vielen Dank, dass Sie sich die Zeit genommen haben, meine Rezension zu lesen. Ich hoffe, ich konnte Ihnen bei Ihrer Kaufentscheidung damit ein wenig behilflich sein.

Ich habe schon viele Geschirrspülreiniger ausprobiert, Tabs, Pulver, billige, teure...das Endergebnis war okay aber nicht zufriedenstellend.. Aber mit diesen Tabs hat sich Finish selbst übertroffen! Bei dem Vorgänger gab es häufig einen Bruch oder eine Beschädigung an den Tabs, sicherlich auch bedingt durch die Lieferung. Das gehört aber der Vergangenheit an! Die Tabs sind nun so konstruiert, dass diese sehr flexibel gestaltet sind und so unversehrt zu Hause ankommen.. Die Tabs befinden sich in einer im Wasser auflösenden Folie und durch das neue Kammersystem löst sich diese noch besser und zeitgenauer auf. So hat man ein absolut Traumhaftes Spülergebnis!. Nun aber zum Abwasch *grins* Spülmaschine eingeräumt mit angetrocknetem Essenresten auf dem Geschirr, fettigen Töpfen, Gläsern und Besteck einsortiert und die Spülmaschine auf 55°C eingestellt.. Alles ist blitzeblank und selbst die Spülmaschine glänzte auch von innen wie neu.. Ich war begeistert. Das Oberste Fach herausgezogen, und erst einmal die Gläser untersucht, ja das Ergebnis kann sich sehen lassen, strahlender Glanz und keine Glaskorrosion.. Auch die Edelstahltöpfe, das Besteck, alles war zu meiner vollen Zufriedenheit sauber.. Bevor wir diese Tabs verwendeten, haben wir unsere Weingläser immer von Hand abgewaschen, damit es richtig sauber wird, selbst nach der Spülmaschine musste man sie polieren. Das gehört aber mit dem Finish Quantum Infinity Shine nun der Vergangenheit an.. Dafür gibt es eine klare Kaufempfehlung und 5 Sterne.

Wir nutzen schon immer Quantum für unser Geschirr. Unserer Meinung nach reinigen sie am besten. Nun also gibt es eine neue Variante, und wir griffen zu, als sie uns angeboten wurden.. Die Tabs bieten drei Kammern mit flüssigem Inhalt, sind etwas flacher und weicher, werden aber noch immer einfach in die Maschine gelegt. An der Nutzung hat sich also nichts geändert.. Laut Anbieter sind die neuen Tabs so gut, dass Vorspülen entfällt. Aber stimmt das?. Yepp, es stimmt. Wir verzichteten für den Test auf den Vorspülgang und siehe da - alles wurde sauber. Ob sich die Tabs tatsächlich, wie angegeben, schneller auflösen, vermag ich nicht zu sagen, denn wie soll ich das herausfinden? Es wird wohl so sein, sodass die Wirkung früher einsetzt. Am Ende kommt sauberes Geschirr aus der Maschine; Besteck und Gläser glänzen, Töpfe sind sauber.. Was den Geruch des gespülten Geschirrs anbelangt – oder auch der Geruch während des Vorgangs, wenn man mal rasch was nachschiebt, ist sehr angenehm und frisch; das gefällt uns. Ebenso gefällt uns, dass die Tabs weniger Chemie enthalten als ihre Vorgänger. Da wir genug Chemie in unseren Gewässern haben, kann das nicht schaden!. Vieles von dem, was geschrieben steht, können wir nicht testen und müssen uns auf die Aussage des Herstellers verlassen. Was wir testen können – Sauberkeit, Geruch … überzeugt uns. Natürlich sind 24 Cent pro Spülgang keine Kleinigkeit, aber dafür spart man an anderer Stelle Geld ein. Daher 5 von 5 Sterne!

Die Tabs mit den drei Farben fühlen sich knuddlig an, passen so wohl auch in jedes Fach für Spülmittel einer Spülmaschine. Bei unserer Siemens lösen sich die Tabs rückstandsfrei auf. Mit dem Ergebnis sind wir jetzt zufrieden, es wird alles gut sauber. Problematisch sind ja immer Gläser, aber auch die sind klar und sauber.. Klarspüler und Spülmaschinensalz braucht es halt weiter.. Billig sind die 80 Tabs nicht gerade, aber es kommt ein gutes Ergebnis heraus. Auch die verschiedenen Öko-Spülgänge mit kälterem Wasser bewältigen die Finish-Tabs.

Die 80 Geschirrspültabs kommen in einem Sparpack, einer großen Tüte. Der Beutel ist wieder verschließbar, man muss den Inhalt also nicht umpacken. Die Tabs sind jeweils in wasserlöslicher Folie verpackt und brauchen nicht ausgepackt zu werden. Man spart sich das Gefummel mit den evtl. aggressiven Reinigern und Salzen, aber ich frage mich allerdings immer, ob dadurch nicht wieder Mikroplastik ins Abwasser und damit in die Umwelt gelangt? Die Tabs kosten 24 Cent pro Stück und sind damit mehr als doppelt so teuer, wie die weiß blaue Eigenmarke mit allem drin eines Supermarktes, die wir sonst immer benutzen.. Die Maschine riecht nach dem Öffnen ganz angenehm, nicht so nach "nassem Hund", wie bei manchen Tabs von Discountern. Das Geschirr ist sauber, auch die Töpfe. Gläser und Besteck glänzen. Ich spüle allerdings dennoch grob vor, da es mir eine gruselige Vorstellung ist, die ganzen matschigen Lebensmittelreste in der Maschine kreisen zu lassen, zusammen mit den Gläsern... Wäre sicher nicht nötig, ist aber ein Kopfding. Das Reinigungsergebnis ist wirklich sehr gut, allerdings schafft unser bisheriger Reiniger das genauso gut, vielleicht aber auch nur, weil unsere Maschine noch neu ist und super reinigt im Vergleich zur alten. Deshalb würden wir persönlich die Tabs aufgrund des hohen Preises nicht nachkaufen, obwohl sie wirklich gut sind.

Die Spülmaschinenreiniger von Finish sind nach meiner Erfahrung im Vergleich zu anderen Produkten eher mild, was mir der Kundendienst eines bekannten Pfannenherstellers vor kurzem bestätigt hat. Deshalb habe ich in der Vergangenheit häufig zu anderen Mitteln gegriffen, damit mein Geschirr auch wirklich sauber wurde.. Umso neugieriger war ich auf die Wirkung dieser Tabs, die ich bisher nicht kannte - und wurde positiv überrascht. Passend zu meinem Frühjahrsputz trudelte das Testpaket ein und durfte gleich zu Beginn zeigen, ob es angelaufene Gläser selbstständig reinigt. Dies klappte einwandfrei - ich konnte die Gläser strahlend und glänzend sowohl nach dem mehrstündigen Eco-Programm, als auch nach dem einstündigen Programm bei 65 °C aus der Spülmaschine ausräumen. Die Folie hat sich rückstandfrei aufgelöst, Spülmittelreste konnte ich nirgendwo entdecken.. Aber auch das andere Geschirr wurde bislang immer sauber, angefangen bei normal verschmutzten Tellern, Gläsern und Besteck über die wöchentliche Reinigung unseres Kaffeevollautomaten bis hin zur fettigen Dunstabzugshaube. Lediglich angetrocknete oder angebackene Rückstände konnte ich noch nicht testen, da die Spülmaschine bei uns täglich läuft und ich angeklebte Reste grundsätzlich kurz einweiche oder zumindest mit Wasser abspüle.. Die Wirkung dieser Tabs ist gut und in Ordnung - sie erfüllen ihren Zweck und reinigen das Geschirr rückstandsfrei. Ich frage mich lediglich, ob ich mit der Klarspül- und Salzfunktion die Umwelt nicht zusätzlich belaste, da meine gerade mal 3 Jahre alte Spülmaschine weder ohne Salz, noch ohne Klarspüler läuft - ob ich hiermit doppelt dosiere, konnte mir bisher noch niemand beantworten.

Zum Ausprobieren wurden in einem Verkaufsbeutel die "Finish Quantum Infinity Shine Spülmaschinentabs, Sparpack mit 80 Tabs" kostenlos zur Verfügung gestellt.. Die bebilderte Produktseite beschreibt die Spülmaschinentabs ausführlich.. Ausprobiert in einer Geschirrspülmaschine von Miele ergab die Anwendung gemäß der Anleitung einige Probleme.. So wurde bei normal bepackter Maschine der Beutel mit dem Reinigungsmittel gegen die im unteren Korb befindlichen Teller geschleudert und blieb daran hängen.. Ergebnis verklebte Spülmittelreste, die von den Tellern abgepuhlt werden mussten.. Bei der nächsten Anwendung wurde die vordere Reihe des unteren Korbes mit Tellern gefüllt die einen kleinen Durchmesser haben, Dessertteller und Schalen.. Diesmal verteilten sich die Spülmittelreste an den Besteckteilen im Korb ganz rechts in der Maschine und mussten von dem Edelstahlbesteck abgepuhlt werden.. Also irgendwo abgeprallt und hängen geblieben.. Beim nächsten Waschgang wurden Pfannen flach in den unteren Korb gelegt und der Reinigungsvorgang verlief erfolgreich.. Der Versuch mit anderer Bestückung der Geschirrkörbe endete mit verschiedenen Ergebnissen, mal verklebt, mal gut.. Allerdings ist es nicht kostengünstig, wenn ein Spülmittel nur mit halb voller Geschirrspülmaschine wirklich funktioniert.. Über Jahre werden hier die gepressten Pulvertabs mit Finish Classic aus ihrem Beutel ausgepackt und mit der Miele Maschine ohne Probleme verwendet, damit bleiben wir bei den zuletzt genannten Tabs.. Da das hier kennengelernte Verhalten der Finish Quantum Tabs vielleicht an der Konstruktion der Miele Geschirrspülmaschine liegen könnte, wäre es nicht fair die Quantum Tabs mit nur einem Stern bewerten.. Trotzdem führt dieses Verhalten, wegen der erheblichen Nacharbeiten am Geschirr, zum Abzug in der Bewertung, denn ein anderes Produkt desselben Herstellers bereitet seit Jahren keine Probleme.

Die Spülmaschinen-Tabs von Finish habe ich in der Vergangenheit schon öfters genutzt, da ich mit diesen sehr zufrieden bin. Außerdem finde ich es praktisch, dass man die Tabs nicht auspacken muss. Sie können direkt in die Tabkammer.. Allerdings sind meine Quantum Ultimate, hier: Quantum Infinity Shine.. Ich bemerke aber keinen Unterschied. Sie haben ebenfalls drei Kammer: Pulver gegen Eingetrocknetes, Gel gegen Fettanschmutzungen und flüssiger Powerball für Glanz.. Im Laufe der Jahre haben wir mehr oder weniger alle gängigen Marken daurch. Finish ist die eine unserer beiden Favoriten. Allerdings ist unsere Geschirrspülmschine nicht mehr die Allerneueste ;-). Ich kaufe die Tabs meist direkt in der Drogerie, da kostet das Stück 0,15 Euro - diese kosten 0,24 Euro. Nur mal so aus Vergleich ;-). Der Preisunterschied erklärt den einen Stern Punktabzug.

Bei uns kommt in die Spülmaschine eigentlich fast alles rein, außer hochwertiges Porzellan oder z.B. auch die guten Messer nicht, damit diese scharf bleiben.. Primäre Aufgabe für Spülmaschinentabs ist für mich, dass ich Gläser, Tassen, Besteck, Tasse, Teller, auch Töpfe und Deckel ohne viel Aufhebens in die Spülmaschine verräumen und ohne nachpolieren nach dem Spülgang wieder in die Schränke und Regale räumen kann.. Das machen diese Tabs von Finish Quantum allemal, aber es muss nicht alles glänzen wie eine Speckschwarte.. Preislich rangieren die Tabs pro Spülgang im oberen Drittel. Bei den Eigenmarken der Drogeriemärkte bekomme ich die gleiche Reinigungsleistung für 10 - 15 Cent pro Spülgang. Daher sollte man diese Variante dann nur wie angepriesen für die hochwertigen Dinge nutzen.

Ich benutze schon länger Spülmaschinentabs von der selben Marke. Allerdings bisher immer nur eine ähnliche Sorte, die noch extra in Plastik verpackt ist.. Das ist hier wirklich perfekt: die Tabs sind nämlich alle schon Verpackungslos und Können so wie sie sind in das spühlmaschinenfach gelegt werden.. Es gibt hier drei verschiedene Inhaltsstoffe mit unterschiedlichen Farben (rot, blau, weiß).. Das Geschirr ist immer schön sauber und ohne Schmierfilm nach dem Waschgang! Sehr zu empfehlen!!!

Die Finish Quantum Infinity Shine Spülmaschinentabs (was für ein Name) werden ganz normal in die Dosierkammer gelegt.. Bei den Tabs sind Klarspüler- und Salzfunktionen integriert, dennoch sollte bei hartem bis sehr hartem Wasser (so wie bei uns) nicht auf zusätzliche Salz- und Klarspülerprodukten verzichtet werden.. Die Tabs haben sich bei unserem Test vollkommen aufgelöst und das Reinigungsergebnis war sehr gut. Insbesondere die Gläser strahlten - keinerlei Wasserflecken oder andere Beeinträchtigungen.. Der Duft ist angenehm.. Aber die Tabs sind mir zu teuer. Sogar die Finish Quantum Ultimate Spülmaschinentabs, die ja kaum schlechter sind, sind deutlich billiger. Von Discounter-Spülmaschinen-Tabs möchte ich erst gar nicht reden. Deswegen ziehe ich auch einen Stern ab.

Ich kann die Spülmaschinentabs sehr empfehlen. Das Geschirr wird wirklich sauber, auch wenn man mal ein Schnellprogramm auswählt. Es gibt auch keine merkwürdigen Wasserflecken, nachdem es getrocknet ist (dazu aber auch immer Salz nachfüllen).. Ganz praktisch finde ich, dass man die Tabs inkl. Hülle in die Maschine legt und so auch nicht in direktem Hautkontakt mit dem Reinigungsmittel kommt.. Fazit: Geschirr wird sauber und die Handhabung ist einfach, das sind für mich das allerwichtigsten Kriterien.

The packaging is fairly large - see the comparison with the baked bean tin. The bag is only about two thirds filled with tablets so you can fold the top of the bag down to save height storage space in a cupboard.. The tablets do seem to create very slightly more of a noticeable glassware shine than the regular Quantum Ultimate tablets do. The smell of the Infinity Shine tablets on the finished dishes is more noticeable - and I think nicer - than than the usual Quantum Ultimate tablets. There's a much stronger but still very pleasant and refreshing lemon smell. It adds to the sense that the dishes and glasses are sparkling clean.. The only difference between these tablets and the regular Quantum Ultimate tablets seems to be the little blue specks in these Infinity Shine tablets. You can see this in the picture where the Quantum Infinity Shine tablet is at the bottom and the Quantum Ultimate tablet is at the top.. Other than that, the listed chemical makeup of the tablets is the same except that Quantum Infinity Shine doesn't contain limonene - a natural extract of lemons as the scent. Instead the Infinity Shine tablets contain benzyl benzoate and geraniol. Interesting then that the dishes and glasses have a lovely lemony smell.. I would definitely buy these tablets in preference to the usual Quantum Ultra tablets if only for the nicer smell when the dishes are washed.

Nach allen durchprobierten Marken von Geschirrspültabs bin ich bei finish hängen geblieben, weil es einfach am effektivsten reinigt. Die selbstauflösenden 3-Phasen-Tabs sind im Handling praktisch und ohne weiteren Verpackungsmüll einfach in die Dosierkammer einzulegen.. Ich spüle mein Geschirr nie vor und dennoch wird durch finish alles porentief rein. Die Maschine riecht und glänzt hinterher immer sauber.. Die Infinity Shine Tabs erfüllen alle Anforderungen, reinigen selbst Angebranntes zuverlässig.. Hier haben wir mit Protection Shield die Variante, die Glas und empfindliches Geschirr (auch Silber) schützt. Das kann ich bestätigen. Bisher konnte ich keine Glaskorrosion oder Dekor-Beschädigungen am Geschirr feststellen.. Tolles Produkt! 80 Stück für den Preis auch top! Klare Kaufempfehlung!

Gel Tabs gibt es schon seit längerem für Spül und Waschmaschine. Seit dem sie auf den Markt kamen nutze ich die finish Gel Tabs. Der Grund und Vorteil ist, die Tabs lösen sich besser auf, bei den gepressten Tabs kam es häufiger vor das sie sich nicht aufgelöst haben.. Selbt im ECO Programm um die 50 Grad werden Töpfe,Gläser, Besteck und Teller gleichermaßen sauber. Finish ist der Marktführer, dies hat allerdings auch seinen Preis, am besten schauen wenn die 80er Packs im Angebot sind. Bei Amazon ist dies öfter der Fall und man hat einen Preisvorteil gegenüber dem Einzelhandel

Wir verwenden schon seit vielen Jahren ausschließlich Tabs von finish.... Die Finish Quantum Infinity Shine Spülmaschinentabs reihen sich in Qualität den restlichen Produkten der Marke finish ein. Klar kostet Markenqualität auch etwas, jedoch waren wir immer vollauf zufrieden.. Die Tabs haben eine sehr gute Reinigungsleistung, lösen sich Rückstandslos auf und auch die Gläser behalten ihren Glanz ohne Schlieren oder Schleier.... Ich gebe daher gerne volle Punkte und kann das Produkt nur wärmstens empfehlen.

The dishwasher tablets are great. Everything comes out really clean and I do think the glasses and plates are gleaming shiny. I love that there isn’t extra packaging in the bag as the tablets aren’t individually wrapped. £16 for 80 isn’t the best value I’ve seen though.

It’s needless to say that Finish is many people’s go-to brand for most essential kitchen products. It still is so far the highest grade dishwasher products I’ve ever used.. The brand new Infinity Shine line has worked out as an upgrade from what I used to get. The quality of Finish remains so high that never have I worried that my dishes don’t come across as sparkling clean. It’s the absolute finest I can get for my dishwasher.. Such great value for a high quality essential product. I have no choice but strongly recommend it!

Tabs von Finish nutze ich seit Jahren, sie haben mich immer überzeugt. Genau wie die Powerball Quantum Infinity Shine, die sogar noch besser sind. Super Reinigungsleistung und praktisch in der Anwendung.. Die Spülmaschinentabs bestehen aus 3 Kammern (Pulver, Gel, roter flüssiger Powerball) und erinnern ein wenig an Waschmaschinen Pods. Die Anwendung ist einfach, die kleinen Beutel werden in die Dosierkammer der Spülmaschine gelegt. Sie lösen sich während der Reinigung vollständig auf.. Selbst bei einer sehr vollen Spülmaschine mit Töpfen, Grillplatten und Geschirr wird alles perfekt sauber, Fettrückstände werden vollständig entfernt, ein Vorspülen ist nicht notwendig. Besteck und Gläser werden absolut trocken, ganz ohne Flecken.

Well these Finish quantum infinity tablets are fantastic. An excellent brand that delivers exactly as promised. They are the best selling brand for a good reason. You get eighty little tablets in the bag which is plenty for the current price of £12.00 (15p each). These dishwasher tablets are obviously more expensive than the non branded version, but as they say you get what you pay for. There’s no need to pre-rinse. All sorts of even dried on food comes off without any problems. Great cleaning power in a small capsule. Glasses and pots and pans all came out very clean. No complaints from me.

The finish quantum infinity shine tablets arrive in a simple, resealable bag. They are fantastic for cleaning a full dishwashers worth and seems to do the trick on all different items including my pots and pans.. I’m pleased with the shine these tablets leave on the glasses, they don’t have the usual misty finish that the glass gets from regular store brand tabs.. These tablets do come with a hefty price tag but I have to say that they are the best quality dish washer tab that I’ve tried. I think that the packaging could be a little more substantial. I wouldn’t usually ask for more packaging on any product but things like these need to be a bit more secure and airtight. Overall, very effective on removing food stains from my white dishes, removing grease and grime from pans and leaving glasses sparkling.

In order to test these tablets I left my plates and pots and pans for three days before washing them. All of the crocks came out clean and sparkling with no dried on bits left. There was a very noticeable difference from my normal brand of tablets - so much so that I will not be using the old brand again and will instead stick to these. They may be a bit more expensive but the difference is worth it in my opinion.

Die "Finish Quantum Infinity Shine Spülmaschinentabs – Kraftvolle Reinigung mit besonderer Schutzformel für Gläser, Dekor, Silberbesteck – Sparpack mit 80 Finish Tabs" kommen in einem großen, wiederverschließbaren Standbeutel.. Die Tabs bestehen aus drei Komponenten, die getrennt eingeschweißt sind in kleine Pads. Diese werden unausgepackt in die Spülmaschine gegeben, die Folie löst sich rückstandslos auf. Dabei überzeugen die Ergebnisse, bislang war alles einwandfrei sauber.. Alles in allem super Spülleistung, das aber auch für einen stolzen Preis.

As a regular dishwasher user I was keen to try the Finish tablets. Whilst these weren’t like my usual brand of dishwasher tablets they are effective. The plates etc have come out clean and smear free. You have enough tablets to keep you going for over two months but are not scented.. Whilst the prices vary from store to store these were a little on the expensive side for a regular one off purchase, but the convenience of having them delivered to your door is an added advantage. Another plus to buying them this way, is you can set up auto delivery which does reduce the price and can be altered if you find you become overrun with them.

Yes, this washed the dishes. Did it leave them extra gleaming? No. I prefer Fairy Platinum. I have tried multiple tablets, supermarket own branded and branded. I'm afraid the marketing on this just makes me think of Buzz Lightyear.
Hervorragendes Spülergebnis: Die Gläser glänzen und sehen aus wie neu und das Geschirr ist definitiv trockener, als bei meinen herkömmlichen Tabs.

Pack of 80 dishwasher tablets by 'Finish', a different concept to what i am normally used to, they're a bit different looking but worked really well in my dishwasher especially with my drinking glasses they came up sparkly and shiny as well as my oven trays, they even removed the hardened stuck on food and i didn't have them on a power wash just an eco wash.. I normally have to take wrappers off my dishwasher tablets but these just pop in and are ready to go. At £12 at time of writing, i think it's a good deal. They work well and I am happy with their performance.

Die Geschirrspültabs konnten wir ausgiebig testen und können sagen, dass wir mit dem Reinigungsergebnis zufrieden sind. Das Geschirr wird gut gereinigt, die Gläser glänzen ganz schön. Wir können das Produkt weiterempfehlen.

Tolle Idee mit der Folie, die sich selbst auflöst! Die Tabs sind super und reinigen das Geschirr prima. Die Folie löst sich rückstandslos auf.. Das Geschirr strahlt und glänzt. Und wird sehr sauber.. Die Tabs haben 3 Kammern: Pulver gegen Eingetrocknetes, Gel gegen Fettanschmutzungen und flüssiger Powerball für besten Finish Glanz. Mega cool!. Ich bin absolut zufrieden!

Ich bin ein großer von Finish Produkten und kann auch zu den Quantum Tabs nur gutes Feedback abgeben.. Das Dreikammernsystem mit dem Pulver gegen Eingetrocknetes, das Gel gegen Fettverschmutzungen und flüssiger Powerball für schönen Glanz wird das Geschirr hervorragend sauber.. Der Geruch ist sehr angenehm und frisch.

These finish dishwasher tablets are great - and also a bit strange.. For instance, they are not really "tablets". For some reason the dissolvable plastic pocket has three separate parts - presumably the detergent, the salt, and the rinse agent - rather than these three elements being combined in a single tablet.. I have no idea why or if it makes any difference - the pocket does not make any claims for this unusual design - but they are very effective. I've used them for a couple of weeks now at various temperatures and various levels of baked on food, and the results have all been very good. I cannot fault them.. They do a great job.

Very good dishwasher tablets. We normally get the cheaper Supermarket own brand ones but these are much better. The glassware comes out clean and clear. No residue. There's a fresh scent when I open the dishwasher. We also use it for cookware and again comes out very clean even if it had been quite greasy. It means I don't need to scrub things before placing them in my dishwasher like I normally do. So it saves me time. It's a bit pricey but the quality is unbeatable.

We've tried using budget-price dishwasher tablets with disappointing results - this is one area where it's not worth skimping.. Finish are simply the best in terms of cleaning quality. Plus, they leave the dishwasher smelling great too. Definitely worth paying a little extra for these.
Fantastic, great value for money and left my dishes sparkling clean! Definitely recommended!
Work great,. glass seems less 'streaky' coming out of dishwasher.
Always happy with these - clean everything really well and good value too in bulk.
Good wash with these however you do get several pouches stuck together and when you try to separate them they burst which is a waste - better packaging needed ?
Brilliant in a hard water area and really cleans. Used finish before and was not impressed but this product is brilliant, great cleaning which was what I expected originally. Nice scent
These are the best we have used to date! I put one star for flavour even though I’ve never tasted them, I’m just guessing they don’t taste nice and certainly don’t recommend finding out!!
Dishwashing! What it meant by flavour? Odd question for a product that is not investable. There is economy of size in each capsule. Good for storage.
Does what you expect. Cleans glasses and dishes to a very high standard. Would highly recommend
These are good dishwasher tablets that leave plates clean and glasses sparking. Very happy with this - the 80 tablets will last for weeks so very good value too
Quick delivery. Good value for money
Yellow and white ones million times better these were awful! Never again
Sehr gutes Produkt. Reinigt sehr gut auch bei niedriger Temperatur.
Tolle Tabs, die auch Teeränder bei geringer Temperatur entfernen.

Das Produkt an sich ist top. Bessere Tabs hab ich nie gehabt. Selbst Plastik kommt trocken aus der Maschine. ABER: der Preis ist ein Unding. Ich habe das gleiche Produkt bei einem Discounter für 7,99 € heute erworben. Hier über 18 Euro. Also 3x so teuer.. Sicher nie wieder für den Preis.
Für die Spülmaschine nur Somat. Man kommt mit einem Eimer sehr lange hin & der Eimer ist später für andere Dinge verwendbar.
Lieferung bereits am Folgetag der Bestellung gegen Mittag. Preis ist völlig in Ordnung. Es hat alles einwandfrei funktioniert. Tabs mit einer der besten!
Eine wirklich gute Reinigungsleistung - das Geschirr wird wunderbar sauber.
It might be a bit costly but somat never really disappointed me
Wirklich gute taps für die Spülmaschine. Der Geruch ist super angenehm und das Geschirr Sieht frisch aus und glänzt wunderbar.. Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis auf Amazon ist mehr als überragend.
Put them in the dishwasher and they just melt…I’m having to use two or three per wash…crap!

These dishwasher tablets are brilliant! Pots come out clean and glasses sparkling.. we don’t add any salt or rinse aid to our machine either.. Value for money, 83 tablets and delivered to your door…plus the packaging is recyclable.., what’s not to like! 5* from me!

Bought on a special deal so worked out reasonable value for money. I always use finish (set in my ways) and these are exactly what I expected. You can get them similarly priced in some high street shops but at least these were delivered. Would never pay usual Amazon price but the deal made it worthwhile.
Good dishwasher tablets, you don’t have to check if the dishes are clean. Good price also.

Normally buy these from my local supermarket... Amazon had them for less than I normally pay... Always use these tablets as I have never had any problems with them. I always use the ECO Wash on my machine (50c) and it always manages to clean perfectly.. Would purchase again.. if they were at a competitive price again .
You need to use 2capsule not 1 there was no scent quality of clean left a stain on the glass I was not happy
Bought when they were on a lightening deal, good value and work well
Cheaper than in the supermarket. I like using this. It does a perfect job. Mind you i have an expensive dishwasher. That helps too.
Really great value for money and does exactly as expected
Value for money and give fabulous dish wash
Great price and do what they should

Great product. I'm using every other day and never failed me. I found it difficult to dissolve on short cycles. It may be my dishwasher, being an old model, but I don't know. Overall, I'm happy with it
effective in use noticeable difference to others

What a water saver just load up the dishwasher and put it on with a Finish pod. as I am disabled it’s making my life easier less standing at the sink and they are more economical than the liquids that I used to use
We have the dishwasher on everyday and this is a Great value pack. Got additional 10% off on subscribe and save, which was handy. Finish quantum tablets clean well and I am happy with the purchase.
Great as usual and when on offer are good value for money.
Dishwasher, it was the non lemon 🍋, that made me choose this particular product, gets stuff really clean,

Used to use the tesco or sainsburys brands as they are much cheaper but thought id give these ago and wont be turning back.. Other dish washer tablets cant quite clean tea or coffee out of mugs or pasta/tomato stains out of tupperwear but these do! The plates and glasses even have a little sprarkel on them and are super clean! Best product by far and well worth the price to know we are getting such clean plates, glasses ect

I usually buy the cheaper Tablets but these were on offer that worked out cheaper per tablet than my usual's.. You really do get what you pay for. These are far superior than the cheapest tabs. The regular price is unfortunately more than I'm willing to pay per tablet.
Not much to say but it does the job and came on time
I was surprised how well this work. The dishes come out cleaner despite using a lower temperature (which saves money!), there is also less water residue in the glasses. Great product
What can I say. They do the job well. Items all left sparkly and smelling fresh with no streaks, and these are great value for money!

I usually buy the finish ultimate but these were on a good offer so went for these. They don't seem to clean half the dishes in the dishwasher, especially the plates and I have to rewash a lot! Not sure why this is happening as I've never had that problem with the other finish tablets. Will be changing back.

DO NOT BUY! Pretty useless as the squidgy plastic wrapping gets stuck in the dispenser when the tablet door flips open. Even get stuck if meticulously dry the dispenser. The instructions show that it should not be put in the cutlery basket but must use the dispenser. Around 50% of the time end up having to rewash everything so complete waste of money, waste of water and waste of time.

Purchased on a subscribe and save offer. They are not very good at getting tea and coffee stains out from mugs and leave cutlery with marks. In comparison to other brands these are inferior in quality and efficiency and would not recommend them.

If you do open the dishwasher door and manually slide the tablet out. Since it always get stuck. I have tried to place the tablet in various ways, flat down, flat up, folded in, folded up and it never slides down off the compartment. A part from that, it is ok.
Doesn't clean as well as the normal finish I buy and shine no different
Not sure the cause but most my cutlery shows rust marks.
Very disappointing clean/finish compared to other finish products

Will never buy this product again, tablet doesn’t come out of the dishwasher tablet dispenser. Half the product left inside. Tried different ways to ensure but each time product left behind after wash cycle!. Item is to large to fit into the tablet dispenser.
Doesnt dissolve! When my dishwasher finishes it’s cycle the table is stuck to the inside and the dishes aren’t washed properly! Would stay away from these
Not good value don't really clean dishes very disappointed
These tablets are worse than Lidl and ASDA own brand. Expect your dishes to come out dirty every time. Nice marketing though worked with me!
Glasses come out really shiny and clean with these tablets. It’s a large bag and lasted around 3 months. The dishwasher also seemed cleaner inside.

These dishwasher tablets are a slightly different type from what I used before - i.e. Finish Power All in 1. This variety, Quantum Infinity, is designed to protect glassware and add extra shine. Unfortunately, my dishwasher is designed in such a way that my wine glasses don’t fit inside securely so I have to wash them by hand. However, plates, crockery and stainless steel pans come out looking clean and shiny - I can’t tell much difference from the Power All in 1.. In terms of value for money, you get 83 tablets in the pack, which is a strange number but there you go. If you don’t use your dishwasher every day (I don’t), they will last for a long time. You can’t go wrong with Finish.

Amazon asked me to rate the flavour of these :-) for some reason - nope! No intention of eating them, thank you! I got these for my daughter as she always uses cheaper, supermarket ones, whereas we use Finish, things just seem to come out of the dishwasher squeaky clean and shiny. She’s now a convert as the quality is definitely better. She has always believed unbranded ones would be just the same, only cheaper - but these, in a gel form rather than hard tablets, are really good. Even on her glasses - always the acid test, how many glasses in households up and down the country have ended up with that awful clouding. I reckon Finish have cracked that problem, at last. Yes, they’re a bit pricey, these are 19p a capsule bought in a pack of 83, but if you can run to it, get the double pack, 166 capsules for 15p each. That’ll last a good long while!

I have been really impressed by these. Normally, I have been using just an own-brand tablet. However, these are so much better at cleaning. The finish ( forgive the pun) is so much better. The dishwasher even smell better with their usage. Easy going on the finish of the plates, no noticeable fading.. Definitely switched brands. These are first class.

Contained is a pack of 83 Finish Powerball Quantum dishwasher tablets. As is normally the car, the pack can be opened by tearing off the top of the packet and can be resealed for safe storage.. Each of the 83 tablets are wrapped in a dissolvable coating so simply pop one into the compartment of your dishwasher. That’s it.. The tablets work well, generally, no better or no worse that other brands, but where they’ve struggled is when they were used on a hot wash after a Sunday roast. We usually soak the roasting tin before putting it in the dishwasher but thought we’d give the tablets a try with no pre-soaking. As you can see from the pictures, the tablet struggled to fully clean the roasting tin, even though it was done on the hottest wash. I will add our dishwasher is not a top brand so the tablets may work better in a more premium dishwasher.. All the rest of the dishes finished well and came out looking nice and clean whilst the cutlery was much shinier than usual.. Overall a good quality dishwasher tablet but for tough baked-on food a bit of help, via a pre-wash, is needed.. If this review has proved helpful, please do let me know by clicking the below ‘helpful’ button. Thank you.

I normally use Fairy tablets but these do the job just as well if not slightly better. The dishes come out just as clean but they do seem to have a bit more shine to them which is an added bonus. Great price for the whole pack.

I've been using Finish dishwasher tablets for years and they always do a good job of cleaning glasses, pans, cutlery etc. £15.99 seems a little more expensive than normal, even more so when they are usually on offer. I don't think I'd buy these full price, but they do a good job.

I wasn't 💯 percent sure what it meant about no pre-rinsing as I have not had a dishwasher for long. I assumed it meant just scraping off food etc and putting them in the machine as is. Handy little capsule as everything you need for clean plates is in one place. I just popped it in the machine and put it on cycle. I was happy with the results and it cleaned them a treat.

I expected these Finish Quantum Infinity Shine Dishwasher Tablets to be good because anything I have ever used by Finish has been good but these dishwasher tablets give superb results.. I have run several cycles on 35 degrees making sure that the machine had salt and rinse aid topped up. I don't pre-rinse as we don't put anything in covered in food or oil. These get a quick rinse under the tap first. I then inspected each item as I emptied the dishwasher and put everything away. The results were superb, not a mark on anything.. One of the marketing features is that these tablets are kinder on glassware. I can believe this as they are a gel capsule rather than the hard tablet type that clean like a sand blaster and mark your best glassware. The only problem with gel capsules is that if they get warm they will stick to each other so keep them cool in an air tight contaner.. I haven't mentioned price in this review as there are always offers on dishwasher tablets and the price per unit varies with the pack size.. I would be very happy to recommend these Finish Quantum Infinity Dishwasher Tablets they are brilliant!

I used this to wash my crystal glasses and cocktail making equipment in our Bosch dishwasher on the 'glasses' setting and it did a fab job. We tend to use high street own brand dishwasher tablets due to economising because they work well too.. Would I pay more for the brand leading tablets? Maybe not for everyday use but if a whole load of glassware is needing a wash then I'd switch this product in. Recommended.

In the supermarket you can be spoilt for choice.. An aisle of cleaning products ~laundry and dishwasher products. Which dishwasher product to choose ? ? ?. Finish Quantum Infinity Shine Dishwasher Tablets ~ order from prime and they are delivered to your door. I hate the false lemon aroma and these don't have it. These Finish Quantum Infinity Shine tabs are VERY EFFECTIVE ~ no pre wash needed so less water use. They are not the cheapest, they are a premium product and produce WONDERFUL results.. Our glasses shone with no watermarks ~ nothing came out with any marks on them. The cost per wash is only a few pence different from the budget brands. The results speak for themselves these Finish tabs are the best ~ better than all the rest that I've used !!
These tabs are great! The glass and other cutlery are sparkly clean with no stains or limescale marks.. good value 100% recommended!

Finish Quantum Infinity Shine Dishwasher Tablets, REGULAR, 83 Tablets. I have used the finish quantum ultimate tablets before in the dishwasher and they certainly do the job in hand. These quantum Infinity shine tablets however are a step further! Plates and glasses come out so shiny, dry and clear, I am really happy with them and can’t see me using much else, for now anyway. They are not the cheapest tablets around but as with a lot of things in life you have to pay sometimes for some quality.. Recommended

I was dubious that there woukd be any difference to cheaper cleaning tablets but I was shocked at how much cleaner things were using these tablets, particularly glasses. I use coffee tabs to make lattes and these normally have to be cleaned by hand to remove the film from milk pods, but these were no problem for the finish tablets. Definitely worth the extra cost

Finish Quantum Infinity Shine Dishwasher Tablets, REGULAR, 83 Tablets.. A gel capsule with three parts to it. Larger in size than some solid tablets; harder to fit into the drawer.. 83 capsules (odd number!) costing around 19 pence each (depending on price offers). A gel cleaner may be a little less abrasive than a solid tablet.. I have used these for a few days and the crockery and glassware have come out clean and shiny.. I don’t pre-rinse my load so no extra water saving for me (as claimed). This does a good job, the brand has a high reputation for quality, but it comes at a price. Can’t fault the product.
Really pleased with these. Worked well, good sized pack at a reasonable cost. Highly recommended.

Dish washing tablets are used normally for dishes in your machine and is especially good if you live in a hard water area. I use these tablets to clean pans which have burnt on stains - just soak the pans in warm water for an hour and then wash and rinse well. Washing machines can also benefit from putting one of these in the detergent slot and then wash some of your dirty tea towels too on a normal cycle every 3 or four months. These tablets are easy to use and cleans dishes well.

These dishwashing tablets are fantastic! I normally buy the regular Finish tablets but these quantum tablets are fantastic! They clean the dishes much more effectively and clean your dishwasher. My glasses came out sparkling clean. I know these type cost slightly More but they are well worth the money as they keep your machine cleaner and do a much thorough job. Will be buying these type in the future.

I have been using Finish dishwashing tablets for years and they are my preferred brand. These new tables are specially formulated to protect glasses and you don't need to pre-rinse the dishes which makes them more eco-friendly.. These tablets are great at cleaning – even ‘scrambled eggs pans’! With other tablets, it is sometimes necessary to hand scrub items when small bits of well-cooked/burnt-on food gets left behind – this was not the case when using these. I love wine glasses but it’s always a struggle to clean them, super worried about the machine that ruins them. I was super happy to see the result! The glasses came out really shining !!. Give them a go I promise you won't be disappointed

These dishwasher tablets really do a fantastic job. I found they work especially well on all types of crockery and ovenware. My glassware was really sparkling, other tablets work well but these seem to clean superbly . Very impressive.

Finish dishwasher tablets. These are definitely some of the best dishwasher tablets I've tried. They're more expensive than I would normally pay but I do think they clean that well when you put a large load in, that I think they're worth it if you wait it for the dishwasher to be full, obviously to make the most of one tablet!. You get 83 tablets, you can see all the different liquid types in each one. These are all sealed, none were popped or in bad condition.. I would recommend these. Your plates, pots, pans and cutlery will be shining afterwards.

Dishwasher tablets are expensive from anywhere so it’s good to be a good price , work amazingly and be delivered to your home

Always use very pleased with the the way they clean the dishes

I find these work just as well as the fairy platinum tablets, so I always purchase these as cost effective and do the job well !

Dishes especially silicones and plastic smells horrible after wash. And the silicone turner will make whatever you cooking taste like this tablet.. WE DONT NEED SCENT ON OUR DISHES!. WE JUST NEED THEM CLEAN!
Great product, but how this can be value for money if you pay £8.50 for 78 pack and this one is 80 for £16 at the time of this review? (⌐ ͡■ ͜ʖ ͡■)
Cheaper than in the supermarket and delivered to my door. Excellent.
my brand to go,happy,good quality,value for money!
Having new dishwasher installed and recommended by manufacturers. Good value on Amazon but compare prices carefully.
What can you say they work really well

Ich bin mit den Spülmaschinentabs der Amazon Marke Presto zufrieden. Sie erfüllen ihren Zweck und lassen das Geschirr glänzen. Sie sind zudem günstiger als die Im Supermarkt. Allerdings finde ich, dass man nicht jeden Tab einzeln verpacken müsste, da dies zu sehr viel Müll führt.
It is a pain having to take the plastic off the table every time, otherwise they seem to work fine. L
Got these as I wanted to try a cheaper option than Smol, they were getting more expensive, and i have to say I'm really pleased with them. They clean really well, and are great value

Recommended these dishwasher tablets by a family members and don't regret it at all.. Find that they clean better than the big branded ones, for a much more reasonable price.. We have them on the subscribe and save, really good to not have to worry about buying when they run low. Would highly recommend, especially for the price.

A ‘good’ alternative to mainstream brands. Cheaper than most, but this comes at a cost. I’ve tried these (3 packs) and primarily they clean well. So not a bad start.. That said they often don’t disintegrate fully on a normal wash on my Miele machine. I’ve tried other brands and they all disintegrate as expected.. If you are saving and looking for a ‘good’ not excellent alternative- these tablets are fine.
Was a tad wary after only using branded tablets, but I have to say I am very pleased, seems to clean my pots and pans just as well, I shall continue to purchase these
Dishes come out sparkling with no residue - these look and feel similar to supermarket own brand all in one tabs but half the price. Will def buy these again.

I thought that this 'bargain' was too good to be true 😡. The tablets are easy to use as you don't have to unwrap them. However if you are using them to help remove stubborn baked on dishes or even water marks in saucepans ( if you live in a hard-water area) then unfortunately they don't work very efficiently, unless you add two in one cycle.. Not such a bargain after all 🤔
Works just as good as the expensive brands
Good value dishwasher tablets no complaints

If you rinse the dishes well before putting them in, these tablets do the job just fine. My husband, however, is an indifferent rinser, and these tablets just don’t do the job as well under those conditions as the more expensive Finish tablets. I find I sometimes have to re-wash the whole load.
Clean items well, no smears or water stains
I always use fairy and love fairy but prices high. So thought would try. It does what it says would buy again

Not as good as Aldi's own cheap basic dish tablets. Very soft water here allows most tablets to work reasonably well. But the amazon product was not as good as I expected. Ive got 120 tablets to get through!
Works fine though, only used for loads with general cooking, no burnt in or difficult pans
If you are trying to save money these will do the job but they’re not as good as the more expensive ones I usually use.
Have just ordered.more ,, that says it all ..
As good as fairy all in one! I was pleasantly surprised!!

These dishwasher tablets were surprisingly good. I've used various brand and own brand tablets over the past year or so but bought these for the first time recently. They have worked very well on the 'eco' cycle (50c) in a hard water area.. One tablet in the door as normal, no need to peel any wrapping off beforehand. Some other tablets have tended to struggle on the eco cycle on my machine as it runs at 50c, even some of the more well known brands have left a gritty residue behind unless the machine runs at 60c+ but these have been fine on both 50c cycles and higher temperatures.. Glasses have stayed nice and clear too, no white cloudiness like some others. Overall I'm very happy with them and will more than likely buy again.
Great! As good as any of the other big brands.
Cleanliness is just as good if not better than big brand tablets
These are excellent clean really well and are great value for money
A low price for a excellent clean A star product

Recently bought a dishwasher and also picked up a bag of Fairy platinum all in one dishwasher tablets. Which was 13€ for a pack of 45. Salt and rinse aid added and quantity adjusted as per instructions, but I never managed to get clean, streak free dishes. Glassware looked particularly sad, all dull and covered in white film.. Then I decided to try different brand and went on Amazon. Search results showed this Presto! tablets and I decided to give it a go. From the first use I got squeaky clean dishes and sparkling clean glassware. Fantastic results!!! And very attractive price tag, which is also very important.. Highly recommend these tablets!
Good value for money but the scent is a bit like old water, and that's before you put it in the washer.

Whilst it does seem to clean to a certain extent, residues rapidly build up on the filter, suggesting it does not break down fats and grease to the extent it should. I used this for about 6 months and got fed up of having to remove and clean filters after 2 to 3 washes. I have reverted to a slightly more expensive but branded pod (Fairy All in One), and this problem has disappeared. The dishwasher and dishes are cleaner using this alternative. I will not buy again. Total waste of money
Work ok, you get what you pay for. I use them when I’ve run out of the better ones.

I'm fairly sure they are as good if not better than Finish tablets. I bought these after they were suggested as an alternative to my usual Finish dishwashing tablets that I purchase on subscription. I was really pleased with them and will probably swap over to them in due course.
I fell for the cheap prices, I really don’t recommend this product nothing is coming through clean and I’ve tried it on every setting!!
Great value for money. As good as any of the other big brands. Cleans well and no residue. Will continue to purchase these.
Wow amazing finish definitely buying again and so cheap nice one
These dishwasher tablets are as good as some of the more well known more expensive brands.
No problem with these dishwasher tablets. I couldn’t see a difference between these and a top named brand so perfect value for money
not quite as good as Fairy but much better value for money. will definitely buy them again.

I’m all for saving money but these are so crap. They smell awful before they’ve even gone in the dishwasher. The dishes are coming out with baked on food and the dishwasher itself has a grimy thick residue on the bottom of it AFTER the machine has finished. Seriously, don’t waste your money. I’m sending them back for a full refund and back to Finish Platinum. Id rather pay more than have to wash the dishes after the dishwasher :(
Presto ranges are really good. I use these and the washing machine tablets and conditioner. Superb value and as good as the dearer brands.

Use this daily. Always get great results. Tried a glass baked on pie dish just for curiosity and boy was I amazed it came out shining and clean. My bestie brought the same but she didn’t like so I took them. Def recommend this product
Excellent product, clean the dishes very well

I was a bit dubious about using Amazons own brand dishwashing tablets but have found them great value for money.. We were using a brand beforehand and have found that Presto nearly always does the job first time around.. Admittedly on the tougher stains it does need a wash after, especially saucepans however you can’t complain too much considering the value for money you are getting.

These dishwasher tablets are as good as the rest. They aren't fairy platinum or alike but still do the job they're supposed to.. I like that they are in a wrapas other tablets I have used have just crumbled and gone everywhere - which is a pain.. I would buy them again.
As my dishwasher only takes 3place settings I break/cut the tablet in half. Seems to clean ok
First time buying these and didn't expect much but pleasantly surprised.Made light work of cleaning the dishes, nice lemon scent.
These are great value. Not often have to put dished back for a second wash. they are the best and now getting second delivery. Hope they keep producing these as they are so good for the price.

These tablets are fair for the price.. They are not premium price and don't clean at a premium quality i.e. some items will have to be washed again, where as with a premium tablet this wouldn't be the case.. However they don't leave water marks and do break down grease well so they tablets are a solid middle choice.

Not the best at removing stains/grease just lacking,in some cleaning agent. Ok for slight dirty dishes but nothing too Baked on,or greasy etc .A bit on the expensive side for just an ok product. Nothing like the well known brands which i have tried. And some of the discount supermarket brands.
Need to use an extra program at the end
Second purchase of these tablets, they do a good job.
leaves dishes and glasses stained and covered in a sticky residue. do not recommend.
Complete waste of money, I have found that when using these tablets I end up having have to handwash or put in the dishwasher again.

Purchased these after reading some reviews all I can say is my experience is very different . The tablets left a residue over my crockery and cutlery items were still dirty and had to be washed two or three times before they were clean. They were so bad I thought something was wrong with my dishwasher but after having it looked at nothing was found to be wrong with it. I wouldn't recommend purchasing them and will not use again.
These dishwasher tablets are the best by far for value for money and effectiveness.. Definately would reccomend these ! ;)
Very disappointed as the dishes do not come out clean especially at lower temperature.
Excellent product .. great value for money

It works as well as most other supermarket own brand. The only downside is that the individual tablets are so tightly sealed that to open one, even aftec cutting the top, to remove all of the wrapping the tablet crumbles.
Better than some well known brands
Brought as a trial to replace more expensive branded dishwasher tablets. Am very impressed with how well the clean the dishes. Will not be returning to more famous brand

First time using these ... Very happy everythingwas clean with one tablet, loved that I didn't have to unwrap from those fiddly plastic wrappers so much easier to just pick up and place in the dishwasher. Great value for money. deffo recommend.
Quite value of money .. it’s a dishwasher tablet and does the job at fair price
Me: how are those dish tabs I got you. Gd: what do you mean. Me: do they wash well?. Gd: ofc otherwise I would use them. Me:.... Gd: you do ask some silly questions sometimes
Not up to standard of well known all-in-one alternatives or indeed standard of washing machine capsules under this brand name. More items had to go through cycle twice.
Good I use them all the time I'm classed as shine removes grease perfectly

They do the job and are really cheap but the smell is very strong. We have a joint living room kitchen and the strong smell, even though it's kind of lemony, is a bit offensive. My wife says they have a higher bleach content than others to, all in all not surprised for a value tablet
I think these tablets are great, they achieve sparkly results at around 10p per tablet which is significantly less than most of the leading branded alternatives!

Absolutely brilliant product, never knew they existed and I'm sure glad they do. My wifey has used all the big names but they just don't get the cutlery very clean and leave water marks, PRESTO to her surprise have done the perfect wash leaving everything sparkling and clean and dishwasher smelling nice. Will definitely keep with this super and great value for money tablet.

Pleasantly surprised at how well this cleaned our dishes! Comparable to some of the bigger more expensive brands. Dishes and cups came out all sparkling and no chalky residue. Definitely impressed! Great price too!

The product arrived quickly, well packed and in good condition. On the positive side, they do clean the dishes well, and are value for money. Unfortunately, I am finding that the tablets are leaving spots all over my dishes, cutlery and glasses. Good idea but I won't be re-ordering.

I like these dishwasher tablets and thought they were better value for money then some of the leading brands out there. They work well and are individually wrapped in a resealable bag. Well worth the money.
Fab product, arrived promptly, well packaged as described, have always used finish product but thought worth a try and will keep using can see no difference excellent results great price saving

These dishwasher tablets work just fine. They are individually wrapped with the wrapping dissolving during the wash. They are presented in re-sealable plastic pouches. I'm finding them very convenient and, since they are well priced, shall probably buy again in due course.
Really good value for money and does an amazing job. We use these daily and they work fantastic for us.
The odd one or two failed to pop out of compartment but it does what it says and saves time and money buying separate products for cleaning d/washer.
Absolute rubbish! - Often requires two wash cycles instead of one with two tablets. Complete false economy these tablets.

Super value for money and clean just as well as any other 3 in 1 tablet. I really cannot tell any difference and cannot see how the more expensive tablets could possibly be any better. Highly recommended.
Great item. Got because we couldn’t get any locally and these are better than what I normally buy too - will buy again
These tablets in my opinion are better than the well known brands, they are a reasonable price. Stainless steel comes out gleaming and really shining. I would recommend, I will be buying again.
Average performance but at the price to be expected.
I've been using finish and wasn't 100% Happy with the results so thought I'd try a cheaper alternative using subscribe and save. I haven't noticed much difference so far so I'm happy.
Very happy with these they do really work, been using fairy for a year and just as good if not better and the price is wow, I’ll be back for more
only dishwashers tablets I could get during COVID-19. Do a good job, happy with purchase
Excellent results, I’d buy them again, but they have disappeared off the site.
Excellent product great value does the job S good as leading brands
I’m really pleased with these tablets. Great value for money & work as well as the branded,expensive ones I had before.. I will definitely buy these again.
No problems at all with these will be ordering more in the future

Washes as described. Excellent value tablets

No nonsense capsule. Love it. Very clean dishes and light scented. Good value for money

housemate thinks that these are doing a better job than the top brand we normally use, so I'll buy these again

Bought as a cheaper option. Perfectly adequate.
Very pleased with the results I have got with these tablets.

Seem to be as good or slightly better than brand I’ve used recently.

I would not bother the absolutely rubbish they don't clean the stuff at all pay cheap pay twice
