I like using Astonish products but these dishwasher tablets are nowhere near as good as the leading brands. I'm going back to the old brand. Despite doubling up on quantity and washing twice with extra rinse aid, everything still comes out gritty and greasy. I hope Astonish will look at their formulation as am a big fan of their other products but sadly this one didn't come up to scratch.
Very happy with purchase, the price was good, product works well and delivery was quick.
They do the job. Nothing fancy but good value in this large size, economical pack.

These are ok for the money, I suppose. My mum usually uses Lidl or Aldi own brand tablets and she really liked these. I usually use premium Fairy or Finish 5 in one tablets, so my expectations were unfairly high of these. They are not at all comparable to the premium dishwasher tablets. I did find that once I adjusted the rinse aid dosage dispenser and increased it to a higher dosage, I was reasonably satisfied with the result of a wash load using these.
Great dish washer tablets, work well and are great value, much better than supermarket own brands. Will buy again.

The tablets do the job just as I would expect and I think compare favourably with bigger name brands. Buying in bulk is good, I've subscribed so they come every 3 months and this seems to be about right for our usage.
Not as good as Aldi”s nor Lidl’s basic tabs. They don’t clean that well and a proportion of each load has to be re-washed.
Always buy this brand because they don't test on animals. Recommended.
Well they clean dishes but don't work any better than the own brand tablets I can buy at Aldi for a similar price.
Works exactly as the more expensive versions,for less money. Will definitely order again
My dishwashing using this tablet came out flawless. No grease, no limescale or salt stains. Perfect!
These are the best dishwasher tablets I've used our if the many I've tried, they get the pots clean and are great value for money

Love these dishwasher tablets and swear by their effectiveness and value for money.. Of course it would be better if they weren’t individually wrapped to create less waste... HOWEVER, nearly every single tab from this delivery is broken into crumbles, which I suspect must have happened when in transit or handled for shipping, which is a right mess, so will probably just buy them locally if I can I stead of ordering next time.

After Amazon suspended my Faiary Subscribe and save I thought I would give these a go. My Mum uses them with no complaint and at the time there was no decent savings to be had on fairy.. I have tried everything from changing dishwasher cycle, to making sure salt and rinse aid were topped up to maximum and even rinsing the dishes before they go in and nothing has worked. Anything deep like a cereal bowl or glass tumbler just collects all the food grime that wasn't in those dishes to begin with.. With most stuff coming out dirtier than it came in and only 20% meeting a passable standard I am sending them back.. I'll admit I can be fussy about the cleanliness of my dishes and imo even Finish are sub par but these don't even come close.. Fairy might cost 6p more a load per tablet but based on I can wash on an eco cycle rather than an intensive that is saving more per load on electric than the tablet difference.
Yes they're a bargain to get so many tablets for the price, but they certainly do not do the job. Mugs covered in tea stains which never happened until I started using these.
Not such good value as I have to re wash things and the pumps smells after a few days. Will not be buying again
I bought this as its not tested on animals but hate that every capsule is wrapped in plastic.

Bought these to try due to the price and not at all disappointed. I am rather surprised at some of the 1-star reviews and have experienced none of the problems listed such as spotting on glassware or not washing correctly. Also, the bizarre nit-picking issue of empty wrappers which I presume would not alter the number of tables in the box as these are probably filled to a weight.. On short or long washes they work fine and just as good as the more expensive brands, which we have tried but any difference not really noticeable. The issue of spotting non-existent but if people do not fill the rinse aid and set it correctly or add the correct salt level for the areas water hardness then this will happen with any brand of tablet, this has happened when our rinse aid ran out.. With regards to the tablets not cleaning the dishes etc. well usually this is down to loading the dishwasher incorrectly or overfilling it or a dirty filter. Again we have not had any issue with these tablets and will definitely buy them again if the price stays roughly the same.

Astonish products are generally excellent but we found these dishwashing tablets to be very inferior to others we have used. They tend to leave a sort of haze on metal ( eg saucepans and cutlery) and the door of the machine is left with white streaks all down it. We have also found that some items need to go through again more frequently than before (rarely).
They do quite a good job for a lot less money than the more expensive brands. I am very happy with them.

These are dreadful. Cheap and cheerful is good. I am all in favour of going for the most basic dishwasher tablets that do the job. This is a step beyond that. Frequently, the dishwasher is blue at the end of a cycle. The glasses are cloudy, the cutlery is patchy and the plates are barely cleaned. After using them for a bit, I found I was having to wash things before use, because I wasn't confident about them being either properly cleaned or properly rinsed!
Good value although they had increased since last bought them.
on every single tab, these would be 5* at this price point for sure. Otherwise faultless.

The tablets come in small plastic packaging and are prone to breaking up when opened which is not ideal. Washes well or it might be my new dishwasher ! Need to add seperate rinse liquid as well with the tablet. I would not buy again.
Have to reclean most items, cups and chopping boards stained will not buy again.
I would not recommend as they are individually plastic wrapped which needs removing prior to use so fiddly and wasteful bought as recognised brand disappointed all this extra packaging.

Great that it's vegan and made in UK, but not very eco as you have a bag full of plastic wrapped tablets. The smell is a bit overpowering, fortunately yr stuff doesn't smell of it after washing, so not sure its really needed. Not sure how eco it is either, so might keep looking for eco and vegan dishwasher tablets.

I ordered these Astonish dishwasher tablets based on price alone without reading reviews first. I have used Astonish products before and haven't found them to be anything special but at this price I thought I would give them a go.. I then read the reviews about failing to clean and leaving residue on glasses. But another review suggested using half a tablet. This made sense to me as our dishwasher isn't a full size one anyway.. So from day one we used half a tablet and after using them for around 20 cycles, we think the results are as good as the top selling brands. No residue on glasses and no foods left on plates. We use a little rinse aid now and again which I guess helps?. So the value I expected to get has doubled, now I will get 200 cycles at this price!. I will buy these again and would definitely recommend them!
These are not great. Have to rewash plates and spoons with rice, spinach pizza etc Will switch back to fairy platinum.

They seem to clean the dishes as well as the Aldi tablets I used to use. I would have given 5 stars but the plastic packets are not the easiest to open and quite a few of the tablets are broken inside so you have to tip the contents into the dishwasher compartment.
They clean very well but one star knocked off for them all being individually wrapped in plastic

Althought it is effective with washing dishes, it leaves the dishwasher parts covered in grease (filter). Never happened to me with any other products. I tried higher temperature and it is all the same. I didn't change anything else, dishes always comes to dishwasher lightly rinsed. To be honest - I knew I paid bargain price but it was not really worth it. I definetely won't buy them again.
These are great value but not quite as powerful as more expensive brands. Not a issue but things like dried on wheetabix mat take a second wash. But who cares at this price.

I used this in my washing machine to clear out the gunk. I've tried a lot of cleaners before and they can be costly. I saw this idea in a Mrs Hinch fan group. Does a good job, and leaves the machine smelling lovely and clean.

Delivery time was very good. Happy with its quality too. Well packed. Each tab is individually packed into wrappers meaning the tablets don’t melt or stick together if you put your wet hands into the packet or accidentally water gets in. Yes, it does mean that you will need to unwrap each tablet every time you load a dishwasher however I personally didn’t mind that. Being cheaper, of course it misses the rinse aid which is integrated in some other slightly more expensive alternatives.

You get what you pay for. They seem to do an okay job, although mugs remain tea stained and they leave a film of white powder in the machine. Have just switched back to a bigger brand and the difference is night and day.
Great value, not very powerful scent. Will always purchase this

Two days ago I paid £6 for those tablets, today 17th February they went up to £7. They work well, no spots on glasses and cutlery, plates came out clean and dry. These plates had cheese and mozzarella stuck on them from the previous evening, I used the intensive program P1 on my cookology counter top dishwasher, I did not changed the factory settings for salt, I haven’t added rinse aid. The results are very good as you can see. Spots on glasses from other people are perhaps the result of a very hard water and no salt in the water depurator of the machine, or plates misplaced where water cannot pass through, or washing arms blocked. Next test will be with stained tea mugs.
Doesn’t remove all limescale we had to buy some salts after a couple of cycles of washing

Couldn't be happier with the results from these tablets, I was a bit sceptical given the low price, but after reading mostly positive reviews, I decided to give it a go. I really do think performance varies by dishwasher and you may need to use less of a tablet if you face issues, but I used a whole tablet for each load as any other tablet, great clean, no residue. Will be buying these from now on.

Bought these to save a bit of money and was a bit wary due to mixed reviews, have to say after a week I put them on subscribe and save. The tablets are not much to look at and a few have been broken but, it makes no difference they are great whether or on a quick wash on long one for pots and pans it cleans everything to a shine.. Empty nesters so just me and hubby, a 100 pack will last me for nearly 3 months so great value for money.. They worked well for me, so I heartily recommend.
Great value for money smells ok not over powering only used a few of times and it’s ok but did get stuck in the door holder twice so will see how it goes
They manage to clean my dishes but not tea stains on the inside of cups. I have to wash them all by hand. All in all not bad but if you are a tea drinker be prepared to hand wash the cups.
They don’t clean as well as the fairy platinum I had before purchasing these but when you take the cost into consideration they are an absolute winner

Very pleased with this washing tablets and the 1 star reviews must be down to problems with their dishwasher filter, water hardness ( it does advise on lack of water too hard use some salt), could be incorrect manual and electrical settings of the water hardness on their dishwasher… they work for us and a very pleasant lemon citrus smell! Will. E buying from this seller and definitely recommend this dishwasher tablets.

For the price, you can't really go wrong, one found these to be just as good as the more expensive brands, they have the crockery very clean and sparkly and glasses come out just as well.. Will definitely buy again
Theses don't clean well at all. We are now using 2 tabs for every cycle. Would not buy again.

It doesn't clean the dishes very well. Each capsule is individually wrapped, too much packaging, very environmentally unfriendly! I wouldn't have ordered this if I had known. I won't be ordering it again.
Value for money is brilliant. Smell good, always clean the dishes brilliantly.

This product offers excellent performance - cleans all dishwasher items brilliantly. And don't be put off by its low pricing- it's simply brilliant and offers performance that easily matches its well known competitor brands - but without their noticeable scents.
It doesn't clean as well as rival brands but cleans glasses ok
Decent dishwasher tablets - generally very good for the price, however they are each individually wrapped and need unwrapping before use - not as ecological
I was a bit skeptic because of the price. However seems to be doing the job as well as more expensive brands
Bought as they were cheap. They are not good and leave dishes dull and with food still on them after a wash.

I bought these on offer and I am very happy with the quality of them. I have seen reviews saying they leave marks and residue, I am at the end of my pack and have not had any issues. Would buy them again
not a great product leaves a chalky residue and some food
I know a lot of reviews say these aren't great but I find them to be perfectly fine, no residue or anything left over and they clean pretty well. For the money they are definitely worth buying.

Worst tablets ever, the pots and cutlery are still dirty after the wash. I thought it was the dishwasher so cleaned it again like I do once a month, still the same. Changed to a different brand of tablet and all is great again. What a waste of money.

They work well for basic, everyday use. The only problem is with cleaning egg,This has been a problem for the amazon brand, to presto dishwasher tablets. I only brought these because the amazon, Brand was out of stock.
I really like the smell of the tablets. They also clean really really well.. Only thing I don't like is that they each come wrapped in a plastic wrapper which isn't very ecofriendly.

Nutshell feedback: Near enough every single tablet crumbles apart upon opening the sachets. Glasses need manual cleaning every other wash. Don't bother.. I tend to alternate different dishwashing tablets on Subscribe & Save and saw these were on a pretty decent offer for quantity received so decided to give them a go. The 4,000+ reviews of 4.5 stars further confirmed they were worth a shot.. Every other wash I spotted that glasses were coming out with residue / dirt remaining on the inside of the cup. I've tried different washing programs to see if it was due to this perhaps (other branded tablets never had an issue on Eco mode) and even on 70 degree modes glasses were still coming out soiled.. I'm so fed up with the lack of cleaning from these tablets I've had to throw the balance away which was nearly 30 - 40 tablets. It's as clear as night and day that these tablets don't have the same cleaning strength from the likes of Fairy and Finish which I'll stick with from now on.. I'd recommend handwashing over the use of these tablets. Steer clear.
Would not recommend as the dishes are not clean, tea stained cups now a regular thing, very disappointing.

Good value for money in a resealable bag. Shame the individual tablets are wrapped in a plastic But I spoke to Astonish and they are looking in to alternative wrapping.. They smelled nice and cleaned as well as our previous 'Top brand' tablets.
Disappointed, the product did not clean to the standard expected ... results were poor.
Seem to clean as well as any others I've used. Good value. Recommended.

Just OK. I like the fact they aren't overly scented and don't leave a residual smell (which I particularly dislike on plastics and baking trays), BUT they aren't the best dirt busters and sometimes don't dissolve too well, leaving a grit behind on the pots that requires a second rinse.. Won't buy again which is a shame as I like the ethics of Astonish goods in general.

Possibly the worst dishwasher tablets we have ever used. It leaves a lot of residue in the washer door and bottom. It very rarely makes the dishwasher smell like what it says on the package. But it does wash the dishes hence the 1 star

These tablets work great in compact tabletop dishwasher on short wash. I was using fairy platinum plus before but it was making soap suds built up in the drainage of dishwasher, but these tablets don’t have too much of that so that’s good. Everything is cleaned really well even glasses, no streaks or cloudy residue that other comments say. I would recommend them and I’ve now got them on subscription.

Most of the tablets crumble when taken out of the packet.. These tablets sometimes don't clean the dishes.. The main problem I have found is that over time the cutlery has tarnished.. My best cutlery looks awful now, lots of brown stains, especially on the knives. Definitely will not buy again

Each tablet comes packaged in its own individual plastic packet which is inconvenient and wasteful. Cleaning performance is very average. If you live in a hard water area, you'll need salt/rinse aid otherwise you'll get white spots. We use these tablets only for light loads - if its a packed or heavily soiled wash set then I'll use other tablets.

These work fine. Bought as an 'emergency' purchase as our usual brand ran out. The wok fine but then again we do have a decent quality Neff dishwasher. Only docked them a star because they are individually wrapped.
Fab product saves us buying tablets and rinse aid. So all in one product. Had no issues with any marks residue etc
They packaging is awkward to open then they fall apart going everywhere. Not impressed at all!
They break up and not as good as finish in my opinion
Does the job as good as any own brand I normally buy.. We always rinse first as we hate the build up of food around the door etc so can't comment for those of you who don't do that.
Do a good job cleaning, but really harsh on patterned glaze etc.
Not as effective as the Fairy, Finish or Magnum ones sorry to say. Some things left still dirty, glasses smeary. I Always wash things on the 50 minute eco setting. Avoid.

I've been using these tablets for a few months now, and I can't recommend them at all.. My glasses are cloudy after every wash.. As soon as they are used up I shall be going backn to my previous brand.
My dishes come out half clean I won't be buying this again
Not great in our new dish washer they didnt devolve
No issues with how clean the dishes come out, works as well if not better than the big names without the premium price, also on subscribe and save so turns up at the door just as we are running out

I’ve been using these tablets for 2 weeks. I’ve always used Fairy or Finish brands before, but these had 4.5star reviews, so I thought I’d try. They delivered such poor performance that it led me to believe my dishwasher was broken - they simply did not clean things - often items come out more dirty, and with a white sanding residue on the plates. I went through the process of topping up salt, rinse aid and replacing the filters, and still horrendous. I assumed it must be the machine as the tablets had good reviews. I was just online looking to buy a new dishwasher and I thought I’d try Finish again before spending several hundred pounds. Low and behold - my dishwasher is back and shiney!? Surely a product cannot sell and get high ratings when it is so bad. Very confused. Anyway - not worth buying for the £2-3 cheaper price tag. Buy cheap buy twice.
Great product if you want to pre-wash before hand washing your dishes. Leaves them still marked. The only good thing about this product is the glasses aren’t streaky
They do what it says on the packet, no fuss, no frills.
For the price you cannot go wrong
Does a great job in getting the dishes clean. Just wish they didn’t have individual plastic wrapping

Bought when in isolation and great value and if they were rubbish wouldn’t mind throwing away.. These are fantastic- dishes are super clean and shiny nice lemon aroma and to be honest they’re cheap as chips! I won’t go back to any other dishwasher tables again.. Only downside if any is they’re individual wrapped as they’re fiddly to open

These were really good and clean just as well as any other dishwasher product that I’ve used. I’ve used other items from the astonish range and I’ve never been disappointed and the fact that they are eco-friendly as well is a real bonus. Would definitely Purchase these again.

Meh!...they are OK but they dont clean my cutlery well i had to in the end scrub some of them myself it was that bad!. I wont be buying again. I'll stick to fairy dishwasher tablets in the future however the price isn't so bad for the amount you get.
These are really good tablets.... I just scrape off food and chuck it all in, frying pans greasy plates and all washed fine. So give them enzymes something to work on.
They were cheap to buy, but they are defo good for cleaning stubborn stains, very well impressed. will defo buy this product in the future from Amazon.

First of all, i hate the smell. I cant stand it and I dont know how i can stand this smell for the next 100 washes because this is a 100 tablet pack.. Cleaning performance isnt very good in Siemens machine in ECO mode 3:45 hr wash.. I would better go to the expensive brand for its cleaning performance or go to some brands that offer fragrance free tablets.. The reason why i bought this tablet is the price. But i dont think i will buy again.

I think this product beats a lot of dishwasher tablets hands down when it comes to price and they do a comparable good job of cleaning the dishes. I admit to scaring dishes well and rinsing when necessary but the finished appearance of the dishes on a quick cycle is faultless. Astonish offer a good range of products and this is no exception.
Buy finish these don’t cut it

Ok but not the most fantastic clean compared to the premium brands. Not great at burnt on food. Had a free sample delivered for fairy platinum and now I can certainly see the difference between budget and premium

Trialed these recently - a promising start now notice that after using the product there are stains and residue left on many items. The internal filters within the dishwasher were cleaned manually prior to use and remain clean. I can only assume it’s the astonish tablet causing the issue. Needless to say I will be removing the item from any repeat orders.

It's GREAT value and this is our third purchase. We are in a hard water area and this has made a big difference from any of the others we've tried. Give it a go - you have nothing to lose but limescale!

Generally I like Astonish products but not this dishwasher tablet. Not only does it not clean too well, it leaves a white powdery residue all over the glasses etc. I thought something was wrong with our usually good dishwasher and I was thinking the kids must be doing something wrong when loading it, but it was this product causing the issues. I had to change brand and everything went back to normal. Sorry to the people at astonish, normally your products are great, but not this time!
Don't think I've seen any as cheap as I picked these up and they do the job
Cheap, but not great- a some items come out of each wash still dirty, and have to go through again. I'll be going back to the more expensive competitor brand

I thought £7 for 100 tabs was a good deal, never used these tabs before and I would definitely purchase again, they're just as good as Finish. Excellent.

I really did not like these tablets. I usually love astonish products. I’ve tried several and they’ve all been excellent but these dishwasher tablets were awful. Every singe load comes out dirty, I tried rinsing first and even then they weren’t completely clean. Glass usually comes out sparkly but it was dull. I’ve had to put things through more than once to get them properly cleaned. I was going to keep persevering until the packet was finished but I just can’t go on. I’m basically having to clean the dishes before putting them into the dishwasher, complete waste of time!
Great price for big pack and really does the job
Everything comes out nice and sparkly clean in the shortest cycle :)
Good value and a great clean. Just a shame that the tablets are individually wrapped in plastic.
Item OK had to put some dried on food through twice, but OK for money
These dishwasher tablets are okay but have found that some cups are left with tea stains on them. I purchased these as I am not able to go to my normal supermarket due to Covid restrictions.

Rubbish, does not clean properly, thought it was dishwasher, used oh highest setting but still not totally clean. Bought a more famous brand and immediate success. Pity I can't return them and get my money back.
Just as good as more expensive dish washers
Quite like the product but I hate that each tablet is individually wrapped inside a plastic bag.

It didn't clean the plates and cups properly, weland we ended up increasing the temperature to 65 to get a big standard clean. And when it did leave out cups clean there was a residual smell which was not pleasant- not a lemon smell at all!
A number of tabs were crumbled when I went to open them and I don't think they do as well as the gel tabs. Do an ok job but sometimes finding I have to wash by hand after.
My dishes came out very clean. Does the job very well for a decent price. What’s not to like? :)
Great value and works well, but all the tablets are individually plastic wrapped which is such a waste! Other brands have managed it so there’s not much excuse.

I though I'd try a cheap brand, quite often cheaper brands work just as well as the brand name but not in this case. Every time I used these tabs I had to run the dishwasher twice. The inside of the dishwasher was streaked with tablet residue & food particles, the dishes were streaky, cutlery not fully cleaned, pans just didn't clean, everything left with a film of dirt & water. A bargain that is useless is not a bargain. Four lots of dishes needed 8 tabs, so bad the rest of the box went in the bin. For reference we have a Bosch dishwasher and live in a soft water area, never had this problem with ANY other tabs whether leading name or shop own brand. They may be cheap but if you have to throw them away they aren't value for money.

Not the best dishwasher tablets around but do a good enough job for the price, sometimes you have to clean the odd bit off, a really bad encrusted dish but generally everything comes out squeaky clean. Bought several packets now and happy to buy them again.
give purchasers time before seeking review

Purchased these as they seemed to be a good deal but they just didn't clean properly. Everything came out still dirty or with salt marks which is an issue I have never had before. Even with rinse aid added it just didn't clean properly.
These clean great, but each one is wrapped in plastic
Good delivery. In theory a goood price but only work at at hot wash!! Otherwise poor.

Although delivered quickly, really not very good at washing. Only used half a dozen, have reverted to normal brand. Left smears, didn't remove all food particles, glass started to go opaque, had to wash twice even when dishwasher was half full.

Astonish products are really good quality and great prices too on all their products, these tablets being no exception so i will be buying more once i get low.. Please note they wont get burnt on or very dirty dried on food plates clean.
Does what it is supposed to do.
Works well but unfortunately I didn't realise that each tablet came in a little wrapper so now have all these single use plastic wrappers
Works fine in the dishwasher that we use in the science department at the school I work at.
Products are fine. Luckily they're all in plastic bags because the delivery driver left the parcels in the rain!!! and lied about someone receiving the parcels. Unhappy!!!
Wash the dishes ok but I wouldn’t of bought if I’d known the tablets were all individually wrapped in plastic.
These dishwasher tablets are really good, clean brilliantly and break down well too, with no residue! 😃

Usually buy well known brand tablets but brought these as didn't have normal ones .I was so surprised .they are so good, leaves everything clean and sparkley, I will continue to buy these as they are great value and do amazing job
I’m really happy about the quality. I haven’t been rinsing pottery and dishes before placing them in the dishwasher and they still come out spotless 😃
I am happy with the tablets they have surprisingly done an excellent job, as they where so cheap. Glasses came out crystal clear. I have subscribed for them to be delivered every 2 months.
What more can I say unwrap, pop it in the dishwasher pots come out sparkling clean, half the price of the competitors which means you have money left over to buy a caterpillar cake 🤓👍
Not convinced they wash the dishes as well as other brands.

Astonish is a good name for this as it's truly astonishing. I didn't expect it to be as good as the more expensive brands, but the reviews persuaded me to give it a try. Brilliant results on all dishes, pots and pans and cutlery.

Do not buy these! The first time I used them everything came out covered with a white gritty residue. My glasses were awful. I used rinse aid and salt in the dishwasher as I always do. I tried using a dishwasher cleaner and gave them another go with exactly the same results. I contacted the manufacturer and they suggested I use rinse aid and salt (which I had already told them). They then asked me to send 2 tablets to them at my own expense, which I did. They then emailed me saying there was nothing wrong with the tablets and it was my fault for living in a hard water area. And they suggested I try using rinse aid and salt.! And didn’t even refund my postage costs. Poor product and terrible customer service.
Very good price compared to leading brands but work just as well and in some cases better. Very happy 😊

Well, we have used the tabs for over a week now and are very pleased with the results. We found none of the less favourable comments as on some of the reviews. Well done Astonish, everything is bright and shiny
does not remove stains or marks well even at higher temperatures, disappointed

You get alot for your money not all in good condition either flat or squished alot break when you open them. Not cleaning my mugs well either tea stains not gone like high end products give. I would buy again on a budget but I am going to try others.
Brilliant cleaning, nicely scented and brilliant value - can’t fault them really!
Good for a standard wash but fails with more heavy duty items such as pans and trays.

Individual plastic film that you have to peel out manually.. Do you really want to save a dime and have to peel off the plastic wrap around each dose of dishwasher product? If yes, this is the product for you.. If you have better things to do with your life, get a product with a soluble film.

I have never used astonish dishwasher tablets before but after using a anti bacterial spray I thought I would give these a try. So please I did. They are very reasonably priced and clean my plates and cutlery as good as a premium brand.
ive used fairy etc and these are best glass where gets rid of white staining and beer keeps good head ,crockery comes out with out staining

A few day into using these, I began to notice more and more dirty items, glasses started to look cloudy and everything had a weird chalky texture, I cleaned out the dishwasher topped up the rinse aid checked the salt everything fine, it even started to coat the inside of the dishwasher in this awful chalky stuff, and it's not my dishwasher as it's a higher spec Bosch!!!

AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE. If you're thinking of saving a few quid like I did think again.....I thought Astonish were a trustworthy cleaning company, that is, until now!! These tablets don't clean anything properly, leave the glasses covered with white film, tea stains in mugs and worst of all have left my 1 year old dishwasher unusable now..it won't complete a full cycle which I believe is due to a blockage in the pipe necause they're so useless at cleaning, so am now waiting on a plumber. Thanks a lot, Astonish!!!
It was good to know that this product could be bought in 100 tablet boxes. This product does the job as well as any other well known leading dishwasher brands.
Waste of money. Does not clean well and I do have a full rinse aid dispenser and salt container in my dishwasher and these do not clean very well at all. Do not waste your money.

Unfortunately these tabs did not do the job. Left white marks on pans and barely cleaned heavier duty stuff. I'd convinced myself that it was my dishwasher and kept cursing it. When the tabs ran out and went back to Fairy tabs, the difference was amazing - pans sparkling as new. Thought I'd give something else cheaper a go but you get what you pay for.

I was dubious if they would work, as they are so much cheaper than other brands. But they are perfect! I haven't had one thing come out dirty. I do use rinse aid as well, so this may help but no complaints here. Would recommend

Shocking product, so much that I asked for a refund.. We use Aldi dishwasher tabs and never had an issue. Changed to these for a bigger quantity to save on plastic... Well that was a disaster in the first place as each of them is individual wrapped in plastic!!!. Most importantly, though, they just don't clean. 4 years with this dishwasher never had an issue till now.. Do not recommend and it's a shame as I wanted to support astonish due to their cruelty free status

I brought these as they seemed a great value for money and they really are I won’t be buying any other they clean really well

Did not remove tea and coffee stains, left glass hazy and smeared and cutlery stained. Tried them 3 times on different programs and the results were the same. I would send them back but I've used 3.
As the title says but for a fraction of the price, I’ll be getting these again

These dishwasher tablets are possibly the worst I have used and the opposite of value for money.. Granted they did clean lightly soiled items such as plates and glasses but barely touched items with baked on food such as frying pans.. The worst problem for me is they appear to have left quite deep scratches on some of my glasses and cutlery which obviously I am not pleased about.. Avoid these as they could cost you more money than you save.. As for me I’m going back to the top brands so I can have clean pans once more without my utensils getting scratched up.
Just as good as any others I have tried and from a British company will be using astonish for all my cleaning supplies from now on.
Shocking... left my dishwasher in an awful mess ... dishes were still dirty ... Complete waste

Good value for money - note though that they have those annoying little wrappers. I usually buy the ones that don’t have any or the plastic around the tablet dissolves.
Don't waste your money! Considering they're a well known brand, these Astonish dishwasher tablets do not clean properly, and leave your glasses smeared and unclean. Very disappointing.

Individually wrapped in hard to open plastic, which is annoying (and wasteful). But what I really feel like I've wasted is my money as these tablets leave everything in my dishwasher covered in a white film. Glasses turn opaque and stainless steel is dulled. Wish I'd just stuck with the brand leader which wasn't much more expensive. They claim they're an all in one tablet. That's really not true. You'll need to make sure your machines salt and rinse aid are topped up if you want crockery that isn't covered in a film of dishwasher scum.

These tablets do not clean the dishes and they leave glasses looking revolting. If you use two tablets on the hottest setting then you might get your dishes out relatively clean, but they will have a powdery deposit all over them. Glasses will be ruined, no matter how much rinse aid you add.. I absolutely love other Astonish cleaning products, but these are not viable dishwasher tablets. Avoid.
Read that these tablets are one of the best and affordable. Does a nice job. For the price I payed, I can’t complain at all.

So disappointed and surprised, you might even say, "Astonished!" I'd bought these in the past and they worked just fine. They got the dishes clean, a bit cloudy maybe, but clean. So I received this batch thinking I'd get the same results - Wrong! After 2 washes with them my dishes were still coming out with food on them. So I put one of my Finish tablets in after, and everything came out clean. I don't know what they've done to these tablets, but they don't work. Very disappointing as I love all of Astonish's other products I've used, they are normally best of the best. Thankfully Amazon refunded me.. Avoid these.
This is so much cheaper than the top brand dish washer tabs and does a really good job.

I usually use finish dishwasher tablets but thought I would try these. You definitely get what you pay for. These are terrible, you have to rewash almost every dish when it comes out the dishwasher. Great price and works well. Would recommend
Definitely tops for me. Super clean and the best I have used yet. Very good price too.

Much better than any other famous brands. Really good tablets. It doesn't stay unmelted, like it used to happen with other well-known brands.
Great value for money, and a lovely smell on these too. Would definitely buy these again, as I usually spend the same price in different stores for a lot less tablets! Would 100% recommend.
Haven’t used yet, I have purchased because I like Astonish products as I am very keen to use everything that has not been tested on animals, Astonish products are very good

i was a bit doubtful because of the price but they do the job as good as the more costly ones

I bought these on the name Astonish. Do not buy. I thought they had ruined my cutlery and in fact threw away couple of glasses as I could not get the film off them. Felt guilty because I told a friend about them and she has messaged me today showing me how bad they were on her wash.

I ordered these as they were cheap. I always normally buy Aldi own brand, which do a great job.. These 'Astonish' are terrible.. I bought these instead of my usual fairy tabs. Very disappointed, they left tea stains in all my cups which the dishwasher baked on. I added salt and rinse aid and cleaned the filter. Really Not impressed with these. Bought because of the good reviews but very disappointed. They bake residue onto plates. Absolutely terrible, had to buy another brand as these weren't working at all, made glasses and cutlery dull and nothing came out clean
Not good at all considering this is a really good make

I would not recommend these dishwasher tablets if you live in a hard water area. The only way to make these any good is to use two and set your dishwasher on the highest temperature otherwise you still get food left on your dishes and coffee stains on your cups

Absolute rubbish, put on a wash and left a thick white residue over everything. Changed salt and rinse and and put machine on a machine clean and tried again. Still thick white residue. Had to buy more tablets and new fairy ones are fine. Total waste of money.

I used this in my washing machine to clear out the gunk. I've tried a lot of cleaners before and they can be costly. I saw this idea in a Mrs Hinch fan group. Does a good job, and leaves the machine smelling lovely and clean.

You get what you pay for. They seem to do an okay job, although mugs remain tea stained and they leave a film of white powder in the machine. Have just switched back to a bigger brand and the difference is night and day.

Two days ago I paid £6 for those tablets, today 17th February they went up to £7. They work well, no spots on glasses and cutlery, plates came out clean and dry. These plates had cheese and mozzarella stuck on them from the previous evening, I used the intensive program P1 on my cookology counter top dishwasher, I did not changed the factory settings for salt, I haven’t added rinse aid. The results are very good as you can see. Spots on glasses from other people are perhaps the result of a very hard water and no salt in the water depurator of the machine, or plates misplaced where water cannot pass through, or washing arms blocked. Next test will be with stained tea mugs.
Great price and service for this product- these tablets never let me down - tried others and keep going back to these.
Doesn’t remove all limescale we had to buy some salts after a couple of cycles of washing

100 dishwasher tabs for £6...I thought wow! What a good deal! Alas, that excitement was short lived when I finally got them and used it in a half loaded slimline dishwasher with scraped and rinsed plates... what I ended up with were plates and glasses that were streaked and yeah, they just weren’t clean.. I tried again with the same plates and glasses (even rearranged them) and still that streakiness and chalk like substance remained. Salt levels and rinse aid levels were full. Ended up using my usual tabs and everything came out sparkling which makes me think these are total crap.. I used 6 tablets and ended up giving it away.
Bought because they were cheaper and thought I'd give them a go. Okay for the money but not sure if I'd buy them again.
Great value for money smells ok not over powering only used a few of times and it’s ok but did get stuck in the door holder twice so will see how it goes

For the price, you can't really go wrong, one found these to be just as good as the more expensive brands, they have the crockery very clean and sparkly and glasses come out just as well.. Will definitely buy again
Theses don't clean well at all. We are now using 2 tabs for every cycle. Would not buy again.

It doesn't clean the dishes very well. Each capsule is individually wrapped, too much packaging, very environmentally unfriendly! I wouldn't have ordered this if I had known. I won't be ordering it again.
Value for money is brilliant. Smell good, always clean the dishes brilliantly.

Decent dishwasher tablets - generally very good for the price, however they are each individually wrapped and need unwrapping before use - not as ecological

Worst tablets ever, the pots and cutlery are still dirty after the wash. I thought it was the dishwasher so cleaned it again like I do once a month, still the same. Changed to a different brand of tablet and all is great again. What a waste of money.

Possibly the worst dishwasher tablets we have ever used. It leaves a lot of residue in the washer door and bottom. It very rarely makes the dishwasher smell like what it says on the package. But it does wash the dishes hence the 1 star

Most of the tablets crumble when taken out of the packet.. These tablets sometimes don't clean the dishes.. The main problem I have found is that over time the cutlery has tarnished.. My best cutlery looks awful now, lots of brown stains, especially on the knives. Definitely will not buy again

I bought these dishwasher tabs thinking I’d bagged a bargain. How wrong was I ? I noticed that when the dishwasher finished my glasses were cloudy and tea cups had brown stains. I continued to use them as I thought it was my dishwasher at fault. I decided to change back to my normal dishwasher tabs and within 1 wash things started to look cleaner and brighter and had more of a shine to them. I would not recommend these. On the face of it it seems like a bargain but not when the items being washed come out unclean. I’ll stick to my usual brand in future!

These work fine. Bought as an 'emergency' purchase as our usual brand ran out. The wok fine but then again we do have a decent quality Neff dishwasher. Only docked them a star because they are individually wrapped.

They packaging is awkward to open then they fall apart going everywhere. Not impressed at all!
Do not clean well , dishes especially pans are smeary looking.
They break up and not as good as finish in my opinion

Been using these for a while now and can't see any difference when compared to the more extensive brands I was using before.

Only just started using but so far so good taking the wrapper of is a bit difficult as disabled
Not as effective as the Fairy, Finish or Magnum ones sorry to say. Some things left still dirty, glasses smeary. I Always wash things on the 50 minute eco setting. Avoid.

I've been using these tablets for a few months now, and I can't recommend them at all.. My glasses are cloudy after every wash.. As soon as they are used up I shall be going backn to my previous brand.

Whilst these 3 in 1 tablets cleaned baked on food off of baking dishes they were abysmal at stains in tea cups and mugs. My dishes come out half clean I won't be buying this again
Not great in our new dish washer they didnt devolve
No issues with how clean the dishes come out, works as well if not better than the big names without the premium price, also on subscribe and save so turns up at the door just as we are running out

I’ve been using these tablets for 2 weeks. I’ve always used Fairy or Finish brands before, but these had 4.5star reviews, so I thought I’d try. They delivered such poor performance that it led me to believe my dishwasher was broken - they simply did not clean things - often items come out more dirty, and with a white sanding residue on the plates. I went through the process of topping up salt, rinse aid and replacing the filters, and still horrendous. I assumed it must be the machine as the tablets had good reviews. I was just online looking to buy a new dishwasher and I thought I’d try Finish again before spending several hundred pounds. Low and behold - my dishwasher is back and shiney!? Surely a product cannot sell and get high ratings when it is so bad. Very confused. Anyway - not worth buying for the £2-3 cheaper price tag. Buy cheap buy twice.
Works just as well as the more expensive brands
Great product if you want to pre-wash before hand washing your dishes. Leaves them still marked. The only good thing about this product is the glasses aren’t streaky

Buy finish these don’t cut it

Ok but not the most fantastic clean compared to the premium brands. Not great at burnt on food. Had a free sample delivered for fairy platinum and now I can certainly see the difference between budget and premium

It's GREAT value and this is our third purchase. We are in a hard water area and this has made a big difference from any of the others we've tried. Give it a go - you have nothing to lose but limescale!

Generally I like Astonish products but not this dishwasher tablet. I had to change brand and everything went back to normal. Sorry to the people at astonish, normally your products are great, but not this time!

These tabs are great. They left my glass oven dishes clean to the squeak and sparkling. No remnants of burnt on food to be seen. My cutlery came out pristine cups and glasses the same. The scent it nice, not too strong so it doesn’t flavour your dishes.

Every singe load comes out dirty, I tried rinsing first and even then they weren’t completely clean. Glass usually comes out sparkly but it was dull. Great value and works well, but all the tablets are individually plastic wrapped which is such a waste! Other brands have managed it so there’s not much excuse.

Not the best dishwasher tablets around but do a good enough job for the price, sometimes you have to clean the odd bit off, a really bad encrusted dish but generally everything comes out squeaky clean. Bought several packets now and happy to buy them again.

Purchased these as they seemed to be a good deal but they just didn't clean properly. Everything came out still dirty or with salt marks which is an issue I have never had before. Even with rinse aid added it just didn't clean properly.

Although delivered quickly, really not very good at washing. Only used half a dozen, have reverted to normal brand. Left smears, didn't remove all food particles, glass started to go opaque, had to wash twice even when dishwasher was half full.

Astonish products are really good quality and great prices too on all their products, these tablets being no exception so i will be buying more once i get low.. Please note they wont get burnt on or very dirty dried on food plates clean.

Works fine in the dishwasher that we use in the science department at the school I work at.
Products are fine. Luckily they're all in plastic bags because the delivery driver left the parcels in the rain!!! and lied about someone receiving the parcels. Unhappy!!!

Each of the tablets is individually wrapped in plastic! This is going to generate an unbelievable amount of unrecyclable waste. I would never have bought this if I'd realised, and I certainly won't buy again, I don't care if it works like a dream.. Come on guys, the rest of the world has stopped doing this.
These dishwasher tablets are really good, clean brilliantly and break down well too, with no residue! 😃

Usually buy well known brand tablets but brought these as didn't have normal ones .I was so surprised .they are so good, leaves everything clean and sparkley, I will continue to buy these as they are great value and do amazing job
I’m really happy about the quality. I haven’t been rinsing pottery and dishes before placing them in the dishwasher and they still come out spotless 😃
I am happy with the tablets they have surprisingly done an excellent job, as they where so cheap. Glasses came out crystal clear. I have subscribed for them to be delivered every 2 months.
What more can I say unwrap, pop it in the dishwasher pots come out sparkling clean, half the price of the competitors which means you have money left over to buy a caterpillar cake 🤓👍
Not convinced they wash the dishes as well as other brands.

Astonish is a good name for this as it's truly astonishing. I didn't expect it to be as good as the more expensive brands, but the reviews persuaded me to give it a try. Brilliant results on all dishes, pots and pans and cutlery.

Do not buy these! The first time I used them everything came out covered with a white gritty residue. My glasses were awful. I used rinse aid and salt in the dishwasher as I always do. I tried using a dishwasher cleaner and gave them another go with exactly the same results. I contacted the manufacturer and they suggested I use rinse aid and salt (which I had already told them). They then asked me to send 2 tablets to them at my own expense, which I did. They then emailed me saying there was nothing wrong with the tablets and it was my fault for living in a hard water area. And they suggested I try using rinse aid and salt.! And didn’t even refund my postage costs. Poor product and terrible customer service.
does not remove stains or marks well even at higher temperatures, disappointed

We have in the past used Finish dishwasher tab, I find using thes Astonishing tabs give a better finish especially on metal cooking tins and trays. I am surprised at some of the negative reviews, I can only assume that some tabs perform better with different makes of machines ours is a Miele.

I bought a bag of these from my local B&M and it was significantly cheaper than on Amazon (nearly half the price for the same sized bag, i paid £3). I had heard of Astonish before but never used their dishwasher tablets. Needless to say i won't be purchasing them again.. The instruction information on the back of the bag says to use at either 55*c or 65*c, i should have noticed this in the store as no UK dishwashers has a 55*c temperature setting. Usually they have 45/50/65/70. So as a result the lowest temperature that i can use that works with the Astonish dishwasher tablets according to Astonish is 65*c. That in itself isn't the reason for giving it one star... the reason i give it one star is even at 65*c it still leaves food on plates, pots and pans, even on plates that appear clear it leaves a gritty feeling to them if you run your fingers across the surface straight out of the dishwasher. I never have this problem when using Lidls own tablets or even Fairys all in one product. At the higher temperature of 65*c it makes it even worse and shows what little strength these tablets have. Very disappointed in the performance and i advise you avoid this product!

Really really impressed with these dishwasher tabs. I actually prefer them to the the other more popular /mainstream brands...they don't leave a taste/scent on anything & everything comes out really clean & sparkly. Love that Astonish dont test on animals & these dishwasher tabs are also phosphate free....love the price & the free delivery too. Thank you Amazon! Just goes to show that you really don't need to spend over the odds to have great results...unlike some other brands that spend a fortune on advertising & this is then reflected in the price....you think you're getting something better but you're not.

Thought I would try these as they on special offer. Having used other Astonish products, I was expecting good results. I normally use another brand on Amazon but wanted to see if I could get them cheaper, we use the disherwasher a lot as we are a B&B.. I always use highest temp in the dishwasher for everything, including wine glasses and glass tumblers, which means that I put one on the dishwasher floor (as manufacturers instructions for pre-wash) and one tab in the door holder.. We’ve been using these in our household for well over a year now, and have never experienced any problems. They’re fine with the intensive washes, but most of the time we use them on the cooler eco wash. They are fine with our newer dishwasher, but were also fine with our previous more basic dishwasher.. They won’t always shift extreme layers of baked on food, but no dishwasher tablet ever has. So as long as you pre-soak your grimiest ovenware first then you won’t get any problems.. We always try to buy wisely on the basics wherever we can. We’ve tried the more premium brands, and I can’t say they have any advantages. OK, the most well-known brands may well leave your dishes smelling like summer meadows or strawberry unicorns but, unless this is important to you, then there’s really no need to pay any more money. Bulk bags are better value and more environmentally friendly, which is also so important. A bag of these tablets seems to last a long time.. If you’ve found this review to be in any way small way helpful then please let me know. Thank you.

Picture doesn't do justice but I can now finally take my stuff out of the dishwasher and put it straight in the cupboard! Before I would always had to give them a manual rinse to get rid of the extra stains and smell but this has none of that! Although it leaves the dishwasher smelling lemony fresh but not my items which I like as I hate it when freshly washed dishes smell of fragrance from the liquid detergent, eww! It has left my items sparkling clean on the 30 mins cycle with only 1-2 items to rinse but that was my doing for loading a ton of stuff into the dishwasher. It has also passed the sniff test (where the washed up dishes don't smell of washing up liquid that I despised and they always needed a rinse under cold water). It cuts through grease and grime and leaves a shiny finish to your stuff including the dishwasher door itself (no more dullness). I received 3 samples in the post about a year ago and I was impressed but then continued with another cheaper brand and that would always leave white stuff all over my dishes and cutlery that needed rinsing. After reading some of the reviews here I was almost put off in buying these as I thought that maybe they changed the formula making them less effective but I am happy that I didn't listen to them as there are always people that are unhappy about the silliest things ("Oh, not made in the UK, 1 star"... Really?? Or "My items are even dirtier now" Uhm... Perhaps they din't know how to use their dishwashers?) ... Anyway, I now have these on a regular subscription as they are cheaper here than in supermarkets this way and are good value for money. I will stick to these from now on and I highly recommend them! Thanks Fairy!!! :)
